title: nice product ！
content: Everything is as its description I sit at my desk most of the day and my seat is important. Uncomfortable office chairs can damage productivity, morale and health, and can even cause back pain, circulation problems, carpal tunnels and other injuries. For better health, well-being and efficiency, choosing a comfortable chair is very necessary for me. The mid-back office chair supports the natural curve of the spine, protecting my lower back and middle back because it urges me to sit up straight. I ordered and satisfied with these items because they feature an open mesh design that creates a breathable, well-ventilated backrest, and the padded mesh seat is thick and flexible, and the pneumatic controls make it easier to raise or lower the seat.  Everything is as its description. The most important thing is that it is shipped by Amazon , and it has a warranty: 12 months warranty. I can buy it without risk. Overall, this is a great chair for me, and it was so easy to put together, followed the user manual and in 25 minutes I had the chair assembled.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Good inexpensive chair that is comfortable for all-day use.
content: I was looking at chairs and was almost ready to dive in head first on an x-chair for $1100 - but then looked a little further and found this for around $70.  I ordered and it came in two days. The chair is decent quality and it is comfortable with the mesh back conforming to your back. Is it the most comfortable chair ever? No, but it works. The rollers are good (hardwood floor) and the assembly was easy, although I attached the arms to the back first and then attached the seat, finding that easier than the instructions.  I have had to tighten the main mounting bolts once now after a little over a week of use, but no big deal. The adjustments are decent - I mainly just raise it up and down, but it does have a spring-assisted "recline" that is nice when you just want to lean back for a bit. The arms are fixed and not adjustable - but I am rarely working with my computer with my arms to my side. I am large framed but not excessively overweight, and I have plenty of room in the chair (6'2" 225lbs).  Good travel on the height adjustment to get you just right at your keyboard. Very happy so far with the chair. I was not paid or offered any bonus for my review.
author: mqqn
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Surprisingly easy for a 68-year-old retiree to assemble by himself
content: TL:DR? Video Slides (PDF file) showing each step of the assembly Video: Nine minute video (MP4) where I talk about the assembly I got this chair a few days ago. It was the first time that I've ever assembled my own chair. In the past, I've ordered them fully assembled or bought them locally, already assembled. I'm 68, retired, not strong, and not that handy with tools. When I need something hung on the wall, I usually ask someone else to do it for me. This chair is 100% better than the office chair that it is replacing. My prior chair allowed my thighs to bump into the arm rests. I do not have that problem with this chair. I also found my last chair, a leatherette chair, to not be comfortable for me to lean back against. This chair I regularly use the backrest and sometimes rock the chair. The lumbar support is perfect for my back. The curve of the mesh back matches the curve of my back. I'm 6'5" tall, if that makes any difference to someone reading this. Because I wanted to review the chair, I decided to do it all of the work by myself. I deliberately did NOT ask my friend to come over and film me doing it because he probably would have interrupted me each time he thought he could do it better. (I got it 100% right on my own). Including unpacking the box, spreading everything around me, counting everything, doing the assembly, and taking pictures while I worked, it took me less than an hour. I'm sure that some young people could have done it in a quarter hour or less, but I referred to the instructions at every step. I only found one step of the instructions confusing, but once I figured it out, it made total sense. Steps 3 and 4 include the notation, "50%", which I finally realized meant "finger tighten" or "loose tighten". As I state in the video, you loosely attach the side pieces to the seat bottom, then to the seat back, then you tighten the screws in the base, then tighten them on the back. I'm not a handy person, but I found myself handy enough, assembling this chair. The instructions were clear, and are language-independent. You do not need to read English or Spanish to understand the instructions. Here are some tips: 1. Unpack and COUNT everything 2. The screws and allen wrench come in a nice plastic card with each compartment numbered. This makes it easy to count the screws in advance. I turned the card over and wrote the screw numbers on the back, then cut openings from the back so that I could remove the correct screws at each step of the process. 3. The wheels were not hard to attach, but you do have to push harder than some people might expect. Even though I'm not strong, I had no problem getting the wheels into their positions. I suspect it will be much harder to remove them if I ever need to replace a wheel. 4. Do be sure that you put the armrests onto the seat bottom so that the front of the armrests (the end without screw holes) properly points to the front of the seat (labeled on the bottom). 5. The "50%" notation in steps 3 and 4 mean to just finger tighten the screws at those steps. You want to be able to adjust the screw in the oblong holes before tightening the screws in steps 5 and 6. Though I don't show myself assembling the chair (I live alone), I have shown the steps that I went through with photos at each step. You can see the video, or you look at the images separately, which I have attached to this video. In addition, if you want all my images in one place, you can find them at the attached link. I am enjoying this chair. Like I said, I put it together by myself, and I'm not a hands-on man. I'm a computer programmer, not a handyman. I think most people with adequate eyesight and at least seven fingers can do a good job assembling this chair. Do NOT pay Amazon for expert assembly.
author: JohnAroundTheCornerReviews
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Easy to assemble and great fit
content: I needed a smaller footprint when I moved my office downstairs. Took a chance and bought this chair. So glad I made this choice. Perfect for the space. It was easy to assemble. I am not mechanical and got it together in little under an hour. Fits great under my new desk. I would buy it again!!
author: Amazon Customer
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Perfect Chair for a Teacher
content: I love my new chair! I am a teacher, so I do not get to sit very often. But, when I do, I want to be comfortable. Before I bought this chair, I used a hard, plastic student chair and my back often ached. I am super excited to add this chair to my classroom. Assembly The assembly took about 15 minutes. It probably would have taken less time if I paid attention to the clearly labeled LEFT and RIGHT on the armrest. All of the parts are labeled, and so were the screws. They even included extra screws. The instructions were also super clear. Comfort This chair is super comfy. The padding in the bottom is super thick, and the back net feels great on my back. The chair is very wide too. Look The chair is very sleek and modern. It doesen't look like an office chair that you you would find in a old stuffy office. Durability I don't know how they managed to make a chair that is durable and comfortable, but they did, somehow. I think this will last for many years!
author: Ashley
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Good for posture
content: This is a fairly basic chair, but I can't complain for the price. I've noticed that it makes me sit up straight, so it is definitely helping my posture. This is not the chair you want if you enjoy laying back and kicking your feet up. I feel like I'm sitting down to work when I use this chair. Assembly was easy and everything was clearly labeled. The only complaint I have is that the arm rests are stiff, but that may improve with time. Also, it fits under the table top of my desk well. My last chair was too tall for that.
author: thirtyfiftyone
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Love this chair.
content: My old PU office chair finally bit the dust so I looked and looked and looked for a new office chair and finally just randomly picked this chair. I wanted a mesh back as I use one at work. Assembly of the chair was easy and the instructions were easy to follow. It’s comfortable however is just a little smaller than I was expecting compared to some of the chairs I sat on at an office supply store. So far I’ve been satisfied with this chair as it’s only been a day but if you’re looking for a cheap every day chair, this one seems just fine.
author: Stephen
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Strongly recommended
content: Really easy to install. Only a few screws I need to put on. I got another office chair from Ikea. The two aren’t comparable. I like the one I purchase from this seller. Real comfortable, especially final week is coming. It’s like sitting on clouds.
author: Mira Garden
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Easy to assemble and smooth to handle.
content: Very easy to assemble, smooth wheels, works on wooden floors too. Feels good. I use it all the time when I am in front of computer now.
author: Sree
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Easy to Assemble. Comfortable.
content: If you are in the market for a new chair look no further. This chair was extremely easy to assemble, was able to do it in 20 min distracted by my favorite TV show. For a home office this chair is comfortable, leans back just enough however still feels sturdy and secure. This chair gets abused by my children who sit in it constantly to game on the computer and has held up perfectly with no defects. The chair is priced right, easy to assemble, and designed to last - a must buy.

product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

author: Alex
product: Ergonomic Office Chair Lumbar Support Mesh Chair Computer Desk Task Chair with Armrests

title: Pretty nice chair for the money
content: Decent chair especially for the money; Pros: + Soft leather + Great lumbar support + Incredible price for a leather chair with this style Cons: - Chair back only reaches mid-neck for me and I don't have a long torso (I'm 5'11 but torso length is most important for seating height) - Where you sit (the mesh area) is the least padded area of the entire chair, and you can tell if seated for a while - Very minor, but wish they included washers for all the bolts on the bottom so you can torque them down nice and evenly Conclusion: I think you get what you pay for and then some with this chair. It doesnt have the side bolstering or padding that more expensive brands have but if you look at them, this Furmax chair actually has better lumbar support. However, this chair does NOT compete with those chairs IMO because it doesn't have the head support they do, but its a nice looking office chair. Furmax does make a gaming chair as well and the backrest on that one is over 4 inches higher to provide more head/neck support, I wish I got that one instead, but this one is still nice.
author: P. S.
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Good seat, poor assembly/parts & sketchy customer service
content: The chair itself is firm and comfortable, but after 6 months, the arm is loose on a daily basis. I keep the larger sized wrench that came with the seat in my computer desk and pull it out 1-2 times a day to tighten the arm. Additionally, the seat sinks a few inches from the highest position every few hours. It is rather annoying to keep having to fix the chair height and arm. So while the chair is comfortable, the constant adjustments are too much to earn a higher rating than 2/5 stars. Edit: After posting this review, the seller contacted me via text message saying they would refund me the full price of the chair if I changed my review to be based off their customer service instead of the chair itself. I agreed, thinking this was fair since the chair was not great (as mentioned above). However, the seller then only refunded me 50% of the cost and said I would have to DELETE my review to get the other half! Unbelievable. I contacted Amazon right away and they assured me I would get the full refund. I'm now changing my review to 1* after this horrible experience.
author: Alexander Phillips
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Satisfied
content: Super easy to assembly, probably less than 15 minutes. Firm and sturdy. I do not like some chairs that loose their firmness shortly. This one looks can last long. The back part is high which can hold my head when I am tired. Generally, satisfied for the price and quality!
author: ben
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: comfy but already peeling
content: The chair took some doing to assemble for one person but it's been sturdy enough and rolls easily on low pile carpet. It's comfortable enough to sit in all day and wide enough for me to tuck a leg under, which is nice. However, even though I've only owned the chair for two months, the material of the seat is already splitting and peeling. UPDATE: Not 3hrs after leaving the review, I was contacted by the seller, where they offered me a $30 refund to change this review to 5 stars. I feel that this is dishonest business and it casts doubt on the truth of other 5 star reviews on this product. UPDATE 4/7/2018: Not only is the chair peeling EXTENSIVELY now, but the gas cylinder that raises and lowers the chair has stopped functioning. The seller (Furmax) has not stopped pestering me to change my review to 5 stars.
author: Astor
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Excellent chair
content: I had been using a cheap Target computer chair for a few months, since my old good-quality chair had finally given out after years of service and I didn't have the money to replace it with another good-quality model. I work at my computer for 8+ hours a day, so sitting in that chair without back support was causing me a lot of pain. I browsed around on Amazon for a few days, comparing different chairs. Overall, this one had the best reviews, so I took the plunge and ordered it. Two days later, this beauty was sitting on my front porch waiting to be assembled. Assembly: Super easy. There were MAYBE 5 steps to put it all together. All of the pieces were in the box and none of the pieces, including the actual chair part, were damaged or malformed in any way. Aesthetics: This is a nice-looking chair. The materials seem to be high-quality; no funky leather-ish smell at all either. It goes really well with my black computer monitor, black speakers, black desk, black computer, etc. Functional quality: This chair swivels and glides smoothly across the floor. The raise/lower lever doesn't stick, and the chair doesn't lower over time under my weight. I'm 5'8 and 260 lbs for reference, so it seems to be a pretty sturdy chair. It's not a tight fit when I sit down either; the seat itself is decently wide and deep. The back of the chair is sturdy yet forgiving- it's not like sitting against a brick wall, but it provides nice back support. The top of the back comes up to my ears (again, I'm 5'8 for reference). Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend this office chair to anyone who needs a comfortable, ergonomically supportive chair.
author: Noneya
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: It was great for 1 week with nice lower back support
content: It was great for 1 week with nice lower back support, but now the chair is just lowering on its own without any input...we even had this professionally assembled by Furmax...Unclear what the problem is, we've tried to tighten screws but it just keeps going down to the floor...
author: firefly
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: 5 star
content: A very comfortable chair overall. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Nicely padded seat, back and arms.. I would certainly not hesitate to purchase it again or recommend it to others.
author: lucky man
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: It may look like a great value, but don't waste your money.
content: ***UPDATE*** Okay, so after just 4 months this chair completely fell apart. Sometimes, it's not just about the price tag. The price tag is often an indicator of a product made with weak materials and, in just four months, this chair proved to be a complete waste of money. ***ORIGINAL REVIEW*** Amazing value. I only bought this after going to office depot and seeing how expensive their selection was. I thought it would be a time saver to buy in person rather than having to wait for shipping, but my order came within 3 business days. It was extremely easy to set up and boy is this chair comfortable. It is wide enough for larger people like myself and has lots of cushion. Really really happy with the purchase.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Item was fine for the price
content: Item was fine for the price, decent quality material and pretty comfortable. But my reason for such a low review is due to problems with the product and bad support team from the seller. I had it for 3 months and already had problems with the gas lift, they sent another one and I replaced it and that one is also messing up. I asked for the whole thing to be replaced since its clearly a manufactured problem with the gas lifts I assume, but since I was over the days I couldnt get a replacement. Just a gas lift sent to me. I take very good care of all of my things so its not a problem on my end. Unfortunately there is nothing else I can do about this chair messing up. I would not recommend this chair to anyone, you're probably better off spending a bit more money to make sure you are getting a quality chair.
author: Mauro Duran
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Best posture I've ever had!
content: I bought this to replace an old desk chair that I've had for years, and my back feels SO much better! This is the first computer chair I've had that feels actually comfortable, including all the chairs I've used at the office. I've never had good posture sitting at a computer, and I always catch myself slouching or leaning too far forward, but with this chair it's effortless. I'm surprised by how great this chair is for such a reasonable price! With that being said, because it's in a lower price tier, it doesn't have all the bells and whistles you might expect. You can't adjust the seat depth, the armrests, the back height, etc....really you only get to raise/lower the seat and switch between rocking (it doesn't rock very far) and non-rocking. It would be nice to be able to adjust the height of the back a little bit, but I'm okay with not having that option. The material is faux-leather and it has a bit of a chemical smell right out of the box, but it fades quickly. It looks great and appears to be put together pretty well--not perfect, but well enough that you won't notice if you aren't paying attention. Assembly was very simple, with easy-to-read instructions and no additional tools required. It would be a little easier to assemble with two people, but I managed just fine on my own.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Furmax Office Desk Leather Gaming, High Back Ergonomic Adjustable Racing Task Swivel Executive Computer Chair Headrest and Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Nice and comfortable.
content: I usually spend 6 hours in my office to do my business work. My back hurts lots. Lately I bought this new chair. I can’t believe how comfortable it is. The seat is harder than the one I bought before. And it’s easy to adjust. Price is good too. Recommend to all. Like the hard surface. Nice.
author: Shao
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Very comfortable office chair with a good price
content: This chair is very comfortable where the back support, seat pad and handles are all very soft. I bought this chair to replace my IKEA chair which is harder and causes pain when I sat in it for long. As a programmer who sits on his chair all day, I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
author: Eli
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: High quality with low price
content: I just got my chair today, and this office chair has high quality at low price. I spent over 300 dollars on my last office chair at the office depot, and this one almost has the same quality and comfort level. The design of this chair very matches body mechanics, and it only costs like 100 bucks!!!! The instruction is very clear, and installation is easy. I like this chair very much!!! It is a good experience for me!
author: YING DAI
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: comfortable chair
content: looks good, easy to assemble, be ware that many of the parts are inside the back of the chair.
author: Leohan
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Comfortable with good back support
content: I was sent home to work remotely.  I feel glade that I found this office chair.  It has good back support and smooth roller.  There is also a  rocking function of 90 to 110 degree. It has good back and head support because of the thick headrest.  The seat cushion is also double padded.  Therefore, sitting here 8 hours straight makes me very comfortable. Thanks to this office chair. As a new work from home folks, this is a nice find. Very happy
author: JCT886
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Love it!
content: Got this product because I needed a comfortable chair in my room.  It was very easy to assemble! Didn’t even take me long to assemble them, but before you assemble them make sure you read the instructions notes and take out the parts from the back of the chair.  I thought I was missing parts but they were all in the back of the chair!  The chair is so comfortable and the leather is very soft.  Overall I love this products!
author: yang G
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Easy installation and high quality low price. It worth!
content: After summer break gone. My son had online classes for the new grade. So we need a new high chair for him because the regular seat for him was tonight for his ass lol.  So I buy this cause it was very easy to installation.  All the part was inside the back of chair.  This is so funny cause I think the part was missing. Lol. I just spend 15 minutes to done it follow by the instructions book. It was super easy.  And my son like this soft seat and high level. It was high quality and low price.  So great experience for this product. Awesome!
author: Changlai Zhang
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Comfortable.
content: I have been working from home a lot more recently and decided to invest in a good chair for my "office." This chair has exceeded my expectations! The color is nice. It is soft and comfortable. It only took a few minutes to put together. It is also worth noting that my husband is not a small guy and also found this chair to be roomy/comfortable.
author: cart
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Cant Assemble
content: Ive been chair shopping for awhile, and I was really looking forward to this one. However, I was disappointed once again. Holes dont line up with screws, and there was a small tear in the leather of the back piece. I cant finish putting this together without forcing something. Reached out but no response yet. I just want a replacement piece if possible.
author: Ken
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: A little expensive
content: This chair is worth about fifty dollars and certainly not worth the effort it takes to assemble it. After assembly it feels like a chair that has been used for a few years. The back has more padding than the seat and the seat is very hard and uncomfortable; it also has a slight. I think this will be the last online chair I buy.  Had it been fifty dollars less I would have given it four stars.
author: Stephanie
product: High Back Office Chair - Executive Bonded Leather Computer Desk Swivel Task Chair W/Rocking Function, Black

title: Modern, Comfortable, Sturdy Chair!
content: This chair is very modern and really makes the old black desk chairs “a thing of the past.”  As you’ll see in the photos, the gray chair ties in nicely with gray painted walls. The five caster wheels are held in or place under a solidly-welded base support frame. The arms and chair back frame are a heavy grade plastic. I’m 250 lbs and feel like this chair could support someone much heavier than myself. The lever to raise and lower the chair works perfectly and locks into place when not using that function. I love the comfortable mesh chair back, and the seat cushion has a really nice dense foam padding that makes sitting in it for long periods very easy. I bought this chair to go with a desk I’m going to build, and will use the chair to measure the perfect height for my needs, but it does seem like it raises and lowers to average desk/table heights. The chair took 15 minutes to put together and the instructions were simple and clear. I’d recommend taking a couple minutes to uncover and lay out all the components and hardware to make assembly faster. The box this chair was shipped in was not much wider than the chair base, but the components were packed well and the chair is really a great average desk chair size.
author: Doc Ock
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Super happy with this so far!
content: So I ordered this chair because my office is closed which means everyone is working from home due to Coronavirus. My old chair was so uncomfy with no support and no real cushion in the seat. This chair arrived during my 1 hour lunch break and I was able to assemble it with my boyfriend in less than 30 minutes. It was super simple! I've been working in it for a few hours now and am very happy with it so far. Great design, seems super sturdy and it looks good! The lumbar support is perfect and I love that you can adjust the tension for leaning back. The wheels roll very smoothly and the height adjustment seems perfectly adequate. For the cost, the chair is a steal! Overall very satisfied with this purchase and believe it will improve my quality of life while working from home. If anything changes, I'll update my review.
author: Austin Kienbusch
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Nice affordable chair
content: Got the chair and it was super easy to assemble. All the parts were included and neatly packaged. For the chair, it has all the standard features of an office chair (raise/lower, lock/unlock to lean. The mesh seat is surprisingly comfortable. The only negatives is the plastic armrests are a bit too low not adjustable. This chair is perfect for my desk I'm about to buy. For the price of $70, it's a nice chair.
author: Paul Lee
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: a stylish and affordable chair for my new makeshift home office
content: now that I'm working from home, I needed to upgrade my work setup. this chair was a good match for my white / grey decor and is much more comfortable than my dining chairs to do computer work. the back is well supported by mesh and the chair can rock back easily. the back is in a fixed position, so it is not adjustable for different heights, but the fit is still comfortable. I am a little nervous if food will get stuck in the cushion and mesh, so I'll probably have to vacuum it regularly to keep it fresh looking. the chair is easy to assemble, and there are clear instructions to part way screw the screws then completely screw them, so that it is evenly tightened. I'm thinking about getting another chair for a different room in my home.
author: GWNY
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Easily assembled, comfortable to sit in
content: Nice, comfortable office chair. Easy to assemble. It only took us about 15 minutes to put it together. Doesn't lose height after only a few minutes like other chairs do. This is one that you set it to the height you want and forget it. I sit in this chair daily for up to12 hours at a time while I'm working, and I'm comfortable for the duration. Because of its design, I'm not having to change positions alot to remain comfortable.
author: Meanmommy
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: I absolutely love my chair
content: In the process of making my office and I had an old chair that was making my back hurt but this chair has a nice back shape to it that has helped a lot as well as the adjustment for height it can go up a good amount but since my desk is on the short side it’s also perfect
author: Javi Lira
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Good quality at an affordable price
content: Comfortable and affordable!  It was easy to install with clear instructions. We needed more office furniture since we work from home now. We stumbled across this chair and decided to buy it since it seemed comfortable and was really affordable. This chair did not disappoint. Lastly, it looks really nice and not like a typical office chair you get from Staples. Great purchase for our home
author: Sheryl
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Nicely packaged and easily assembled
content: Very well packaged to prevent damage. Once all items were unpackaged, it took an average of 20 minutes (using the provided manual wrench) to assemble each chair (two were ordered). Very easy steps with just pictorials, no wording. Note: the 50% reference means to NOT tighten the screws all the way to allow for adjustments. I purchased these chairs for my kids due to the new online schooling adventure. Very happy with the results at a reasonable price.
author: Leticia Triana
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: It’s base is too smooth and back support is really awesome. It is great full for support
content: This chair is too good. I never seen such a smooth mesh, it is good to move on my carpet too. Easy to fix it, with in 5 minutes I assembled all the parts. That’s the good chair I ever bought
author: sainath raavi
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: An office chair with great support.
content: Pros 1. Easy setup. It took me maybe 5 minutes at most. Instructions are clear. 2. All functions work great. I like the amazing lower back support! Compared to some office chairs this was build for 100% support and helps correct your position. 3. Modern and simple design. Cons: 1. I am a petite girl and this fits me perfectly. However if you prefer a spacious chair the size is a bit small. Update : I had to change this to a 2 star due to the chair breaking! The adjusting function no longer locks so we cannot change the height. Update 2: customer service reached out and helped me figure it out. Very professional and helpful. My concerns were resolved. For that, this deserves 5 stars.
author: Phoebe
product: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair Computer Task Chair Mesh with Armrests Mid-Back for Home Office Conference Study Room, Gray

title: Solution to the weird front tilt issue
content: Ordered this chair after reading so many good reviews. The chair is durable, moves well, and is fairly comfortable. Unfortunately the chair does not recline so take that into account when purchasing this chair. The one big issue I had was that it kept tilting forward when I sat in it. On the bottom of the chair is a circular "tilt tension" mechanism (see the photo). Turn it tightly to the right to increase the tension and the chair will tilt less. I wish this was somewhere in the instruction manual but happy I found this solution. Hope this helps some of you. Update: Also found out when I put together the chair I put on the bottom attachment backwards. Make sure the tilt tension mechanism thing is facing the front of the seat. This helped fix the tilting problem I was having in addition to the tilt tension fix.
author: Harry S.
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Was good, then bad
content: Good so far.  Not difficult to put together, outer packaging was trashed when I received the product, but everything inside was in good shape.  Seat is a bit tight, so if you are bigger bodied it might not be the right fit as the arms are not adjustable. Edit - on 11/26/2018 this chair exploded on me today while sitting in it.  Never gave any signs of failure, but now is in multiple pieces. Two wheels broke simultaneously today leaving me in a heap of chair parts on the floor.
author: Zach Abrams
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: More Than What I Bargained For
content: Is this forreal? For under $40? Lol. I honestly didn't know what to expect. All I knew is that I did not want just any kind of chair. I currently have 3 office-style chairs in my house that each sit at a desk. There are also a lot of fantastic, high-end, expensive desk chairs at my job that I work from. The three chairs at my home are just ok, with only one giving an overall sense of satisfaction. The ones at my job are exclusive and really comfortable to sit in. None of them are leather by the way. I happen to not be a fan of leather chairs and couches. They tend to be bulky, rough, and not so pleasant to sit in for long periods of time. I didn't want that for my new desk space. I searched endlessly and tirelessly online for what I hoped to be a lasting chair that would provide ease, comfort, relaxation, durability, and bolstering. This chair by Furmax gets a 5/5 in every category. It took me just about 25 minutes to assemble (which is only because I'm not much of a handy tool guy). I'd say this chair takes 15 minutes tops to assemble when done precisely and correctly. The moment I sat in it, I was instantly relieved of any doubt or speculation that it wouldn't be of long-term use for me. The seat itself, which you can see in the pics, is large, plush, and incredibly comfortable to sit on! I'm pleased every time I sit in it. I wondered if the handles would be hard when I was purchasing it, but they are actually totally relaxing while being firm enough to hold and lean on. The chair's back is quality at its finest with ultimate back support. Seating adjustment with the lever is as simple and easy as it gets, and the height just right!  The wheels move smoothly and easily across my hardwood floor with absolutely no means of scratching or denting it. This chair is total finesse! I wholeheartedly recommend it to you. It is the best of all my home desk chairs, and can even compete with the best of the high end office chairs at my job. For the price it is superb! Your entire body will appreciate you getting it this chair. Lol!!! What an awesome Furmax product. Happy buying!
author: E. Davis
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: This is a very good chair. For the money it is nearly unbelievable
content: I’ve had it for just a couple days but want to add my positive review to the others. This is a very good chair. For the money it is nearly unbelievable. I assembled it quickly, although the directions weren’t of much use. I found it quite comfortable, exceeding my expectations by a wide margin. Some reviewers complained that it is narrow across their thighs. I’m 5’10,165 lbs and it fits me perfectly, although I suppose I can see that this might be a problem for some. It is constructed out of materials of good quality. The plastic and cloth feel substantial. The hardware is of good quality. The engineering is superior. One reviewer claimed the arm rests came off when he stood up. Unless it was not assembled, this is impossible. It is a solid piece of furniture. But, it’s not a $500 office chair. I had one of those once and this one is as comfortable but there are differences. But this chair would be an excellent choice for most office situations.
author: W. Walsh
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: La mejor silla de rodamiento y apoyo lumbar. Suave, práctica y  ¡muy buen precio!
content: Furmax Office Chair Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Chair, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black) «Cuando pasas muchas horas frente a la computadora quieres una silla que te haga sentir cómoda y te alivie el dolor del peso en las caderas. Después de muchos intentos de búsqueda, decidí que tal vez fuera esta, la silla apropiada para cumplir tal misión. La esperé con ansias y cuando llegó, inmediatamente tomé acción y comenzamos a armarla.  Fue un poco tedioso el proceso, porque el instructivo no está muy claro. Puedo decir, después de más de 30 días de uso, que la Furmax Office Chair Mid Back Swivel Lumbar... cumplió su cometido». * Tiene gran poder de deslizamiento. Me desplazo muchas veces de un lugar a otro dentro del espacio que ocupan mis dos escritorios. *Mi espalda agradece realmente, el ángulo de las mayas. Puedo estirarme cual soy sin ningún problema, por dos razones: una, el respaldar cede con el movimiento haciendo grato el hecho de recostarme a él y dos; la suavidad de la maya es muy cómoda. *Después de armarla, la medida del ancho del cojín es de 18.5 pulgadas. Mi esposo pesa 240 libras y le ajusta perfectamente bien, aunque sus muslos tocan los apoya brazos. Yo peso 195 libras y el asiento es holgado, quedando aproximadamente pulgada y media libre en ambos lados, en dirección al exterior (Hacia los apoya brazos) *Recomiendo: 1- Los apoyabrazos, pudieran ser ajustables. Para mi gusto, están bajos. 2- Un cojín lizo. La tela original se impregna en la piel cuando estas muchas horas en contacto directo sobre ella.
author: Tabarito
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Pretty Much A waste Of Money Loved it for about two weeks then nope
content: Pretty much a waste of money, worked for about two weeks and I loved it but it doesn't keep the height and the piston constantly goes down while I am working, tried to get in contact with the people who made it and there was no way to get in touch with it. Would not recommend in the least.
author: Rivers Whitmire
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Chair is very sturdy and was easy to assemble
content: Chair is very sturdy and was easy to assemble! Only reason it’s not getting a 5 star is because it’s a little tight in my thigh area, and when I read previous reviews about this chair it was made very clear that it was spacious for such area. However they fail to mention that the arm rest is screwed from under the seat of the chair therefore it takes away that extra space for people with wider thighs such as myself! But overall, I’m happy it’s sturdy and have great back support. I’ll just have to sit with my thighs a little closer than expected when sitting in this chair, lol!
author: Ted Nelson
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Broke in 1 week - Cheaply made but ok for the price so far...let post is not well designed
content: Updated - within a week my son sat and the back broke and he fell backwards hurting his back.  Doctor says it is just a bad bruise and no broken bone thank goodness.  Tried to contact seller with amazon help to send pictures asking for an email .  Didn’t get and email .  Amazon asked again and they said for me to send the pics via Chatbox on PC .  I don’t know what that is and contacted amazon again.  Amazon certified I don’t have access to Chatbox so not sure why seller is delaying this .  Just give me the damn email address so I can send you the pictures of the damages .  Amazon is on the line now disputing this and filing a claim on my behalf.  So frustrating with this product and seller . Kind of cheaply made but for the price it’s not bad .  Seat cushion kind of thrown and doesn’t look like it will hold up for too long.  Don’t like the leg as it doesn’t screw on and the chair is left stacked on top of the one leg post without any screws so if you pick it up it will separate into two pieces therefore may cause personal harm if you fall of due to the instability.  Don’t know how long this will  last. Whynter WC-211DZ
author: Michael
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Overall a good chair
content: Nice inexpensive chair. Fairly easy to assemble. They actually give you a long handle hex wrench makes installation a lot easier. The washers are slightly bigger  then the molded plastic holes they are to go in but it doesn't affect the structural Integrity of the chair . Assembled in less than 15 minutes. It is comfortable, rolls around easy, and raises up and down well. I am very satisfied with my purchase
author: Bjlaskey
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: NEGATIVE 1 STAR AT BEST!!! I wish I purchased ANY OTHER chair!
content: The directions were difficult to understand because they were obviously translated poorly from the country where this was made. The pictures with the directions were confusing and unclear as well. I found the sticker that was supposed to be on the front of the seat, but the seat is NOT where I found it at all. Still, I figured it out and got it together. Once I did, I tried it out and found that the up/down mechanism did not work. I was pretty sure I didn't have it reversed, but found no other reason for it to not work. So I took it apart and reversed it, only to find that I had it right the first time. I switched it back and still the chair doesn't go up or down. SO the seat is stuck in a position which is too high for my legs to comfortably reach the floor. I bought this chair because I needed something that would be good for posture and back health, but now I am stuck with the opposite. AS IF THIS WAS NOT BAD ENOUGH... The black plastic from the arm rests has ruined a bunch of my shirts! It comes off when my elbows rub the arm rest or when I rest my arms. I noticed the plastic on my skin too from when I was wearing short sleeves. The black on my elbows came off with soap and water but the clothes are destroyed. . Since I have put duck tape around the arm rests so that I can make do with this "PIECE OF JUNK" until such time when I can buy something else. If you are someone who does not have money to throw away, BE WARNED! Obviously, there are some positive reviews, but why take a chance that you will be stuck the way that I am?
author: AmyCatD
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

Don’t like the leg as it doesn’t screw on and the chair is left stacked on top of the one leg post without any screws so if you pick it up it will separate into two pieces therefore may cause personal harm if you fall of due to the instability.  Don’t know how long this will  last. Whynter WC-211DZ

title: Overall a good chair
content: Nice inexpensive chair. Fairly easy to assemble. They actually give you a long handle hex wrench makes installation a lot easier. The washers are slightly bigger  then the molded plastic holes they are to go in but it doesn't affect the structural Integrity of the chair . Assembled in less than 15 minutes. It is comfortable, rolls around easy, and raises up and down well. I am very satisfied with my purchase
author: Bjlaskey
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: NEGATIVE 1 STAR AT BEST!!! I wish I purchased ANY OTHER chair!
content: The directions were difficult to understand because they were obviously translated poorly from the country where this was made. The pictures with the directions were confusing and unclear as well. I found the sticker that was supposed to be on the front of the seat, but the seat is NOT where I found it at all. Still, I figured it out and got it together. Once I did, I tried it out and found that the up/down mechanism did not work. I was pretty sure I didn't have it reversed, but found no other reason for it to not work. So I took it apart and reversed it, only to find that I had it right the first time. I switched it back and still the chair doesn't go up or down. SO the seat is stuck in a position which is too high for my legs to comfortably reach the floor. I bought this chair because I needed something that would be good for posture and back health, but now I am stuck with the opposite. AS IF THIS WAS NOT BAD ENOUGH... The black plastic from the arm rests has ruined a bunch of my shirts! It comes off when my elbows rub the arm rest or when I rest my arms. I noticed the plastic on my skin too from when I was wearing short sleeves. The black on my elbows came off with soap and water but the clothes are destroyed. . Since I have put duck tape around the arm rests so that I can make do with this "PIECE OF JUNK" until such time when I can buy something else. If you are someone who does not have money to throw away, BE WARNED! Obviously, there are some positive reviews, but why take a chance that you will be stuck the way that I am?
author: AmyCatD
product: Furmax Office Mid Back Swivel Lumbar Support Desk, Computer Ergonomic Mesh Chair with Armrest (Black)

title: Nice chair for the money
content: I purchased this chair for working from home during the Covid era. Over the past five months, I've tried numerous chairs I already owned, and none were cutting it. I've used this chair for approximately 30 hours now and am, so far, happy with it. The chair was relatively easy to assemble except for two of the wheels, which were UNBELIEVABLY  difficult to snap into place (but the other wheels were fine). It took about 20 minutes to assemble the chair (after I fought with the wheels for two hours, that is!). The chair is comfortable,  with a nicely-padded seat, flip-up armrests, and a mesh back. It is easy to adjust the height, as well.

title: Just buy it!
content: Buy this chair now! I'm doing to do my best to be as concise as possible and refrain from going on an endless rant about how much I love this chair.What I'm going to do instead is accurately and thoroughly review this marvel of modern engineering. First I'd like to tell you a little bit about myself. I'm a 6 foot tall 250 pound military member with previous surgery on L5S1 which has left me with nerve pain every day of my life as well as problems on three other levels of my spine. Generally chairs aren't designed to seat a person of my stature and won't last very long. I require a chair that's very sturdy, adjustable and ergonomic. The box came, overjoyed I struggled to lift it into my apartment. The first thing I noticed was the weight of the box. It gave me a sense of assurance in knowing that I bought quality. The Hardware felt to be of good manufacturing. Also I received double the hardware necessary to assemble the chair. I LOVE EXTRA HARDWARE. The instructions were very well illustrated and the chair built in minutes. One thing that I really appreciated was the way adjustments were engineered into the design of the chair. While assembling you can adjust the width of the arm rests. Once the bolts are tightened down your arm rests will only adjust up and down. Another adjustment built into the chairs construction is controlling the distance from the seat to the back rest. This is generally only a feature on higher end chairs and I was happy to see that is has quite a bit of range. The roller blade wheels are amazing! My apartment has tile floor and my old terrible chair struggled to move anywhere, often getting tiny wheels stuck in the grooves of the tile. It generally made navigating chasms of my unorganized room clumsy and difficult. With these rollerblade wheels I can glide from one end of the room to the other. Its effortless, I love it. The mesh feels very comfortable and breathable. The lumbar support is amazing. I nearly fell asleep the moment I sat in this. The lever that allows the chair to tilt back or sit straight up is the kind of lever that you push down or pull up. This is very good because some other chairs have a lever that's essentially a bar that you slide horizontally. Over time the bar can work its way out so when you go to sit back in your chair the lever pops out and the char sends you flying backward. This has happened to me at least fifty or sixty times and I have ended up on the ground as a result of this. The design of the seat back lever of prevents this from happening. This chair is so comfortable that I felt the need to write this review as soon as I sat down. Already my back feels better, my nerve pain is reduced.  I had been sitting on a broken chair for over a year and a half until I noticed the amount of discomfort I was ignoring and pulled the trigger on this. I will update this review if anything changes or the chair fails over time.
author: George
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: A Review For Shorties
content: I recently began working from home 4 days a week, and needed a good chair at a reasonable price.  Being only 5' tall, I'm always nervous about the fit of chairs.  For one, the headrest.  Almost all headrests are too high for me, and just basically push my head forward. I was pleasantly surprised to find that when lowered all the way, this one actually fits me perfectly! It also adjust to much higher for those of you who aren't as vertically challenged.  I love that not only does it adjust up and down, but also the angle of it adjusts, so it truly fits just right. That being said, if you're mostly using this to work, like I am, the headrest may not even matter that much, as I'm usually sitting up straight. Still it is nice when I want to lean back. Next is the lumbar support- lack of support can be a nightmare for lower back issues. It's great, and really extends quite a ways in, also good when you're short and can't always sit as deeply into a seat. On that note, that's one thing I wish was adjustable- the depth of the seat. You can't change that or move it in and out, but to be honest for that kind of customization, you're usually looking at a far more expensive chair, so again, the lumbar support helps a little with that. The other thing I wish could adjust just a TINY bit more is the height of the seat. At the lowest, while sitting all the way back, the balls of my feet rest comfortably on the floor, but not my full foot flat. To be fair, I'm working at home, so usually barefoot. If I had even a slight heel on, or even a thick athletic shoe, it would probably be fine. Just wish I could lower the seat by maybe one more inch. The wheels don't roll very easily on carpet unless they are at the right angle, kinda like a shopping cart has to have its wheels just right, but if I get a protective mat, which I probably should anyway, it would move much more easily. Glides across hard floors with no issue at all, and I haven't found it to be a big deal on carpet, honestly. It was easy to put together, and feels very sturdy. All in all, this is a great chair for ALL heights, even us shorties, and I'm very pleased for the price with what I got.

content: Wow what can I say! I wanted a $800 Hermon Miller for the longest time but it was simply not in the budget. I work from home 4 days a week 10 hours a day. Old chair was no longer cutting it anymore. I am 6 ft tall and heavy. I was impressed with the quality of this chair. For the price it simply cant be beat. The casters and base are metal and the rest of this chair fit and finish is spot on. Its also very comfortable. The armrest width, height, Head reset, back rest support just perfect! Everything! Feels nice and solid. If you are considering a high end chair costing $300+. Save your money and try this baby out first! Along with everything else I mentioned it also comes with a 90 day in-home guarantee. If you try it and your not completely satisfied they will refund your money!!!
author: John J. Mc Laughlin
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: ADJUST YOURSELF TO ONE OF THE MOST COMFORTABLE OFFICE CHAIRS I HAVE EVER SAT IN!!!
content: When I decided I needed an office chair for my home office I went to Amazon and started looking. I looked at some 15-20 different office chair, drafting chairs and others. Read about 50 reviews to see what people liked and didn’t like. It was helpful in considering what I needed for a bad back. I finally chose this Duramont Ergonomic model. I could not be happier. The adjustable lumbar support was a clincher in deciding to buy it. The other features I liked was the ability to adjust so many features of the chair. The arm rests move up and down with the push of a button when the chair is set up. I also liked that they could be moved forward and backwards as well as closer together (narrow the width). While these adjustments requires some after assembly screw loosening adjustments they are very easy to make (don’t overtighten the screws when attaching the armrests to the seat). The other adjustments that can be made include the angle of the seat back, the tension it takes to move the seat back, the height of the seat, the height and fit of the head rest (I wasn’t looking for a headrest but glad that the chair has it) and most importantly for people with lower back problems, the placement of the lumbar support. You don’t realize how desirable it is to have all these adjustable features until you finally adjust them and sit in the chair. The chair was a cinch to put together, it took about 30 minutes. Parts were clearly marked, necessary tools were provided, two Allen wrenches. The fit and finish was excellent. It is a quality chair. But the most important consideration is how comfortable it is. One reviewer said he almost fell asleep when he was writing his review. I can see why, it is that comfortable. I wanted mesh for breathability and comfort and this chair has it. I don’t know how long these chairs are supposed to last but my read on quality putting it together indicates it should last a long time. Given all the features I think this chair is well worth the $240 I paid, especially when you look at well known brands like Herman Miller whose chairs sell for $1,000 or so. THIS IS A GREAT VALUE.
author: Dbonds
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: Easy assembly and comfortable
content: As a person with lower back pain due to improper posture, I could really use an ergonomic chair to help me achieve a better sitting position. This chair does just that. I like the adjustment options this chair offers. I love that the headrest can be lowered, raised, tilted or removed. There is a little hex bolt on the headrest that allows you to lock the tilt in place, but I like to keep it a little loose so that it can conform to my seating position. The parts that make up the chair seem to be of good quality. I like the seat. It is soft, yet firm. It is softer than the harder office chairs, but firm enough to support you. The breathable grid-like pattern is also welcomed. There's a little knob that adjusts how much the chair is pushed into your lower back which is just fantastic. No need for a lower back cushion with this chair. The wheels on this chair are rollerblade wheels which I immediately switched out for the caster type wheels as I read this advice from other reviewers. The reason is that the rollerblade wheels work really well on hard surfaces, but no so much on carpet; which I have. Assembly is pretty straightforward - stick in the wheels to the base. Add the hydraulic mount. Add the armrests to the seat and then add the back. Then stick that onto the mount. I recommend getting a box or someone to give you a hand to support the seat when adding the armrests or the back to the seat.

product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: It's the unicorn of office chairs, finally!
content: I'm so happy that I scored this quality chair over the Black Friday weekend.  I've been searching for over a year to replace my old fake leather old home office chair that I've had for almost 20 years.  This ergo chair is very comfortable because it's adjustable all over and has good lumbar support. Assembly was tedious because it comes in a lot of separate parts.  10 minutes to unpack it and cut off all of the protective foam, plastic bags, cardboard wraps, etc. but the chair did arrive fully undamaged so I appreciated the extra caution with the packaging.  The instructions are very clear except for one part about which  arm goes on which side of the seat .  You can't tell from the pic, even though the arms are labeled.  Of course I did it wrong and had to take it all apart and rebuild.  Duh.  Aside from that little glitch, it's easy to build once everything is spread out.  Adjustments are simple and as expected. I'm so impressed with how quiet and solid this chair is, at least for now.  I'm a big guy (6'1" and 275 lbs) and this thing is so supportive and doesn't feel like it's going to buckle or anything.  I like the mesh back so it doesn't get hot.  The seat cushion is a bit firm honestly, but supportive.  Strong mechanism for tilt/rock and the casters are like those clear plastic old rollerblade wheels.  They roll decently even on bare carpet. A headrest was a must.  I sit at a computer for hours at a time for work, and leaning back with the ability to rest my head and neck is necessary.  This chair has an adjustable height/tilt headrest that is great.  I thought I was going to have to buy another leather chair again with a high back like those executive ones.  Nope. Arm rests are supportive and padded so they are easy on the elbows.  Good sturdy height adjustments too, so my hands line up perfect with the keyboard on my taller desk so my wrists don't ache. Overall, this chair is built very well and it's very supportive for us desk jockeys.  It doesn't squeak or rattle or feel like it's going to tip or break.  I'm so happy I finally found my office chair unicorn.
author: Mudhole
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: This is a great buy
content: So about a month ago I had to start working from home and decided to set up a mini home office for myself. As for the chair, I wanted something comfortable but not too expensive so I bought the AmazonBasics chair and what a horrible experience it was.  When seated with good straight posture, the lower frame of the backrest is the first portion to make contact with my back. In order to use the backrest without the bar pressing into my back, I must use a pillow to help bridge the gap or sit slouched back. And cushions are not comfortable at all. This time, I figured I a bit pay more and treat myself and my back well. So I found Duramont ergonomic adjustable chair and let me tell you something: IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY. It is easy to assemble, really comfortable and great back support. I am super happy with my purchase and definitely suggest it to anyone looking for an extra comfortable chair with a reasonable price. You really want to spend a bit extra on a good chair so you do not end up with neck-ache or backache later on (which happened to me after using previous chair for only 1 week).

content: After weeks of sitting in a office chair that was broken and almost on the ground entirely, I would’ve taken almost any seat that was in better condition. However, this office chair is far better than I would have expected. I’m a pretty heavy set guy and like heavy duty things. When the box arrived and I popped it open, I was surprised to find a very strong, heavy duty and durable chair, (in pieces, but half the fun is putting it together, lol). After assembling the chair, I sit down and test it, afraid that I might break it, (I’m that heavy). But, to my surprise yet again, I can feel the weight of the materials used in its construction, and for the first time I don’t feel like I’m gonna break my chair. I highly recommend this product to anyone that has the same fears as I. The price might be up there, but it’s worth it.

title: Great quality chair for the price!!!
content: Wow what can I say! I wanted a $800 Hermon Miller for the longest time but it was simply not in the budget. I work from home 4 days a week 10 hours a day. Old chair was no longer cutting it anymore. I am 6 ft tall and heavy. I was impressed with the quality of this chair. For the price it simply cant be beat. The casters and base are metal and the rest of this chair fit and finish is spot on. Its also very comfortable. The armrest width, height, Head reset, back rest support just perfect! Everything! Feels nice and solid. If you are considering a high end chair costing $300+. Save your money and try this baby out first! Along with everything else I mentioned it also comes with a 90 day in-home guarantee. If you try it and your not completely satisfied they will refund your money!!!
author: John J. Mc Laughlin
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: ADJUST YOURSELF TO ONE OF THE MOST COMFORTABLE OFFICE CHAIRS I HAVE EVER SAT IN!!!
content: When I decided I needed an office chair for my home office I went to Amazon and started looking. I looked at some 15-20 different office chair, drafting chairs and others. Read about 50 reviews to see what people liked and didn’t like. It was helpful in considering what I needed for a bad back. I finally chose this Duramont Ergonomic model. I could not be happier. The adjustable lumbar support was a clincher in deciding to buy it. The other features I liked was the ability to adjust so many features of the chair. The arm rests move up and down with the push of a button when the chair is set up. I also liked that they could be moved forward and backwards as well as closer together (narrow the width). While these adjustments requires some after assembly screw loosening adjustments they are very easy to make (don’t overtighten the screws when attaching the armrests to the seat). The other adjustments that can be made include the angle of the seat back, the tension it takes to move the seat back, the height of the seat, the height and fit of the head rest (I wasn’t looking for a headrest but glad that the chair has it) and most importantly for people with lower back problems, the placement of the lumbar support. You don’t realize how desirable it is to have all these adjustable features until you finally adjust them and sit in the chair. The chair was a cinch to put together, it took about 30 minutes. Parts were clearly marked, necessary tools were provided, two Allen wrenches. The fit and finish was excellent. It is a quality chair. But the most important consideration is how comfortable it is. One reviewer said he almost fell asleep when he was writing his review. I can see why, it is that comfortable. I wanted mesh for breathability and comfort and this chair has it. I don’t know how long these chairs are supposed to last but my read on quality putting it together indicates it should last a long time. Given all the features I think this chair is well worth the $240 I paid, especially when you look at well known brands like Herman Miller whose chairs sell for $1,000 or so. THIS IS A GREAT VALUE.
author: Dbonds
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: Easy assembly and comfortable
content: As a person with lower back pain due to improper posture, I could really use an ergonomic chair to help me achieve a better sitting position. This chair does just that. I like the adjustment options this chair offers. I love that the headrest can be lowered, raised, tilted or removed. There is a little hex bolt on the headrest that allows you to lock the tilt in place, but I like to keep it a little loose so that it can conform to my seating position. The parts that make up the chair seem to be of good quality. I like the seat. It is soft, yet firm. It is softer than the harder office chairs, but firm enough to support you. The breathable grid-like pattern is also welcomed. There's a little knob that adjusts how much the chair is pushed into your lower back which is just fantastic. No need for a lower back cushion with this chair. The wheels on this chair are rollerblade wheels which I immediately switched out for the caster type wheels as I read this advice from other reviewers. The reason is that the rollerblade wheels work really well on hard surfaces, but no so much on carpet; which I have. Assembly is pretty straightforward - stick in the wheels to the base. Add the hydraulic mount. Add the armrests to the seat and then add the back. Then stick that onto the mount. I recommend getting a box or someone to give you a hand to support the seat when adding the armrests or the back to the seat.
author: Abs
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: Smooth Rolling, Very Comfortable, Ergonomic Office Chair
content: This ergonomic office chair is very comfortable and has a lot of interesting features. Very easy to assemble and only took me 15 min. With my lower back issues, this chair can ease off that pain with a cushon that supports the lower body in which is also adjustable. And if you like to move around the area with your chair, the rollerblade wheels are easy to glide with on hard and carpeted services. This is moy first time spending this much on an office chair and I am glad I dd. For something that I use a lot, I believe this is going to last a long time due to it durableness.
author: Brian Owens
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: It's the unicorn of office chairs, finally!
content: I'm so happy that I scored this quality chair over the Black Friday weekend.  I've been searching for over a year to replace my old fake leather old home office chair that I've had for almost 20 years.  This ergo chair is very comfortable because it's adjustable all over and has good lumbar support. Assembly was tedious because it comes in a lot of separate parts.  10 minutes to unpack it and cut off all of the protective foam, plastic bags, cardboard wraps, etc. but the chair did arrive fully undamaged so I appreciated the extra caution with the packaging.  The instructions are very clear except for one part about which  arm goes on which side of the seat .  You can't tell from the pic, even though the arms are labeled.  Of course I did it wrong and had to take it all apart and rebuild.  Duh.  Aside from that little glitch, it's easy to build once everything is spread out.  Adjustments are simple and as expected. I'm so impressed with how quiet and solid this chair is, at least for now.  I'm a big guy (6'1" and 275 lbs) and this thing is so supportive and doesn't feel like it's going to buckle or anything.  I like the mesh back so it doesn't get hot.  The seat cushion is a bit firm honestly, but supportive.  Strong mechanism for tilt/rock and the casters are like those clear plastic old rollerblade wheels.  They roll decently even on bare carpet. A headrest was a must.  I sit at a computer for hours at a time for work, and leaning back with the ability to rest my head and neck is necessary.  This chair has an adjustable height/tilt headrest that is great.  I thought I was going to have to buy another leather chair again with a high back like those executive ones.  Nope. Arm rests are supportive and padded so they are easy on the elbows.  Good sturdy height adjustments too, so my hands line up perfect with the keyboard on my taller desk so my wrists don't ache. Overall, this chair is built very well and it's very supportive for us desk jockeys.  It doesn't squeak or rattle or feel like it's going to tip or break.  I'm so happy I finally found my office chair unicorn.
author: Mudhole
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: This is a great buy
content: So about a month ago I had to start working from home and decided to set up a mini home office for myself. As for the chair, I wanted something comfortable but not too expensive so I bought the AmazonBasics chair and what a horrible experience it was.  When seated with good straight posture, the lower frame of the backrest is the first portion to make contact with my back. In order to use the backrest without the bar pressing into my back, I must use a pillow to help bridge the gap or sit slouched back. And cushions are not comfortable at all. This time, I figured I a bit pay more and treat myself and my back well. So I found Duramont ergonomic adjustable chair and let me tell you something: IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY. It is easy to assemble, really comfortable and great back support. I am super happy with my purchase and definitely suggest it to anyone looking for an extra comfortable chair with a reasonable price. You really want to spend a bit extra on a good chair so you do not end up with neck-ache or backache later on (which happened to me after using previous chair for only 1 week).
author: NimaH
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: Heavy duty craftsmanship, for a heavy duty customer, (lol)
content: After weeks of sitting in a office chair that was broken and almost on the ground entirely, I would’ve taken almost any seat that was in better condition. However, this office chair is far better than I would have expected. I’m a pretty heavy set guy and like heavy duty things. When the box arrived and I popped it open, I was surprised to find a very strong, heavy duty and durable chair, (in pieces, but half the fun is putting it together, lol). After assembling the chair, I sit down and test it, afraid that I might break it, (I’m that heavy). But, to my surprise yet again, I can feel the weight of the materials used in its construction, and for the first time I don’t feel like I’m gonna break my chair. I highly recommend this product to anyone that has the same fears as I. The price might be up there, but it’s worth it.
author: Justin Menor
product: Duramont Ergonomic Adjustable Office Chair with Lumbar Support and Rollerblade Wheels - High Back with Breathable Mesh - Thick Seat Cushion - Adjustable Head & Arm Rests, Seat Height - Reclines

title: Decent, comfortable office chair with a clean look
content: It was time to replace my mother-in-law's years-old office chair that has somewhat become uncomfortable to sit for prolonged periods of time, especially in the hot, California summer months. PROS - Clean, modern look - Comfortable for a typical work week - Mesh backing allows for heat dissipation and molds to the back - Fairly easy to assemble and took about 15 mins to complete - Manual was easy to follow, if you have built chairs before - Pneumatic lift to ease with raising/lowering the height - No additional tools required - Back pressure adjustable via the large, black knob under the seat - Reclines back to about 120 degrees CONS - Caster wheels roll smoothly, but have a slight grinding sound on laminate wood flooring when changing direction (no scratches on the wood, however) - Armrests are not adjustable - Recline lever does not easily lock TIPS - In step 2, you will see a "50%" marking for the "(10)" screws. That means you should only tighten it to about 50% so you can move the sidearms out of the way for step 3 to slide the backrest in. Once the backrest has been secured, step 4 tells you to tighten the "(10)" screws fully to 100% - For step 5, the height adjustment/recline lever should be facing to your RIGHT when the chair is facing forward - For step 6, the seat may not securely stay onto the vertical part of the chair legs until you sit on it and raise the chair up a bit Overall, this is an excellent, modern, clean-looking chair that is breathable and comfortable to sit in. If you found this review helpful, please click the "Helpful" button below to encourage me to write more. Thank you!
author: M. Y. 'Photographer | Tech Pro | Outdoor Enthusiast'
product: Office Chair,Low-Back Mesh Office Computer Swivel Desk Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair Armless

content: What a beautiful chair. It isn’t anything fancy but it does the job. During the installation, I had to remove the back screws of the handles to be able to install the back rest and that was the only hiccup. The installation went really smooth otherwise. Within 15 minutes, I’ve managed to finished the installation. It was quite simple enough that anyone can do it. What I love the most is the color. The gray color matches everything. The seat has enough cushion but not as thick but it doesn’t make me feel uncomfortable. It is comfortable to sit on and moving around in the office. It is a great chair. The back support is there as you can see in the picture. It’s not the greatest but it will do the job. I hope my video will help others to get it install without issues.

title: No more lower back issues. Cool, breathable fabric. Quiet rollers
content: I have lower back issues. Well, I HAD lower back issues. I do not have them anymore. I can sit in the chair for long periods with no after effects. It rolls smoothly and quietly. Its is super comfortable on my back and rear. I like how the fabric breathes-- so it is great for a house with no air conditioning. I wish I could use this in my car now. Took about 25 minutes to assemble by myself. Armrests never bump into the desktop which is a huge plus. Maybe I could replace all my dining room chairs with these...

Its not very wide so not suitable for everyone. * Back is from mesh material and have back lumbar support(not adjustable). * Recline to back holds well. (Adjusting that is little tricky. Pull knob outward and then put back) * Assembly is total 15 mins. No special tool required.
