title: I'm not 'ordinary'
content: The chair is well made, easy to put together, looks nice and is overall a great chair... if you have tiny hips. I don't know of any grown man who would be comfortable in this chair and most average women wouldn't be either. I am tall, but my hips are not very wide, however I can't sit in this chair without both armrests on my hips. It's made the overall comfort decrease by a lot. I thought I would settle and take the arms off, but you can't with this chair or it has no back. Sadly, this will be getting returned.
author: mackenzie perkins
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: I do not recommend this chair
content: Pros: 1. easy to assemble. 2. Fit well in a small space Cons: 1. The back rest fabric is pilling as I lean  against it. 2. The back support is not very sturdy. 3. The chair is very lightweight and has the tendency to tip forward or backward throwing you to the floor. 4. The chair is very squeaky, I can hear each movement I make while sitting in it. 5. I constantly have to be mindful of how delicate the chair is before I sit in it. 6. The seating board is very thin and flimsy so it’s not a good fit for someone on the heavier side.

product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: A great chair for $50 but not more than that.
content: *Carpal Tunnel and Arthritis sufferers use caution. Allen wrenches are convenient but the one included is awkwardly long.* I purchased two of these chairs. The first one I put together as instructed. But I found it really difficult to attach the arms to the cushion with the back already attached. On the second chair I attached the arms to the cushion FIRST then I attached the back. This was much easier for me personally. 4 stars for value because the price jumped from 49.99 to 79.99 within hours. I realize supply and demand with everyone currently scrambling to work from home but this is a $50 chair now priced at $80.
author: Tavi
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: WORST ASSEMBLY EVER
content: It's comfy but it was a NIGHTMARE to assemble. The holes weren't drilled in the right spots, the screws were already worn and they shaved easily. What could have been a 5 minute assemble, turned into over an hour because the screw holes weren't aligned. It looks fine and feels fine now but I know it wont last.
author: Samantha
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Amazing product for its price, buy it.
content: Fast shipping. Ordered on the 12th, came in on the 14th. Comfortable and not bad at all for the price however, I wish it came with better assemble instructions. I had to use a youtube video to help me. Overall, if you’re thinking about getting it..go for it.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Must be smaller to fit chair
content: The chair is serving its purpose for me, I have an extra 1" on each side of chair before the handles - not a lot of space. I am 5'6" and 140 - if you are larger than this I wouldn't recommend this chair you wont fit in it - I would say this would be great for a kids/teenagers desk.  Only worth 50$ as someone else wrote - I think I paid slightly more! But when your desperate for an office chair - it will work for the time.
author: yourinfo
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Not comfortable
content: After sitting for an hour or so, you realize how thin the seat cushion is - not comfortable after a while. I could live with that. A simple hack would be to add a small pillow. What I can’t fix is the arm rest design. The cross section is a “T” shape and therefore a small radius is facing your thighs. It’s hard plastic and not padded so I find this digging into my legs. Furthermore, the arm rest attachment point to the seat is rather far forward, increasing likelihood of touching your thighs. Maybe I can hack with pipe insulation foam? But 2 hacks for a brand new chair? I thought others should know before spending their money. I wouldn’t buy this chair again.  Easy-peasy to assemble though!
author: TomN
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Small seat, narrow and short
content: The chair was fairly easy to assemble, that was a plus. However the seat material is very uncomfortable if you sit in it with shorts or a short dress. The back is not tall enough, the width is too narrow, short and the seat sits lop sided, it leans to the right. If you have wide hips DO NOT PURCHASE. My hips are right on the arm rests. The seat hits in the middle of my leg. I am 5’5” anyone taller would be very uncomfortable. I will try to return the chair.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Great
content: Great for smaller people like myself and my family. I bought for my teenage daughter. She fits in it perfect. For what it is, I'd say it's fairly comfortable. I myself am 5 feet 5 inches weigh in at 160lbs. I fit in the chair perfectly as well. Would not recommend if your obese or taller than 6 feet. Other than that, great buy.
author: Jason Sanchez
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: It is  a basic $60.00 chair, that I hope my daughter can tolerate, for online schooling at home
content: So, first thing first, it is a $60.00 chair.  I just bought a $40.00 repair kit for my other expensive but older chair.  So, I need to put this in perspective. My 12-year-old likes the chair.  Mainly because it’s her chair.  But I can tell that the chair will fail her within the year.  When she sits down the cylinder already starts to compress. The seat cushion, well its not that good either, but it is a $60.00 chair.  I suppose that if someone over 140 lbs. had to use the chair, it would fail withing 45 days. However, It is a $60 dollar chair. After starting the process of writing this review, my other daughter will need a chair soon.  For sure, I will not buy this chair for her.  This purchase is just good enough not to send it back.  It is a basic $60.00 chair, that I hope, my daughter can sit in for 4 to 5 hours of the day.  It is nothing more than that.  So even at its price point it is a 3.5-star rated product at most.  Spend a little more and get a better product. Update, after two days of use, the chair was put in the corner and replaced with another chair that we had in the house.  Rating was changed to two stars..  The chair is just not comfortable.  Too much hassle to take apart to send back....  spend a little more and get a more comfortable product.
author: The Dub
product: Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Armrest Executive Rolling Swivel Adjustable Mid Back Task Chair for Women Adults, Black

title: Good Chair for the Price
content: I got two chairs for replacements for my grown kids computer chairs.  It was easy to assemble. Take note on instructions: Don't completely tighten the screws on the arm rests before you add the back rest.  There's two tabs that slide into slots. You won't be able to get the back part on with the screws tightened. Other than the fact I ignored that, I did figure it out in a few moments. The chair is comfortable to sit on. I agree with some of the other reviews that the arm rests are too low.  All of the computer chairs I've had the arm rests keep you arms about parallel to the desk so typing and moving mouse is fluent. If I jack the chair up to maximum height, it's still a tad shy of this goal. I still gave it 5 stars simply for the fact it's a good chair at a good price and was easy to assemble.  If you're a power computer user who sits at desk up to 8 hours at a time, you might want to think twice on this one.
author: Michael Sharp
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Yes but No at least for me.
content: I like the back piece definitely is comfortable there but the seat itself really hurts the back of my thighs and side of my thighs like a lot. To the point where I am bruising after a day of use. This is less than 8 hours use considering I am working from home this is not comfy for a big girl or big boy. You get me. You got thighs and on the plus side I do not recommend this especially if you don't like your thighs being squeezed. The part of the tushy to front is decent on length but the part closer towards front is not comfy I have a bruise under my left thigh so maybe one of the screws were a bit to far in. The color is great the feel of material is great even shipping great I recommend if your a thinish to a little chubby person that likes a bit extra space not too much may be for you but a bigger person with thighs is a big no no if you want want to safe yourself from pain.
author: Joshua and Alya Garza
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: comfortable home office chair
content: Good value, good-looking chair for my home office "I have read many of the other reviews here. I'm glad I found this reasonable home office chair as an upgrade. I got this chair for my home office since I am having to work full time at home now due to the COVID 19 and the chair at my desk was causing me pain. The instructions are detailed images of each part and how they assemble to each other with the hardware. The hardware comes in a blister pack which clearly identifies the different screws and comes with an Allen wrench. The padding is thick and spongy and the fabric is soft to the touch. Comfortable and has good back support. (I weight like 300) But, probably won’t provide much room for larger people. Overall, I’m very happy with it. I would buy it again if I need a chair for the future."
author: changhwan hong
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Buy warranty
content: The “back support” part broke less than 10 days after assembly. I’m 5’2, 135 lbs. Really disappointed.
author: Maria Juana
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Fantastic chair for this price range
content: I've been using this chair for about 2 weeks now (ever since coronavirus meant I could no longer go into the office) and am really happy with the purchase. I'm 6 foot, and the adjustments are perfect for me. I was getting a lot of back and neck pain using my previous chair and since I've started using this on the daily I haven't had any issues. It's really stylish as well ! Overall really impressed with the quality considering the price range. The chair I use at work goes for $1000+ and to be honest, this chair is comparable in comfort. Assembly took > 15 minutes (very easy) Thanks for the great chair !
author: autobank wholesale mart
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Comfortable and affordable.
content: "I needed a new office chair and ordered this office chair based on previous reviews. I was really excited to replace my other office chair. The chair was well packed, the hardware well organized and assembly instructions clear. The seat is soft fabric material. It is sturdy and offers fine cushion and support. I love the color of this chair as it looks modern! I kind of wish it the chair can be raised higher though. But I really like the color, it blend
author: Jhon Chong
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: I expected it to stay together
content: This chair was hard to assemble you need to people to get it done.  The Alan wrench  just does not get the screws thigh enough. I used and electric star tip screw to tighten and still the screws fall out.  You can actually fill metal in the chair when you sit.  I am very disappointed that the screws will not stay tight.
author: Dale S. Kuehn
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Perfect WFH chair
content: I was holding off purchasing a chair while working from home till I bought my place but the dining chair is just not cutting it for me. I went in every website possible Pottery Barn, West Elm, Wayfair & Overstock. The $$$ prices were just not for me. So searched in AMAZON and lo and behold! I found this chair! It shipped fast by Prime and received it in 3 days! I love the look and comfort of it. I didn't want to choose a standard black chair and decided on the grey and white color perfect for a woman. I was going to give it 4 stars because it took me an hour  to put it together (not the 20 minutes as the ad suggested) but decided to give it the 5 stars because I am really happy with it. Using it for the first time and I highly recommend it!
author: Marivic San Jose
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Comfortable
content: Now that I am working from home I needed a nice chair a lot of the office chairs out there sellers wanted GOLD for. This was affordable and worth the price. I gave it four stars because one of the clips was broken my husband is handy and used and extra screw but it was broken.
author: Robyn R Orvis
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: One Fall and It's Done
content: Most of us have been there: you're leaning back, bored out of you mind sitting at a desk for hours. Suddenly, you lean too far back and the chair tips over. Usually, it's no big deal. With this chair, it had just one fall in it. One fall, and plastic shot out from the back and the entire back snapped off of the little plastic inserts into the arms that hold it together. ONE FALL. Like, I get it, I'm stupid. However, falling in my chair once shouldn't cost me ~$60 because the chair couldn't take it. Honestly, it happens enough, chairs should be designed to take tipping over. It's going to happen.
author: Chris S.
product: NEO CHAIR Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair Lumbar Support Modern Executive Adjustable Rolling Swivel Chair Comfortable Mid Black Task Home Office Chair, Black-Fabric

title: Good value at $100 but could use a few design construction upgrades.
content: This is a great value for essentially the same chair you pay $180 or $250 for at Big Box office stores. There is an issue with the design though. I believe the manufacturer is assembling the inner infrastructure of the chair improperly. After about 6 months the back failed on me. I removed the leather and foam to inspect the issue. There are brackets that are attached to the wood with threaded nuts. This is a sufficient manner to connect the pieces however they have installed them opposite. Meaning the nuts are on the back and/or the bottom and the L brackets are on the top or front. Therefore when you sit or lean back all of the weight holding ability is bearing on the NUTS rather than on the brackets. I disassembled mine. I installed the L bracket under the base and the nuts on the top side. Likewise on the back I put the nuts on the front and the L bracket on the back. This increased the stability and durability of the chair 10 fold. Photos I uploaded show the nut that pulled through the wood and my repair by moving the bracket below. Now after about 11 months the chair is still working great. i find the leather material to be more durable than the office store type chairs. If the manufacturers would switch the process or contact me for more information on the chair engineering I could make this a 5 star review and a great value for a $100 chair.
author: Chris Alexander
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: What a mess
content: 1. Bonded leather didn't last a year, the handles are peeling off as I sit in this chair. 2. Squeaks like crazy, have to reapply some wd-40 every now and then. 3. Foam cushion inserts are so-so. 4. The button inserts and black plastic cover covering the screws on the side comes off periodically. TLDR; get something that doesn't have 'bonded leather' as the material, that and maybe something a bit more reputable.
author: Aaron
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Chair is an epic failure
content: Here is why I am totally upset & disgusted with this "office" chair. First off,, the brown chair does NOT have a pewter colored finished -- it's more of a matte gold. That was the very first thing we noticed as we started unpacking the pieces. This turned out to be just the beginning of our troubles. Secondly, the screws for assembling the chair were too short. Whoever designed this should be doing something else for a living.  We still cannot get the screws to stay tight.  Basically, assembling this thing was a nightmare and we ended up needing THREE people to help finesse the parts into fitting together. Finally, after TWO hours of fighting to get the chair assembled, we stood back to look at our finished product and discovered a small tear in the back of the chair that we never noticed when we unpacked it.  Too late now.  Also, the chair's arms won't stay tight -- they keep loosening up because of the lousy construction design.  The chair is also uncomfortable because we're afraid to lean back in it or sit all the way against the back of it for fear of it falling apart. And finally, the little end caps, that are supposed to hide the screw heads, keep falling off because they weren't manufactured properly. It's too late now to send the chair back. Who wants the hassle of taking this one apart, packing it back up and sending it back? If I could leave this chair zero stars, I would. I'm going to contact Amazon directly about all the issues we had with this product.  I would suggest you pass when it comes to buying this chair until you have read ALL the reviews and viewed the videos that upset buyers posted. I sure wish I had been more diligent before buying it.
author: GoldDustWoman
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Buyer be ware!!!
content: Fabric (fake leather) does not hold up with normal use.  Mechanically, the chair is fine, but the fake leather is thinner than tissue paper and wears through very easily.  As you can see, this happened to six chairs...
author: Kindle Customer
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Cheap
content: I guess it is what a 100 dollar chair amounts to these days.  Disappointing. The bottom seat part broke where the arms attach to the back and there is no structure to the chair, you cannot lean back without it breaking even more. I reordered another chair in the hopes that it will not be as defective as the first but that was my only chance given the packaging was ruined during shipping and I will be reusing the second chairs box to return the first. I guess I will have the opportunity to do the same thang till I win the chair lottery. Wish me luck. Give this chair a HARD pass unless you are feeling lucky.
author: Sal1n1ty
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Poor Quality Material - AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Chair - Black
content: The chair is very sturdy, but the issue is the cheap material used. From the pictures, you can see how the material has started to peel off. I purchased it March 2017. You get what you pay for because a good executive chair cost hundreds of dollars and not $110. Next time, I will buy a real leather chair because now I have to replace it.
author: TM
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Big mistake
content: Everything of this chair is already falling apart My wife bought this for me in April. It's been making sounds like I had it 25 years.
author: jermaine
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Do not buy unless you like to hear constant squeaking and being uncomfortable.
content: Obviously this chair is fake leather, but it feels decent and the color hasn't changed yet. The paint on the plastics is ok, however some have already chipped off when the chair slightly rubbed against the wall. Its a decent chair for the price and I would be happy with it IF it didn't squeak. I am not just talking about a little every now and then, but EVERY time I move in the chair it squeaks. Very loud and aggravating. I have tried to find the exact point but couldn't. Also, any bass whatsoever from my sub below the desk causes the chair arm to shake. This is literally the noisiest chair I have ever sat in. If this thing didn't squeak, it would be 4 or 5 stars. The quality is justified with the price but the squeaking is ridiculous. *UPDATE* I almost never use this chair now. It is incredibly unconformable, and does not help keep proper posture at all. Even when I lock the recline, I always find myself leaning forward from the chair too far back and reclined. The squeak has gotten worse. I will never buy this chair again. Uncomfortable, loud, and doesn't help at all to keep a proper posture due to its design.
author: Ethan Martin
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Superb Comfort = Increased Productivity
content: For starters, installation took about 10 minutes without bumping into any problems. And, so far, I've had this chair for 4 months now and there is nothing bad to say about it. I am 6' 1" and 195 lb and I work at home and spend about 8 to 10 hours daily sitting on this chair. So far, it has provided continuous comfort for my back and my productivity has increased since switching to this chair. Update: After 8 months of daily use, the cushioning still feels like new!
author: TY16
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Got a used chair
content: The chair looks good enough once assembled but I received a used product. Scratches on the legs and several other places on the chair.

product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

author: Andy B.
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: I really like this chair.. with one caveat.
content: I really like this chair. It's pretty comfortable. A vast improvement over my old junky pc chair. There is alot of cushioning, and it isn't very hard to assemble, all the parts necessary are included. My one complaint is that, the underside of the legs of the chair have not been sanded or rounded; the five legs that protrude from the bottom have sharp edges on the bottom. This is not always a problem, but the other day I did manage to accidentally cut the back of my heel on these legs; if you're like me and you're using this chair at home  (and often barefoot because im at home) this could be a problem for you. If not for this sharp edge, it gets 5 stars. I'm going to buy another one, because i do like the chair; but just know that it can cut you if you aren't careful.
author: Zelkova
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly
content: This was meant as a desk chair for a computer. Padding started to wear out with medium use after a month. After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly. I weigh only 160 lbs, so if its wearing out while I'm sitting on it, I can only imagine the longevity an average person would get out of it. Can't recommend at all based on this; you get what you pay for I guess.
author: Anonymous
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: EXTREMELY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND COMFORTABLE AS WELL!!!
content: This chair was incredibly easy to put together!!! :)  It took me about 10 minutes and I am not mechanically inclined.  The instructions were very easy to follow and I was given extra screws as well.  It goes together with an allen wrench, which is supplied.  I have never before in my life used an allen wrench let alone seen one, but it was very easy.  I am a 55-yr. old disabled woman and get confused easily, but this is the easiest piece of furniture I have ever assembled all by myself and I have put together a couple of vacuum cleaners and a rug cleaner.  The chair is incredibly comfortable as well.  It also rolls pretty good on carpeting.  Thank-you for making it soooo easy!!!
author: Julie Bird
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: 2nd time trying Amazon Basic product line. So far so good.
content: --Good quality product --Plain and simple design, yet comfortable --Doesn't have any squeaking sound --Affordable I am happy with the product! Highly recommended for people looking for budget yet comfortable chair!
author: Atticus Johnson
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Amazon Basics Low-Back Task Chair VS. Hon Basyx HVL210
content: My office has the Basyn HVL210 and I love every minute I use that chair. I read many of the reviews for this item and I thought I'd give it a go. These are fairly easy to put together (took me about 15 mins), all the parts are given (you need a screwdriver) and even spare parts are provided. First off, out of the box, it seemed very similar to the Basyx HVL210, the materials seemed extremely similar, one review went about saying it was made by the same factory. I don't know that for a fact but the quality seems like that may be true but the quality of the mesh cushions on the HVL210 is better than these ones here's why - I occasionally cross my legs while sitting on the chair but with this chair the cushions actually don't go back to it's original form but rather deformed permanently (I am 155 lbs). The seats do go up and down vertically but the back is fixed. Additionally, both of these chairs have similar back support and they are good, nice, just the perfect amount of firm to support your back which was a very big deal for me! But there is a significant difference between the backs of these two chairs, the Basyx HVL210 has a somewhat contoured back so your body stays in one place where as this one doesn't have much of a contoured back. Again this goes for personal requirements for every individual, I prefer more contoured. As for sitting long hours on this, for me, if I sit longer than 3 hours at a time, it gets uncomfortable but then again very few people sit that long at a time and if you do, I'd recommend getting up and stretching every now and then! Overall, there is a 20 dollars or so difference in the cost of the chair. I did point out the differences, after this, it's all on personal choice. Good Luck!
author: Buyer O1
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Not as comfortable as I would like
content: Not as comfortable as I would like. I bought three different chairs on amazon and this was the least comfortable for me. The main reason is the straight back which is perpendicular to the seat.  If you are okay with a straight back chair, then this chair might be good for you.  I decided not to return it because I would have to take everything apart, put everything back in the box, and then drop off to UPS. I put a back cushion on the chair which helped a bit. The back itself does not move or adjust, but when you lean back, the back does tilt. . I bought this chair with no armrest (I prefer armrest) so that it can slide into an IKEA children's desk. With armrests, I would have to lower the seat all the way down in order to slide the armrests under the chair, but the seat would be too low. The other two chairs I bought on amazon were the Belleze Desk Office Chair Mid Back Mesh Ergonomic Computer Task in red and the Boss B316-BY Perfect Posture Delux Fabric Task Chair with Adjustable arms. Both were more comfortable than this chair.
author: Sheldon Cooper
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Fastest assembly ever!
content: This chair was delivered less than 25 minutes ago. Since then, I have unpackaged everything (5 min), assembled the chair (14 min), set the height and tilt tension (1 min) and logged in to write this review. Each piece was packaged independently. The only slightly confusing part was installing the seat onto the base. When you put the support post in place, the white 'button' looking thing should be up -- that's what the chair seat connects to (I had the white thing facing the floor, which was incorrect). Aside from that, Amazon makes it SUPER easy with clear instructions and labeling on each piece. (which side faces front, etc). Even the bolts are individually bagged by group, with identification, with another bag containing an extra of each bolt. Granted, I've only been sitting for long enough to type this review, but the chair is reasonably comfortable. The back padding is substantial, as is the seat itself. Surely I could have found a better chair if I wanted to spend the time trying them out at Staples, but for my money and time, this is the very best I could imagine it would be.
author: Brooke C
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: WASTED MONEY...If I could mark "0" stars I would!!
content: I bought this chair for my home office.  I'm attending on-line school and needed a comfortable chair to sit in for long periods. I purchased the chair October 2018. today's date is 12/10/2018! #1 Chair will NOT stay at the height I need to be comfortable at my average desk. #2 The Cushion is already completely FLAT in the center and I am an average 140 lb woman. Don't buy this chair.  It adds to my stress daily.  So frustrating to sit down and slowly descend every morning!  every time I return to the chair I have to raise it up.  Also, regarding the cushion, I fit within the edges of the seat and that is where the chair has flattened all the way down to the wood bottom! MONEY WASTED!
author: Denise Mills
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Attractively priced and functions like an office chair
content: Chair is easy to put together.  It's an obvious Staples product that is rebranded (parts kit has Staples branding), but nonetheless I do not see a chair on the Staples website that is this affordable with the same review quality.  The chair has tilt tension adjustment, and a height adjustment.  It moves pretty easily across my carpeted floor as well.  I looked elsewhere for an office chair that was ~50$ with this much 'review quality' and came up short. UPDATE:  I am knocking off a star and rating it 4 instead of 5.  After a few days of using the chair, I have come to the conclusion that there isn't ample padding in the seat.  My rear end gets a bit stiff after sitting on the chair for a few hours.  I will have to look into getting an additional seat pad or something of the nature.
author: LJM
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: My wife needed this chair to work at the Kitchen table, looks great too!
content: For the little amount of money, I wasn't expected much. I bought this under PRIME and shipped to my door FREE. Now I have to pay taxes in RI, as RI is the worst state in the country to do business, but it's chump change and what's more, the quality is on par with a chair costing 3x as much. It's very, very sturdy. Oh yeah, talk about fast, order it one day, practically comes the next day! Maybe it's because Amazon now has a 20 football field storehouse right in Fall River, MA near us now? Take it from me, sturdy. If it can be broken, I can do it fast. I would say that you might want to use your own screwdriver type allen wrench than the one they give you or wratchet-allen tool to tighten the bolts because a bit of twisting there. Easy directions, can't make a mistake. The longer bolts won't even fit in the smaller holes under the chair, so you can't blow it! Oh yeah, for the record, first time ever for me, I always marveled how they give you just the right amount of screws when assembling stuff. Well, this vendor gives you an extra small and large bolt! The bag even says EXTRA bolts, lmao! Guess I'm getting old to find that amusing, lol.
author: Robert Fagnant
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: I really like this chair.. with one caveat.
content: I really like this chair. It's pretty comfortable. A vast improvement over my old junky pc chair. There is alot of cushioning, and it isn't very hard to assemble, all the parts necessary are included. My one complaint is that, the underside of the legs of the chair have not been sanded or rounded; the five legs that protrude from the bottom have sharp edges on the bottom. This is not always a problem, but the other day I did manage to accidentally cut the back of my heel on these legs; if you're like me and you're using this chair at home  (and often barefoot because im at home) this could be a problem for you. If not for this sharp edge, it gets 5 stars. I'm going to buy another one, because i do like the chair; but just know that it can cut you if you aren't careful.
author: Zelkova
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly
content: This was meant as a desk chair for a computer. Padding started to wear out with medium use after a month. After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly. I weigh only 160 lbs, so if its wearing out while I'm sitting on it, I can only imagine the longevity an average person would get out of it. Can't recommend at all based on this; you get what you pay for I guess.
author: Anonymous
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: EXTREMELY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND COMFORTABLE AS WELL!!!
content: This chair was incredibly easy to put together!!! :)  It took me about 10 minutes and I am not mechanically inclined.  The instructions were very easy to follow and I was given extra screws as well.  It goes together with an allen wrench, which is supplied.  I have never before in my life used an allen wrench let alone seen one, but it was very easy.  I am a 55-yr. old disabled woman and get confused easily, but this is the easiest piece of furniture I have ever assembled all by myself and I have put together a couple of vacuum cleaners and a rug cleaner.  The chair is incredibly comfortable as well.  It also rolls pretty good on carpeting.  Thank-you for making it soooo easy!!!
author: Julie Bird
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: 2nd time trying Amazon Basic product line. So far so good.
content: --Good quality product --Plain and simple design, yet comfortable --Doesn't have any squeaking sound --Affordable I am happy with the product! Highly recommended for people looking for budget yet comfortable chair!
author: Atticus Johnson
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Amazon Basics Low-Back Task Chair VS. Hon Basyx HVL210
content: My office has the Basyn HVL210 and I love every minute I use that chair. I read many of the reviews for this item and I thought I'd give it a go. These are fairly easy to put together (took me about 15 mins), all the parts are given (you need a screwdriver) and even spare parts are provided. First off, out of the box, it seemed very similar to the Basyx HVL210, the materials seemed extremely similar, one review went about saying it was made by the same factory. I don't know that for a fact but the quality seems like that may be true but the quality of the mesh cushions on the HVL210 is better than these ones here's why - I occasionally cross my legs while sitting on the chair but with this chair the cushions actually don't go back to it's original form but rather deformed permanently (I am 155 lbs). The seats do go up and down vertically but the back is fixed. Additionally, both of these chairs have similar back support and they are good, nice, just the perfect amount of firm to support your back which was a very big deal for me! But there is a significant difference between the backs of these two chairs, the Basyx HVL210 has a somewhat contoured back so your body stays in one place where as this one doesn't have much of a contoured back. Again this goes for personal requirements for every individual, I prefer more contoured. As for sitting long hours on this, for me, if I sit longer than 3 hours at a time, it gets uncomfortable but then again very few people sit that long at a time and if you do, I'd recommend getting up and stretching every now and then! Overall, there is a 20 dollars or so difference in the cost of the chair. I did point out the differences, after this, it's all on personal choice. Good Luck!
author: Buyer O1
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Not as comfortable as I would like
content: Not as comfortable as I would like. I bought three different chairs on amazon and this was the least comfortable for me. The main reason is the straight back which is perpendicular to the seat.  If you are okay with a straight back chair, then this chair might be good for you.  I decided not to return it because I would have to take everything apart, put everything back in the box, and then drop off to UPS. I put a back cushion on the chair which helped a bit. The back itself does not move or adjust, but when you lean back, the back does tilt. . I bought this chair with no armrest (I prefer armrest) so that it can slide into an IKEA children's desk. With armrests, I would have to lower the seat all the way down in order to slide the armrests under the chair, but the seat would be too low. The other two chairs I bought on amazon were the Belleze Desk Office Chair Mid Back Mesh Ergonomic Computer Task in red and the Boss B316-BY Perfect Posture Delux Fabric Task Chair with Adjustable arms. Both were more comfortable than this chair.
author: Sheldon Cooper
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Fastest assembly ever!
content: This chair was delivered less than 25 minutes ago. Since then, I have unpackaged everything (5 min), assembled the chair (14 min), set the height and tilt tension (1 min) and logged in to write this review. Each piece was packaged independently. The only slightly confusing part was installing the seat onto the base. When you put the support post in place, the white 'button' looking thing should be up -- that's what the chair seat connects to (I had the white thing facing the floor, which was incorrect). Aside from that, Amazon makes it SUPER easy with clear instructions and labeling on each piece. (which side faces front, etc). Even the bolts are individually bagged by group, with identification, with another bag containing an extra of each bolt. Granted, I've only been sitting for long enough to type this review, but the chair is reasonably comfortable. The back padding is substantial, as is the seat itself. Surely I could have found a better chair if I wanted to spend the time trying them out at Staples, but for my money and time, this is the very best I could imagine it would be.
author: Brooke C
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: WASTED MONEY...If I could mark "0" stars I would!!
content: I bought this chair for my home office.  I'm attending on-line school and needed a comfortable chair to sit in for long periods. I purchased the chair October 2018. today's date is 12/10/2018! #1 Chair will NOT stay at the height I need to be comfortable at my average desk. #2 The Cushion is already completely FLAT in the center and I am an average 140 lb woman. Don't buy this chair.  It adds to my stress daily.  So frustrating to sit down and slowly descend every morning!  every time I return to the chair I have to raise it up.  Also, regarding the cushion, I fit within the edges of the seat and that is where the chair has flattened all the way down to the wood bottom! MONEY WASTED!
author: Denise Mills
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Attractively priced and functions like an office chair
content: Chair is easy to put together.  It's an obvious Staples product that is rebranded (parts kit has Staples branding), but nonetheless I do not see a chair on the Staples website that is this affordable with the same review quality.  The chair has tilt tension adjustment, and a height adjustment.  It moves pretty easily across my carpeted floor as well.  I looked elsewhere for an office chair that was ~50$ with this much 'review quality' and came up short. UPDATE:  I am knocking off a star and rating it 4 instead of 5.  After a few days of using the chair, I have come to the conclusion that there isn't ample padding in the seat.  My rear end gets a bit stiff after sitting on the chair for a few hours.  I will have to look into getting an additional seat pad or something of the nature.

author: Robert Fagnant
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: DO NOT BUY THIS CHAIR. TAKE A GAMERS ADVICE.
content: I’ve had this chair for a few months, when I first got it, it was perfect.... then I actually used it for gaming. Within the first couple of months the arm rests have become wobbly on either side and have started to actually rip out. All I do is rest my elbows on them while I’m gaming (small amount of weight is actually used on them) They have bolts that you tighten to secure them but even when they are tight the armrests wobble and are extremely uncomfortable. Would not recommend this product at all. Wish I could get my money back, or a new chair.. also to add insult to injury the padding on the main seat cushion is like cardboard. Wears out within weeks.
author: CAC
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: 220lbs guy) I wouldn't recommend this budget gaming chair unless those two things get ...
content: Honestly this chair has everything going for it except 2 major things. 1) the arm rest wobble side to side but not up and down. Can support arms but feels flimsy. 2) the seat cushion deflated really quickly (<20 days) and isn't as supportive as hoped for. (Preface: I'm a 6' tall, 220lbs guy) Update: after 7 months of ownership, the material on the chair has begun to split and separate leaving a pealing effect. I wouldn't recommend this budget gaming chair unless those two things get fixed in future versions.
author: Ryan Manning
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Dont listen to the haters
content: Not really sure what the complaints are about this chair.  It does have a slight "odour" but that's like complaining about the new car smell.  The seat/back padding is GREAT.  The (easily adjustable) lumber/headrest pads are very comfortable and easily adjustable.  The assembly was easy/clean (no Styrofoam).  There were about 5-6 pieces (look at the pictures) all bubble wrapped and two boxes.  Inside of the two boxes, everything was individually wrapped.  And as a side-note... They have the EASIEST packaging to "pop-out" the various lettered screws/bolts/tools.  Personally, that was the first thing I noticed/enjoyed lol UPDATE: 1 1/2 months in... After using this chair extensively for upright gaming/work and full reclined movie viewing I can still stand by the 5-star rating I gave it. The chair always feels solid in any position (200lb+ guy) and the footrest doesn't feel flimsy at all if treated properly (ie, no excessive weight on it or being rough).  The only two very minor complaints are (A) it doesn't breathe at all so, on a very hot day and long sitting times, it can get a bit hot, and (B) the bolts for the armrest that attach to the back of the chair did work themselves loose that required about two full turns to tighten back up.  But, like I said, very negligible complaints for the price/features of this chair. UPDATE: 1yr 3months:  Both the seat and armrests are cracking.  Luckily their support team is pretty responsive.  Between the correspondences and the delivery of my replacements (today 8/20) it took about 3-4 weeks.  I'll be hanging on to these replacements until the seat and arms are so far gone since apparently they are only good for about a year.
author: Chris McGuinn
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Great Chair
content: Great Chair!  Can't beat this chair for the price.  Easy to put together very comfortable.  Foot rest is a little cheap and mine came with a missing strap for the lumbar support.  Respawn is sending me a new one and the customer service was quick to respond and took care of the issue.
author: Amazon Customer
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Cool looking, but functionally deficient
content: I have never had a cool office chair and decided to give one a try.  I ordered this expecting to get a comfy chair that was solid and supportive. I was able to assemble the chair easily and though this was going to be a great new addition to my corner of the world. Then I sat in it and that is when things started to degrade. 1. The lever to lower the chair is in front of the lever to adjust the angle of the chair.  NOT AT ALL fun expecting to lean back only to slam to the lowest setting. 2. The arms on the chair make it so you have to lean, uncomfortably, to adjust the chair. - poor design. 3. The chair does not have ANY spring loaded back rest lean, as in every normal office chair I have ever sat in. 4. When you want to move the chair back up, you need to adjust the lever, then manually move the chair (without any spring assistance) and then lock the lever down - all without messing up the position of the back of the chair. To summarize, this is a cool looking chair, and for some people it might work great.  For me, however, it is not functionally complete and will end up sitting in the closet or being sold on Craigslist.
author: Phillip L. Williams
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Comfy chair, very sturdy, excellent features, but doesn't breathe and has a few minor annoyances.
content: Edit: I'm a bit late in editing this as I thought I did a while ago. I'm changing my review to a 1 star. I found the foam in the seat did not hold up and degrades pretty quick. Was probably 4-5 months before it felt like I was sitting on lumpy concrete and started to give me hell with my back. I also came to hate the fact the seat is huge almost for someone extremely big. I'm not very big so this was super uncomfortable. I know they are supposed to have a warranty that might cover this, but it'll just do the same thing again. What happens with cheap foam. A competitor with a more expensive chair makes a point of using high density foam. Probably ends up being closer to the foam in a car seat. That's what it needed. Have had the chair all of two days, but feel I can give a fairly realistic review in that time frame so far. Chair is super easy to assemble, probably one of the easiest I've put together. Took me less than 10 minutes which is awesome. Most chairs I've purchased in the past become a fight and can take 20 minutes or more of fighting them. There is a strong chemical smell, I noticed that the chair felt like it was coated in something. I grabbed a leather cleaner and wiped the whole chair down and besides a very light leather smell from the cleaner, the chair is odorless. Chair is super comfortable, the leg/foot rest is great. Easy to flip out and use. Feels very sturdy. I'm 205lbs and to no surprise the chair holds the weight fine and the leg/foot rest feels very sturdy. I really love the fact that reclining can be locked in place at anything between 0-130*. You just lock it in place and you're done. Have a few cons, hence the 3 out of 5. First is the chair doesn't breathe worth anything. It's actually pretty bad. low 60*F in the house and 30*F outside and my back and legs get pretty hot. I have a feeling this chair will end up unbearable in the summer. The armrests are nice but also annoying. They clear my desk at 0* and a very slight tilt, but as you lean the chair back they actually get taller before they then get shorter again due to design. Means that sometimes my preferred recline amount causes the arms to hit the desk. May not matter to most, but was something I didn't catch from the pictures. Its not end of the world. last annoyance is that the feet for the chair sit towards the back. I know this is to allow the chair to balance at a 130* recline position, but when sitting on the edge of the chair it tips. You have to sit completely on the seat. Again, not end of the world, but for some people I know this would be an annoyance just like for me. All in all it's hard to complain for the price, it's a really nice chair all things considered. Working from home 4 days a week this might not be the best chair for me in the end, but I'll have to be fair and give it some time and see. My biggest concern is the summer months and how awful that might be.
author: nosympathy
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Respawn-110: Perfect for anyone who stays seated for long periods of time & requires a footrest for when the floor becomes lava.
content: This chair is amazing! It took less than an hour to put it together out of the box and was very simple to do. The seat is firm and comfortable and allows you to lean the back up to a 130-degree angle and lock it in place at any point. As the back leans, so do the padded armrests in tandem. The addition of the footrest is quite nice and simply slides forward and back from the bottom of the seat when needed. Although, it feels like a lot pressure or weight shouldn't be applied to the footrest but if used when seated properly, there should be no issues. The addition of the headrest pillow and lumbar support are welcome and can be adjusted easily or removed if need be. Overall, the Respawn-110 Gaming Chair is a wonderful product and I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to play games, watch movies, or browse the endless abyss of the internet comfortably.
author: Antimagictoxin
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Weak Cushion = Uncomfortable
content: I want to start my review by saying that I ordered two of these chairs, one red and one blue. They both arrived in damaged boxes, but a cursory inspection revealed no noticable damage to the chairs. The assembly was fine, with the only hanging being where and how to place the pillow on the elastic straps. It ended up at the base of the back and just slides down if not there anyways. I liked the look of this and wanted to spice up my battlestation with it, so I was excited to test it out after assembly. I immediately noticed the right arm was wobbly and assumed I had failed to tighten it properly. This was not the case, as it was firmly tightened. There was simply nothing I could do about this, so I have to be cautious everytime I push up to get out of the chair. After a few hours of gaming I noticed that the bottom cushin had defailted and I was basically sitting on the plywood base. It was and has been uncomfortable ever since. In the 2 months since I purchased this chair the left arm has started to wobble and the right arm is even worse. I have decided to go back to the cheap amazon basics chair because it was more durable and more comfortable. Other Thoughts: The leg prop is a novelty at best. It too is weak, wobbly, and poorly secured. The back pillow on the straps is flat and useless now as well, and I removed the head pillow because it strapped around the top in an uncomfortable position. So if you want a chair that looks cool, this is your chair. If you want one that isn't rickety and doesn't leave you sore, consider another chair.
author: Suix
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Will I ever get my husband back?!
content: Well I think it’s safe to say this chair deserves 5 stars considering my husband hasn’t left the chair in a week.... well ok, he went to the bathroom once and I jumped in to see how comfy it really is, and yeah, I didn’t want to get out of it either. I was forcefully removed, though. He doesn’t share well. We call it the dentist chair because this thing can lay all the way back and adjusts in all directions plus the foot rest is awesome. Great gaming chair and works just fine at the computer desk as well. Just be aware that I am indeed giving the chair itself 5 stars, but my husbands household productivity has gone from a well earned 4 stars to a measly 1 star due to this chair. It’s sucked him in and I’m not sure I’ll ever get him back.. sigh.
author: OnWithTheStars
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Had to purchase extra bolts/nuts to fully assemble
content: The chair assembly was easy until I got to the part when I bolt the steel support at the base of the back of the chair into the steel support of the seat. There are three holes drilled into the steel support for three 8x20mm bolts that are included which require an included Allen wrench to tighten. The included bolts fit into the holes fine from the back portion of the chair to the steel support on the seat of the chair but there was nothing they screwed into such as a nut so they just immediately fall out and the chair falls apart and could not be assembled as received. I checked the instructions and it literally has an illustration of these bolts just going into these holes with nothing to screw them into to tighten the back support to the seat frame. They just sit there. The accessories are nicely packaged and clearly labeled so I knew I wasn’t missing any pieces, plus again the instructions clearly state I was doing it right which is insane to me, how can anyone put this chair together? I had to purchase three 5/16th (didn’t have 8x20mm/metric size at Home Depot so couldn’t use factory bolts) bolts/nuts and a matching ratcheting combination wrench to use with a torque wrench to install them at extra cost. This is why I’m giving just two stars. I had to settle for silver bolts because I couldn’t find black ones to match the color of the steel frame. After assembling the chair itself looks pretty nice. It’s a pleather material, feels fairly mid to high quality. Chair neck support fits me perfect at 5’11”. It just about fully reclines and feels comfortable and doesn’t look too cheap. I’m happy with it the look and feel. I’d give it 4 stars but I just can’t believe I had to purchase nuts and bolts to install it. It appears based on the instructions and illustrations that all of the chairs are like this, maybe I bought a manufacturer defect? I took a photo of what I’m talking about. The nuts/bolts in the photo are the ones I had to purchase and were not included, hence silver color. Again, I meticulously checked the instructions and box for extra parts and it was obvious there were none! Considering the extra 20$ I spent I may have been able to find a slightly better chair but probably not so it may not be a total deterrent if you don’t mind the extra work. Chair is sturdy, comfy, doesn’t look too cheap.
author: Theodore P. Nelson
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

I was able to assemble the chair easily and though this was going to be a great new addition to my corner of the world. Then I sat in it and that is when things started to degrade. 1. title: Comfy chair, very sturdy, excellent features, but doesn't breathe and has a few minor annoyances.
