Easy to flip out and use. Feels very sturdy. I'm 205lbs and to no surprise the chair holds the weight fine and the leg/foot rest feels very sturdy. I really love the fact that reclining can be locked in place at anything between 0-130*. You just lock it in place and you're done. Have a few cons, hence the 3 out of 5. First is the chair doesn't breathe worth anything. It's actually pretty bad. low 60*F in the house and 30*F outside and my back and legs get pretty hot. I have a feeling this chair will end up unbearable in the summer. The armrests are nice but also annoying. They clear my desk at 0* and a very slight tilt, but as you lean the chair back they actually get taller before they then get shorter again due to design. Means that sometimes my preferred recline amount causes the arms to hit the desk. May not matter to most, but was something I didn't catch from the pictures. Its not end of the world. last annoyance is that the feet for the chair sit towards the back. I know this is to allow the chair to balance at a 130* recline position, but when sitting on the edge of the chair it tips. You have to sit completely on the seat. Again, not end of the world, but for some people I know this would be an annoyance just like for me. All in all it's hard to complain for the price, it's a really nice chair all things considered. Working from home 4 days a week this might not be the best chair for me in the end, but I'll have to be fair and give it some time and see. My biggest concern is the summer months and how awful that might be.
author: nosympathy
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Respawn-110: Perfect for anyone who stays seated for long periods of time & requires a footrest for when the floor becomes lava.
content: This chair is amazing! It took less than an hour to put it together out of the box and was very simple to do. The seat is firm and comfortable and allows you to lean the back up to a 130-degree angle and lock it in place at any point. As the back leans, so do the padded armrests in tandem. The addition of the footrest is quite nice and simply slides forward and back from the bottom of the seat when needed. Although, it feels like a lot pressure or weight shouldn't be applied to the footrest but if used when seated properly, there should be no issues. The addition of the headrest pillow and lumbar support are welcome and can be adjusted easily or removed if need be. Overall, the Respawn-110 Gaming Chair is a wonderful product and I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to play games, watch movies, or browse the endless abyss of the internet comfortably.
author: Antimagictoxin
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Weak Cushion = Uncomfortable
content: I want to start my review by saying that I ordered two of these chairs, one red and one blue. They both arrived in damaged boxes, but a cursory inspection revealed no noticable damage to the chairs. The assembly was fine, with the only hanging being where and how to place the pillow on the elastic straps. It ended up at the base of the back and just slides down if not there anyways. I liked the look of this and wanted to spice up my battlestation with it, so I was excited to test it out after assembly. I immediately noticed the right arm was wobbly and assumed I had failed to tighten it properly. This was not the case, as it was firmly tightened. There was simply nothing I could do about this, so I have to be cautious everytime I push up to get out of the chair. After a few hours of gaming I noticed that the bottom cushin had defailted and I was basically sitting on the plywood base. It was and has been uncomfortable ever since. In the 2 months since I purchased this chair the left arm has started to wobble and the right arm is even worse. I have decided to go back to the cheap amazon basics chair because it was more durable and more comfortable. Other Thoughts: The leg prop is a novelty at best. It too is weak, wobbly, and poorly secured. The back pillow on the straps is flat and useless now as well, and I removed the head pillow because it strapped around the top in an uncomfortable position. So if you want a chair that looks cool, this is your chair. If you want one that isn't rickety and doesn't leave you sore, consider another chair.
author: Suix
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Will I ever get my husband back?!
content: Well I think it’s safe to say this chair deserves 5 stars considering my husband hasn’t left the chair in a week.... well ok, he went to the bathroom once and I jumped in to see how comfy it really is, and yeah, I didn’t want to get out of it either. I was forcefully removed, though. He doesn’t share well. We call it the dentist chair because this thing can lay all the way back and adjusts in all directions plus the foot rest is awesome. Great gaming chair and works just fine at the computer desk as well. Just be aware that I am indeed giving the chair itself 5 stars, but my husbands household productivity has gone from a well earned 4 stars to a measly 1 star due to this chair. It’s sucked him in and I’m not sure I’ll ever get him back.. sigh.
author: OnWithTheStars
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Had to purchase extra bolts/nuts to fully assemble
content: The chair assembly was easy until I got to the part when I bolt the steel support at the base of the back of the chair into the steel support of the seat. There are three holes drilled into the steel support for three 8x20mm bolts that are included which require an included Allen wrench to tighten. The included bolts fit into the holes fine from the back portion of the chair to the steel support on the seat of the chair but there was nothing they screwed into such as a nut so they just immediately fall out and the chair falls apart and could not be assembled as received. I checked the instructions and it literally has an illustration of these bolts just going into these holes with nothing to screw them into to tighten the back support to the seat frame. They just sit there. The accessories are nicely packaged and clearly labeled so I knew I wasn’t missing any pieces, plus again the instructions clearly state I was doing it right which is insane to me, how can anyone put this chair together? I had to purchase three 5/16th (didn’t have 8x20mm/metric size at Home Depot so couldn’t use factory bolts) bolts/nuts and a matching ratcheting combination wrench to use with a torque wrench to install them at extra cost. This is why I’m giving just two stars. I had to settle for silver bolts because I couldn’t find black ones to match the color of the steel frame. After assembling the chair itself looks pretty nice. It’s a pleather material, feels fairly mid to high quality. Chair neck support fits me perfect at 5’11”. It just about fully reclines and feels comfortable and doesn’t look too cheap. I’m happy with it the look and feel. I’d give it 4 stars but I just can’t believe I had to purchase nuts and bolts to install it. It appears based on the instructions and illustrations that all of the chairs are like this, maybe I bought a manufacturer defect? I took a photo of what I’m talking about. The nuts/bolts in the photo are the ones I had to purchase and were not included, hence silver color. Again, I meticulously checked the instructions and box for extra parts and it was obvious there were none! Considering the extra 20$ I spent I may have been able to find a slightly better chair but probably not so it may not be a total deterrent if you don’t mind the extra work. Chair is sturdy, comfy, doesn’t look too cheap.
author: Theodore P. Nelson
product: RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair, Gray

title: Do Not Buy!
content: I purchased one of these chairs back in August of 2017 and it has been amazing, but the seat has gotten a little worn so I just ordered a new one (September 2019). I was SO DISAPPOINTED when I got it all put together-- it looks the same, but it is a cheap version that is literally too uncomfortable to sit in. The metals posts that support the back are shorter, the back now needs to be screwed on (the old version is permanently connected); the edging that goes around the back has been removed (and is sharp); the mesh is rougher; and the wheels dont fit flush to the base, which cause a wobble ( see photos ). I would have packaged it all up to return already, except that adjustable shaft is now stuck in the base and the chair -- I've had to call in a favor to have a second person come and help me pull it apart tomorrow. It is so disappointing on every level possible, and I'll definitely think twice before purchasing another piece of Amazon Basics furniture.
author: Mack Gooding-Waldron
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Perfect Small chair for small people
content: I read the reviews before buying and these people were right. The arms are weird and too short to be useful. They do not adjust. And I am a short and small person (5') so this chair is great for me but my 6'3 husband not so much, which is fine because I got it for me, it's MY chair, so he shouldn't be sitting in it anyway. I call that a win. I happen to think it's actually really comfortable especially considering how cheap it was. Looks nice enough and It was super easy to assemble. Seems pretty durable. I've spent entire days in this chair working and so far not one backache.
author: tourdm
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Does not age well
content: I've owned it for a year so this review is based on long term results as the comfort has changed since I first put it together.  The cushion is now maybe 20% the thickness it once was, at least in the spots I most frequently sit.  I find myself rotating positions as my butt gets tired and back starts to ache. The armrests are hard plastic, would like to see some sort of softer material used instead. Back support is probably the highlight (despite my back feeling sore on occasion, I think that is due to awkward positions necessitated out of discomfort from below). The chair is available for a great price, but after a year I'm already starting to shop around.  My guess is you get what you pay for, and I plan on a significant upgrade.
author: W. Griswold
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Overall great chair with room for a armrest improvements
content: Overall I like this chair, especially for the price.  Assembly was a breeze.  All parts were clearly labeled.  Whomever packaged the parts and wrote the assembly instruction booklet couldn't have made it more clear and easy.  (A rarity.) I find the cushion to be comfortable and of medium firmness.  I would've paid more if the arm height was adjustable, or if at a minimum were able to be lifted out of the way against the back of the chair making the chair essentially armless.  I find the fixed arms to be about an inch too low, but if I am just sitting back, relaxing in the chair, my wrists rest on the armrest and it's better than nothing. The height of the chair was very important to me.  It was hard to find accurate measurements, so as soon as I put the chair together, I took my own measurements.  I hope someone else will find it helpful.... The seat is 19" wide x 18" deep.  The height to the top of the seat at it's lowest setting is 17.5" and 22.25" at it's highest.  The seat height sinks about 7/16" when you sit in it.  Because the seat is rounded in the front and not perfectly flat, it makes measuring the height difficult.  I placed a thin piece of cardboard on the seat, then a quart sized paint can on top so it wasn't floating.  I then measured from the floor to the bottom of the cardboard.  I posted a few pictures.  (Sorry if they are sideways...they are the correct way on my computer and nothing I did uploaded them right side up on Amazon.) Floor to top of arm height is 23 5/8" at lowest seat height setting and 28 3/8" at highest seat setting.  (To determine if it will roll under a desk.  This is also difficult to measure as the arm rest is curved. I measured the middle of the arm rest.) Fixed arm height is about 6.25" from top of seat to top of arm. Note many reviewers complained that during assembly of the back rest to the seat cushion, the metal back bar frame overlapped the seat plate.  They must have updated the assembly instructions at some point because the instructions clearly state, "the metal back bar frame will overlap on the seat plate."  They then show a diagram showing the overlap with another note,"back bar will overlap seat plate when aligning to holes."  So, this is not a design flaw but intentional. Overall, I am very happy with the chair.  I use it about 4-5hr a day, 5 days a week.  So far after 3 months it is holding up well.
author: Jever
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Select a different chair
content: Very uncomfortable chair. When seated with good straight posture, the lower frame of the backrest is the first portion to make contact with my back. In order to use the backrest without the bar pressing into my back, I must use a pillow to help bridge the gap or sit slouched back. Chair is assembled correctly but unfortunately there is no way to adjustment the angle of the backrest.
author: Garrett
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: A Much-Longer-Than-Needed Review for a Chair
content: I'm a big fan of amazon. I needed a chair. AmazonBasics had a chair. So I bought it. The thought of an Amazon brand chair was exciting to me. I needed an office chair and I wasn't willing nor was I capable of affording a Herman Miller, or a Steelcase, and so on. I've had $200 Staples/Costco chairs and they're okay, but typically not that much better than a chair such as this one. Rather than buying the cheapest generic chair from some generic Chinese company, it was appealing that a company that I have found to be reliable had their own to offer. Assembly: Out of the box, nothing was missing or broken. A booklet is included with very clear instructions and the hardware is separated and labeled in plastic bags; very well executed. One thing that bothered me is when you attach the back cushion under the seat it overlaps with the seat plate. I thought I did something wrong so I took it apart and put it back together for no reason, delaying the assembly process (I might have OCD). In the end, it doesn't seem to be a problem. Comfort/Functionality: The seat cushion is very thick and firm, it's probably my favorite thing about this chair. I LOVE THE SEAT CUSHION. Same goes for the back mesh, comfortable with good support. The pneumatic lift works well. The chair comes with a tilt lock and tilt tension adjusting knob, very basic. The caster wheels are very smooth. I don't really care for the arm rests, but there's nothing wrong with them I suppose. They are placed relatively low, my elbow does not even reach them so I don't use them (I'm 5'8" btw). I'm guessing they did this so that the chair could easily be pushed into the desk without clearance issue. Again, this is not important to me but take it into consideration when buying. No complaints at all. The chair feels very sturdy, nothing creaks or rattles or anything. It's a solid chair. Summary: I'm pleasantly surprised by this chair. It definitely exceeded my expectations and I can see myself using it for a long time to come. It's a comfortable and sturdy, no-frills, no-nonsense office chair. Well worth the money. I really like the seat cushion... I highly recommend it.
author: JL
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: A well-priced chair for Basic office need - LATEST review September 2017 with Pictures
content: Overview: 1. The chair is similar to another chair sold by Walmart for similar price. Its built and quality are acceptable for the price range. The non-adjustable armrests are made of hard plastic material so you may find it not really comfortable. 2. It takes about 15-20 minutes to fully assemble the chair.  Well-written instruction. 3. The chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch in height (about 44-57 cm). Maximum load is 250 lbs. Detail review is as following: 1.Packaging: The product came in a carton package size of 10x23x26inch (24x58x65cm) approximately. Nothing fancy about this product packaging, the package looks not so study and protective from the outside. Mine actually came with one corner being deformed. On the carton, it says “Product origin of China” 2.Tools required: (1x) of a pair of scissors (or an utility knife) to cut the carton box open, and (1x) Allen wrench which is included with the package. 3.Open the box: Inside the package, the back support was bubble-wrapped while other components are in regular plastic bag. Although the carton was deformed, no components are damaged. Each group of assembly parts (screws, washers) are in separate ziploc bags with well-identified alphabet symbol for ease of locating components during the assembly process later. 4.Assembly: a.The instruction is well written with clear narrative and diagrams so assembly steps are easily to follow. It also comes with multi languages (English, French, Spanish and Chinese). If you have seen an instruction by IKEA (which assumes you are a handyman), you will indeed appreciate this product assembly instruction. This instruction is evidently written by American engineers  b.The assembly steps are logical enough so I could put parts together without any issue. Tips for you: (1) use the packaging bubble wrap and other plastic bags as your assembly surface to prevent chair components or your house floor being scratched. (2) Only hand tight the screws. Do NOT over tighten the screws. (3) Before you sit  on the newly-assembled chair the first time, make sure the chair is put together properly by checking on all screws are being tighten. 5. Final Result: This chair is fine for the price. The meshed back support is not really designed for ergonomic but it seems to be sturdy enough for its design intent. The chair height adjuster works fine, I measured and the chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch (about 44-57 cm) in height. The back support can also tilt backward or forward based on your preference. AmazonBasics Mid-Back Mesh Chair
author: Kevin L.
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Basically a perfect chair
content: As a relatively big guy (5'11" 270lb) I really don't know what all the hubub's about on this chair being "small". It fits me just fine. It's compact without being too small. For a home office, this is a good thing. The lumbar support hits me right in the small of my back, above the belt line (where it should). It's well made. The arms are designed to fit under a desk. They don't provide forearm support when working, but I rest my forearms on my desk when I'm working anyway. When I lean back, the arms are there to support my wrists and give my hands something to hold onto. Assembly took literally 15 minutes. (I know, because I did it between conference calls.) I spent a LOT of time reading reviews and comparing various chairs. I finally decided to give this chair a chance and I'm very glad I did. It's a nice chair, not only for the price, but just in general. I wrote this review after receiving the chair, assembling it, and using it for a day. If anything changes, I'll update the review. But really... Maybe there are people for whom this chair wouldn't work. But it feels to me like a nice comfortable chair of average / compact dimensions that you might find in almost any office. One tip about the arms being too close together... The arms have slots in them for the bolts. So you can choose whether to snug the arms against the edges of the seat or allow a little extra width. I assembled the arms in the widest place in the slots. I recommend you do the same, no matter your size. It will give you some extra room in the chair. I'm picky. I'm not small. Price wasn't my #1 consideration in my decision. I like the chair and I'd buy it again.
author: Eric Lovgren
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Cushioning barely lasted a few months.
content: Great for a few months, but after that the cushion absolutely disappears. I sit in my chair for 6 hours or so a day, as most people who work in an office do. It was comfy at first, but now it's like I'm sitting on wood. My tailbone is sore now that I keep sitting on it. If you want to replace your chair after 3-4 months then this will work. I was hoping to get at least a year out of this. Don't buy for longevity.
author: Steven Irvine
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Excellent chair.
content: This is a very nice chair for the price. I especially love the way they packaged the screws, etc. Very clearly labeled and a big improvement, in my opinion, over the usual blister packs. It's quite comfortable for a 6' tall 175lb guy. Adjustment is easy, rolls nicely, all the stuff you want in a chair. I saw some complaints on here about overlap of the metal plates between the chair back and main support plate. This was addressed in the instructions in my case. Not a problem. I design machines for a living and I don't think this is a major issue, didn't impede assembly and helps relieve stress on the bottom of the chair if anything, I saw some pictures of the o-ring around the mesh coming loose. Mine did too. A couple of drops of super glue cured that, the rubber ring is strictly decorative in my opinion anyway. Glue it in, you'll be fine. Great bang for the buck! Would buy again and recommend highly. Didn't take anything off my 5 star rating because any objections I may have had weren't worth making a very nice, cost effective product look even slightly bad over trivial BS.
author: Scott Drager
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Do Not Buy!
content: I purchased one of these chairs back in August of 2017 and it has been amazing, but the seat has gotten a little worn so I just ordered a new one (September 2019). The metals posts that support the back are shorter, the back now needs to be screwed on (the old version is permanently connected); the edging that goes around the back has been removed (and is sharp); the mesh is rougher; and the wheels dont fit flush to the base, which cause a wobble ( see photos ). I would have packaged it all up to return already, except that adjustable shaft is now stuck in the base and the chair -- I've had to call in a favor to have a second person come and help me pull it apart tomorrow. It is so disappointing on every level possible, and I'll definitely think twice before purchasing another piece of Amazon Basics furniture.

product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Basically a perfect chair
content: As a relatively big guy (5'11" 270lb) I really don't know what all the hubub's about on this chair being "small". It fits me just fine. It's compact without being too small. For a home office, this is a good thing. The lumbar support hits me right in the small of my back, above the belt line (where it should). It's well made. The arms are designed to fit under a desk. They don't provide forearm support when working, but I rest my forearms on my desk when I'm working anyway. When I lean back, the arms are there to support my wrists and give my hands something to hold onto. Assembly took literally 15 minutes. (I know, because I did it between conference calls.) I spent a LOT of time reading reviews and comparing various chairs. I finally decided to give this chair a chance and I'm very glad I did. It's a nice chair, not only for the price, but just in general. I wrote this review after receiving the chair, assembling it, and using it for a day. If anything changes, I'll update the review. But really... Maybe there are people for whom this chair wouldn't work. But it feels to me like a nice comfortable chair of average / compact dimensions that you might find in almost any office. One tip about the arms being too close together... The arms have slots in them for the bolts. So you can choose whether to snug the arms against the edges of the seat or allow a little extra width. I assembled the arms in the widest place in the slots. I recommend you do the same, no matter your size. It will give you some extra room in the chair. I'm picky. I'm not small. Price wasn't my #1 consideration in my decision. I like the chair and I'd buy it again.
author: Eric Lovgren
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Cushioning barely lasted a few months.
content: Great for a few months, but after that the cushion absolutely disappears. I sit in my chair for 6 hours or so a day, as most people who work in an office do. It was comfy at first, but now it's like I'm sitting on wood. My tailbone is sore now that I keep sitting on it. If you want to replace your chair after 3-4 months then this will work. I was hoping to get at least a year out of this. Don't buy for longevity.
author: Steven Irvine
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Excellent chair.
content: This is a very nice chair for the price. I especially love the way they packaged the screws, etc. Very clearly labeled and a big improvement, in my opinion, over the usual blister packs. It's quite comfortable for a 6' tall 175lb guy. Adjustment is easy, rolls nicely, all the stuff you want in a chair. I saw some complaints on here about overlap of the metal plates between the chair back and main support plate. This was addressed in the instructions in my case. Not a problem. I design machines for a living and I don't think this is a major issue, didn't impede assembly and helps relieve stress on the bottom of the chair if anything, I saw some pictures of the o-ring around the mesh coming loose. Mine did too. A couple of drops of super glue cured that, the rubber ring is strictly decorative in my opinion anyway. Glue it in, you'll be fine. Great bang for the buck! Would buy again and recommend highly. Didn't take anything off my 5 star rating because any objections I may have had weren't worth making a very nice, cost effective product look even slightly bad over trivial BS.
author: Scott Drager
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: I really like this chair.. with one caveat.
content: I really like this chair. It's pretty comfortable. A vast improvement over my old junky pc chair. There is alot of cushioning, and it isn't very hard to assemble, all the parts necessary are included. My one complaint is that, the underside of the legs of the chair have not been sanded or rounded; the five legs that protrude from the bottom have sharp edges on the bottom. This is not always a problem, but the other day I did manage to accidentally cut the back of my heel on these legs; if you're like me and you're using this chair at home  (and often barefoot because im at home) this could be a problem for you. If not for this sharp edge, it gets 5 stars. I'm going to buy another one, because i do like the chair; but just know that it can cut you if you aren't careful.
author: Zelkova
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly
content: This was meant as a desk chair for a computer. Padding started to wear out with medium use after a month. After 2 months the padding was pretty much non-existent and it started to squeak pretty badly. I weigh only 160 lbs, so if its wearing out while I'm sitting on it, I can only imagine the longevity an average person would get out of it. Can't recommend at all based on this; you get what you pay for I guess.
author: Anonymous
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: EXTREMELY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND COMFORTABLE AS WELL!!!
content: This chair was incredibly easy to put together!!! :)  It took me about 10 minutes and I am not mechanically inclined.  The instructions were very easy to follow and I was given extra screws as well.  It goes together with an allen wrench, which is supplied.  I have never before in my life used an allen wrench let alone seen one, but it was very easy.  I am a 55-yr. old disabled woman and get confused easily, but this is the easiest piece of furniture I have ever assembled all by myself and I have put together a couple of vacuum cleaners and a rug cleaner.  The chair is incredibly comfortable as well.  It also rolls pretty good on carpeting.  Thank-you for making it soooo easy!!!
author: Julie Bird
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: 2nd time trying Amazon Basic product line. So far so good.
content: --Good quality product --Plain and simple design, yet comfortable --Doesn't have any squeaking sound --Affordable I am happy with the product! Highly recommended for people looking for budget yet comfortable chair!
author: Atticus Johnson
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Amazon Basics Low-Back Task Chair VS. Hon Basyx HVL210
content: My office has the Basyn HVL210 and I love every minute I use that chair. I read many of the reviews for this item and I thought I'd give it a go. These are fairly easy to put together (took me about 15 mins), all the parts are given (you need a screwdriver) and even spare parts are provided. First off, out of the box, it seemed very similar to the Basyx HVL210, the materials seemed extremely similar, one review went about saying it was made by the same factory. I don't know that for a fact but the quality seems like that may be true but the quality of the mesh cushions on the HVL210 is better than these ones here's why - I occasionally cross my legs while sitting on the chair but with this chair the cushions actually don't go back to it's original form but rather deformed permanently (I am 155 lbs). The seats do go up and down vertically but the back is fixed. Additionally, both of these chairs have similar back support and they are good, nice, just the perfect amount of firm to support your back which was a very big deal for me! But there is a significant difference between the backs of these two chairs, the Basyx HVL210 has a somewhat contoured back so your body stays in one place where as this one doesn't have much of a contoured back. Again this goes for personal requirements for every individual, I prefer more contoured. As for sitting long hours on this, for me, if I sit longer than 3 hours at a time, it gets uncomfortable but then again very few people sit that long at a time and if you do, I'd recommend getting up and stretching every now and then! Overall, there is a 20 dollars or so difference in the cost of the chair. I did point out the differences, after this, it's all on personal choice. Good Luck!
author: Buyer O1
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Not as comfortable as I would like
content: Not as comfortable as I would like. I bought three different chairs on amazon and this was the least comfortable for me. The main reason is the straight back which is perpendicular to the seat.  If you are okay with a straight back chair, then this chair might be good for you.  I decided not to return it because I would have to take everything apart, put everything back in the box, and then drop off to UPS. I put a back cushion on the chair which helped a bit. The back itself does not move or adjust, but when you lean back, the back does tilt. . I bought this chair with no armrest (I prefer armrest) so that it can slide into an IKEA children's desk. With armrests, I would have to lower the seat all the way down in order to slide the armrests under the chair, but the seat would be too low. The other two chairs I bought on amazon were the Belleze Desk Office Chair Mid Back Mesh Ergonomic Computer Task in red and the Boss B316-BY Perfect Posture Delux Fabric Task Chair with Adjustable arms. Both were more comfortable than this chair.
author: Sheldon Cooper
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Fastest assembly ever!
content: This chair was delivered less than 25 minutes ago. Since then, I have unpackaged everything (5 min), assembled the chair (14 min), set the height and tilt tension (1 min) and logged in to write this review. Each piece was packaged independently. The only slightly confusing part was installing the seat onto the base. When you put the support post in place, the white 'button' looking thing should be up -- that's what the chair seat connects to (I had the white thing facing the floor, which was incorrect). Aside from that, Amazon makes it SUPER easy with clear instructions and labeling on each piece. (which side faces front, etc). Even the bolts are individually bagged by group, with identification, with another bag containing an extra of each bolt. Granted, I've only been sitting for long enough to type this review, but the chair is reasonably comfortable. The back padding is substantial, as is the seat itself. Surely I could have found a better chair if I wanted to spend the time trying them out at Staples, but for my money and time, this is the very best I could imagine it would be.
author: Brooke C
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: WASTED MONEY...If I could mark "0" stars I would!!
content: I bought this chair for my home office.  I'm attending on-line school and needed a comfortable chair to sit in for long periods. I purchased the chair October 2018. today's date is 12/10/2018! #1 Chair will NOT stay at the height I need to be comfortable at my average desk. #2 The Cushion is already completely FLAT in the center and I am an average 140 lb woman. Don't buy this chair.  It adds to my stress daily.  So frustrating to sit down and slowly descend every morning!  every time I return to the chair I have to raise it up.  Also, regarding the cushion, I fit within the edges of the seat and that is where the chair has flattened all the way down to the wood bottom! MONEY WASTED!
author: Denise Mills
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Attractively priced and functions like an office chair
content: Chair is easy to put together.  It's an obvious Staples product that is rebranded (parts kit has Staples branding), but nonetheless I do not see a chair on the Staples website that is this affordable with the same review quality.  The chair has tilt tension adjustment, and a height adjustment.  It moves pretty easily across my carpeted floor as well.  I looked elsewhere for an office chair that was ~50$ with this much 'review quality' and came up short. UPDATE:  I am knocking off a star and rating it 4 instead of 5.  After a few days of using the chair, I have come to the conclusion that there isn't ample padding in the seat.  My rear end gets a bit stiff after sitting on the chair for a few hours.  I will have to look into getting an additional seat pad or something of the nature.
author: LJM
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: My wife needed this chair to work at the Kitchen table, looks great too!
content: For the little amount of money, I wasn't expected much. I bought this under PRIME and shipped to my door FREE. Now I have to pay taxes in RI, as RI is the worst state in the country to do business, but it's chump change and what's more, the quality is on par with a chair costing 3x as much. It's very, very sturdy. Oh yeah, talk about fast, order it one day, practically comes the next day! Maybe it's because Amazon now has a 20 football field storehouse right in Fall River, MA near us now? Take it from me, sturdy. If it can be broken, I can do it fast. I would say that you might want to use your own screwdriver type allen wrench than the one they give you or wratchet-allen tool to tighten the bolts because a bit of twisting there. Easy directions, can't make a mistake. The longer bolts won't even fit in the smaller holes under the chair, so you can't blow it! Oh yeah, for the record, first time ever for me, I always marveled how they give you just the right amount of screws when assembling stuff. Well, this vendor gives you an extra small and large bolt! The bag even says EXTRA bolts, lmao! Guess I'm getting old to find that amusing, lol.
author: Robert Fagnant
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: I really like this chair.. with one caveat.

There is alot of cushioning, and it isn't very hard to assemble, all the parts necessary are included. If not for this sharp edge, it gets 5 stars. I'm going to buy another one, because i do like the chair; but just know that it can cut you if you aren't careful.

author: Robert Fagnant
product: AmazonBasics Upholstered, Low-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Excellent No-Frills Computer/Office Chair
content: So far this chair is excellent. Nice and thick cushion on the bottom and good back support. It only has height adjustment and is very basic, but it feels well made and it is comfortable. I switched from an executive chair that had the splitting fake leather (only 5 years old, not the best quality). I prefer a chair without arms so I can scoot up to the desk, and the mesh back is much more breathable. I use this AmazonBasics chair for programming and development. It's not the kind of chair you want if you like to lean back and consume media on your computer, but for computer tasks it is great. I use a similar chair 8 hours a day at work, but it isn't as good as this one. I may replace it with this chair as well.
author: N. Vogt
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Worth every penny!
content: This chair is perfect for use at my sewing machine...I don't need a lot of padding or expensive features. I use it in my sewing room, which has industrial-type carpeting, and the chair rolls around fine but never gets away from me. It has a seat back that encourages good posture. You couldn't buy a chair from a store this good, and though I hated buying such an item without actually being able to sit in it, this one is pretty (red!) and very comfortable.
author: Terry S.
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity
content: My parents decided to purchase an office chair for my husband and I. We are both in college and were desperate for a functional and inexpensive office chair. I did some searching and came upon this one. The reviews sold me! We have had this chair for a month. It took 10 minutes to put together, with the help of two kids under 5, and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity, the chair cushion is very comfortable, and the back of the chair provides ample support. The seat height adjusts easily as well.  I am pregnant with our third child and back support is what we were definitely lacking with our other chair. This one does the job! Don't hesitate to get it. The green is beautiful, and it is a high quality chair with an excellent price range. I got a floor protector to go under it because it sits on wood floors.
author: cmmd
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Not Good for Home Office
content: I bought this chair to use in my home office, but ended up returning it because of how terribly uncomfortable it was. While assembling the chair I noticed that the screws to attach the seat to the base were too long to fully fasten the two pieces together. This caused the seat to be wobbly. I couldn't sit in the chair for more than 15 minutes without retreating to my couch. I ended up packaging this up for a return and purchasing a different chair from Office Depot that I could try in-store. I would not recommend this chair for people who work from home at all.
author: Morgan124
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: It's okay but....
content: If I had tried sitting in this chair at a brick and mortar store, I probably would not have bought it. I bought it to use while machine sewing and it's okay.  It was easy to assemble - I did it in about 5 or 6 minutes.  It rolls pretty good, the back gives pretty good support but the seat is not as comfortable as I would like it to be. If I sit in the chair over 45 minutes, when I stand up my backside kind of hurts. I'm 65 years old and really like to sew, so this chair will get a lot of use, but I will need to space out how long I sit at one time. It came well packaged, the instructions were easy to read, and it was cheap enough. If you are looking for a chair that you will sit in a lot, you might want to go with a higher end purchase.
author: Beady Eyed
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Comfy desk chair that's easy to assemble, and a great value
content: This is a surprisingly comfortable desk chair. It comes in one box that contains five wheels, a hub, pneumatic  lift, seat and back. Everything you need to put this together is in the box, including the 4 screws and allen wrench. The plate the goes on the base of the chair is imprinted with the word "FRONT" on it and it will face the lable that says "FRONT" which is glued to the bottom of the seat. Screw in the plate, put it on top of the hydrolic lift and You're done. It is lightweight but solid. Rolls wonderfully easy and is really comfortable. I have one office with just a straight back folding chair and this is like having a limo by comparison. This chair is a very functional chair with a very doable price.
author: Mark H ✨
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Great little chair
content: Great little chair, and I do mean little. It is best for a smaller person. I am 5' 11" 180 pound and it is fine with me but my daughter who is 5' 6" 100 lbs fits a lot better on it. Also, it has enough padding, contrary to what others say. I guess it matters how much "natural" padding you begin with in your backside.
author: Penguin
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Perfect chair
content: It took me (a 70-year old woman) less than five minutes to put this together. It is comfortable and lightweight -- every bit as nice as the Aeron chair I used have in my old office at work.  And certainly a lot less. $39.99 for this chair is a steal.
author: alto606
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Poor Quality
content: This is the poorest quality chair.  It is an Amazon Basic so I thought the fact that they had their name on it that it would make a difference.  It broke within 2 weeks and Amazon replaced for free without any hassle.  The replacement chair is now doing the same thing and will tear up soon.  The seat pad is made of particle board and the bolt screws into that which is not a good idea at all.
author: Meriem
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Cheap, thin, foam seat cushion. Butt pain!
content: Beware the positive reviews. This chair is NOT comfortable for long periods, contrary to what you read in the reviews. I was duped. The chair would be perfect for my needs, but it has one glaring flaw: The cheap foam seat cushion is very thin and quickly bottoms out when sitting in it. The cushion just cannot support the weight of a human. I can only sit in it for about 30 minutes at a time until I can feel the seat base digging into my butt. Fortunately, I have a sit-down/stand-up desk, so the chair is only needed part time (which is the main reason I was shopping at this price point). Returning the chair is a no-go due to the hassle involved. I'll probably just take it to Goodwill. I've been pleased with all the Amazon Basics products I've purchased so far, except this. Amazon: Plush out that seat cushion, and you have a winner at this price point. Otherwise it's a turd.
author: Dennis
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Excellent No-Frills Computer/Office Chair
content: So far this chair is excellent. Nice and thick cushion on the bottom and good back support. It only has height adjustment and is very basic, but it feels well made and it is comfortable. I switched from an executive chair that had the splitting fake leather (only 5 years old, not the best quality). I prefer a chair without arms so I can scoot up to the desk, and the mesh back is much more breathable. I use this AmazonBasics chair for programming and development. It's not the kind of chair you want if you like to lean back and consume media on your computer, but for computer tasks it is great. I use a similar chair 8 hours a day at work, but it isn't as good as this one. I may replace it with this chair as well.
author: N. Vogt
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Worth every penny!
content: This chair is perfect for use at my sewing machine...I don't need a lot of padding or expensive features. I use it in my sewing room, which has industrial-type carpeting, and the chair rolls around fine but never gets away from me. It has a seat back that encourages good posture. You couldn't buy a chair from a store this good, and though I hated buying such an item without actually being able to sit in it, this one is pretty (red!) and very comfortable.
author: Terry S.
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity
content: My parents decided to purchase an office chair for my husband and I. We are both in college and were desperate for a functional and inexpensive office chair. I did some searching and came upon this one. The reviews sold me! We have had this chair for a month. It took 10 minutes to put together, with the help of two kids under 5, and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity, the chair cushion is very comfortable, and the back of the chair provides ample support. The seat height adjusts easily as well.  I am pregnant with our third child and back support is what we were definitely lacking with our other chair. This one does the job! Don't hesitate to get it. The green is beautiful, and it is a high quality chair with an excellent price range. I got a floor protector to go under it because it sits on wood floors.
author: cmmd
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Not Good for Home Office
content: I bought this chair to use in my home office, but ended up returning it because of how terribly uncomfortable it was. While assembling the chair I noticed that the screws to attach the seat to the base were too long to fully fasten the two pieces together. This caused the seat to be wobbly. I couldn't sit in the chair for more than 15 minutes without retreating to my couch. I ended up packaging this up for a return and purchasing a different chair from Office Depot that I could try in-store. I would not recommend this chair for people who work from home at all.
author: Morgan124
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: It's okay but....
content: If I had tried sitting in this chair at a brick and mortar store, I probably would not have bought it. I bought it to use while machine sewing and it's okay.  It was easy to assemble - I did it in about 5 or 6 minutes.  It rolls pretty good, the back gives pretty good support but the seat is not as comfortable as I would like it to be. If I sit in the chair over 45 minutes, when I stand up my backside kind of hurts. I'm 65 years old and really like to sew, so this chair will get a lot of use, but I will need to space out how long I sit at one time. It came well packaged, the instructions were easy to read, and it was cheap enough. If you are looking for a chair that you will sit in a lot, you might want to go with a higher end purchase.
author: Beady Eyed
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Comfy desk chair that's easy to assemble, and a great value
content: This is a surprisingly comfortable desk chair. It comes in one box that contains five wheels, a hub, pneumatic  lift, seat and back. Everything you need to put this together is in the box, including the 4 screws and allen wrench. The plate the goes on the base of the chair is imprinted with the word "FRONT" on it and it will face the lable that says "FRONT" which is glued to the bottom of the seat. Screw in the plate, put it on top of the hydrolic lift and You're done. It is lightweight but solid. Rolls wonderfully easy and is really comfortable. I have one office with just a straight back folding chair and this is like having a limo by comparison. This chair is a very functional chair with a very doable price.
author: Mark H ✨
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Great little chair
content: Great little chair, and I do mean little. It is best for a smaller person. I am 5' 11" 180 pound and it is fine with me but my daughter who is 5' 6" 100 lbs fits a lot better on it. Also, it has enough padding, contrary to what others say. I guess it matters how much "natural" padding you begin with in your backside.
author: Penguin
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Perfect chair
content: It took me (a 70-year old woman) less than five minutes to put this together. It is comfortable and lightweight -- every bit as nice as the Aeron chair I used have in my old office at work.  And certainly a lot less. $39.99 for this chair is a steal.
author: alto606
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Poor Quality
content: This is the poorest quality chair.  It is an Amazon Basic so I thought the fact that they had their name on it that it would make a difference.  It broke within 2 weeks and Amazon replaced for free without any hassle.  The replacement chair is now doing the same thing and will tear up soon.  The seat pad is made of particle board and the bolt screws into that which is not a good idea at all.
author: Meriem
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: Cheap, thin, foam seat cushion. Butt pain!
content: Beware the positive reviews. This chair is NOT comfortable for long periods, contrary to what you read in the reviews. I was duped. The chair would be perfect for my needs, but it has one glaring flaw: The cheap foam seat cushion is very thin and quickly bottoms out when sitting in it. The cushion just cannot support the weight of a human. I can only sit in it for about 30 minutes at a time until I can feel the seat base digging into my butt. Fortunately, I have a sit-down/stand-up desk, so the chair is only needed part time (which is the main reason I was shopping at this price point). Returning the chair is a no-go due to the hassle involved. I'll probably just take it to Goodwill. I've been pleased with all the Amazon Basics products I've purchased so far, except this. Amazon: Plush out that seat cushion, and you have a winner at this price point. Otherwise it's a turd.
author: Dennis
product: AmazonBasics Low-Back, Upholstered Mesh, Adjustable, Swivel Computer Office Desk Chair, Black

title: THE BAD The seat cushion has gone completely flat and is ...
content: My review after owning and using this chair everyday for one year. THE BAD The seat cushion has gone completely flat and is completely useless after one year. Feels like I'm sitting on wooden bleacher seats. This is the reason I gave only one star.  The sole purpose of a chair is to comfortably hold your bottom. The GOOD The chair itself has actually held up very well. The back, arms and tilt function all work perfectly with no signs of wear. If you buy this, buy an additional seat cushion as well.  Trust me on this one.
author: D. Boz
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Small but sturdy, comfy too!
content: Very sturdy, super easy assembly, with clear instruction (words and drawings).  Parts labeled well and even a little packet of 'extra parts'.  We bought this as a student chair knowing it was not going to be as big as our large high-back office chairs.  It is small, but as I said, very sturdy and the lever to raise and lower is awesome.  Casters roll well and the seat and back are nicely padded and very comfortable.  Only down side is that it is a small chair so don't expect a big-guy sized chair.  Perfect for a woman or student with a small frame.  We love it.  The photo shows this chair next to our standard full-sized office chair.  The back on this one is 19" from seat to top of the back.
author: jaime
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Another great deal for the money.
content: I'll admit that when I bought this chair I didn't even pay attention to the fact that it said "AmazonBasics" in the title.  But as it turns out, Amazing must have contracted some Chinese company to build them stuff in their name.  And as such, you can bet that the quailty of the item will actually be rather good.  Why would Amazon put their name on garbage? This chair is a fantastic value.  It was easy to put together, came with an Allen key and all if the hardware was in small, separate baggies that were labeled and the instructions were very well written and very easy to understand.  I had the chair together in under ten minutes while moving at a leisurely pace.  On top of this, the bolts came with blue thread locker already on them.  I know that isn't a huge deal to most people, but it means something to me.  It shows they want you to have this thing in one piece for a long time. The chair looks and feels like something you'd have in a professional office.  The faux leather is well made and quite comfortable.  The adjustment on it works very well and over all, the chair feels like it should cost much closer to the $100 mark. Make no mistake, this isnt some $300 chair, but at the same time, it isn't trying to be.  I basically bought this thing to sit in front of our computer that we almost never use.  So, in reality, I almost bought it just to complete my office.  So, if you have a home office and want a chair that's very comfortable, looks good but don't care about the lack of head rest and don't want to break the bank, this is the one. I actually work in front of a computer all day long, and this is a chair I wouldn't mind having there.  I'd probably miss the head rest after a bit, but this is something I would use in a professional setting.
author: Grayson Gilman
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Second time buying it! Great chair and very affordable.
content: This is a great chair for the price. Chairs exactly like this one go for over 100 dollars at target and Walmart (I did some shopping around before I chose this one). I always dread setting up furniture but this was the easiest peice I have ever had to assemble. The chair feels sturdy and is very comfortable. I have had this chair now for over a year and I also bought it for my brother for his room. Neither of us have had any issues with it and it seems to be great quality. The wheels have no problems on thick carpet or hardwood. My brother spends countless hours gaming in it and loves it! It’s large and I like to sit cross legged in it to help my back posture when I’m on the computer. I use it mostly however to sit in it daily to do my makeup in front of my wall mirror.
author: Janette Kopec
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Great For Occasional Home Office Use, Not For Full Timers...
content: I don't see many reviews regarding using this chair as a full time work chair.  It is probably because most companies provide decent seating for their employees, however just in case there is another that believes buying the cheapest chair possible for someone that sits in it full time I wanted to be sure that this review was there for them.  Invest some money in your employees chairs, they will be much more willing to work for you.  This chair is not meant for someone who spends a significant amount of time in it.  It has been a week and both armrests broke.  The chair has leaned to one side sine I got it and the seat back has never been able to be locked into an upright position.  This is a great chair for doing bills once a month (which given the price is obvious), however full time use doesn't seem to be its intent.
author: Marty
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Chair arm broke after a week. You pay for what you get with AmazonBasics
content: Got this chair for my new apartment, and it was great for one week until the arm broke. I'm not a big person, 5'8"/130, so I was surprised when the arm just snapped when I pushed on it getting up out of the seat. I read the other comments about the padding and height, but since I'm on the lighter side I figured I could make it work. The back is short, and the padding is a bit thin, but both are relatively good at this price point. If not for this defect it would be a solid chair at a reasonable price. I don't seem to be the only one with the arm-break issue, just be aware of the realities of cheaper products. Also, it's annoying that the only options for full refund or replacement require you to send the item back - a desk chair isn't exactly the easiest thing to ship back. Update: Called Amazon, was able to get a partial refund and keep the broken chair, but was surprised that I couldn't just get a replacement part for the broken arm. I sort of assumed that since it was their brand (AmazonBasics) that they'd have an army of these things and their corresponding parts for replacements, but that's apparently not an option. Silver lining is that luckily mine broke within a week so I was still able to get Amazon's help with the partial refund, but next time I shop on Amazon I think I'll be avoiding anything branded AmazonBasics.
author: Calvin
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: DO NOT BUY. Extremely uncomfortable. Rigid, sharp edge just under padding, presses into spine around mid-lower back.
content: Possibly the least comfortable chair I've ever owned. There's what feels like a sharp, rigid edge, just underneath the upper padding (picture the edge of a piece of plywood) running across the back, roughly at the level of the seam in the middle of the back. The padding is completely inadequate and does not even cover the structural material of the chair. Sitting in this thing for an hour means back pain. After two weeks of using this chair, my back HURTS. For what it's worth, I'm not a big person. I'm 5'10 and 140 pounds. I don't usually have problems finding reasonably comfortable, supportive chairs. If you are large, or if you have a specific medical need for an ergonomic chair with back support... Or, if you're breathing. If you can read this, you need to avoid the AmazonBasics Mid-Back Office Chair.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Good looking chair, but weak armrest (read updates)
content: I cannot recommend the chair to daily users. Barely 2 days after assembling the chair, I managed to crack the right side armrest as I was shifting my weight to correct my posture; I barely weigh 155lbs and the armrest didn't even bear my full weight before buckling. It's such a shame. The chair looks decent, feels good, and was easy to assemble; it's just that the armrests are terribly brittle. Currently in the process of getting a replacement armrest sent out by Amazon (hopefully). Will update my review with how that goes. (Update) Amazon offered a 35% refund, a refund the cost of the replacement part, a free replacement, or a full refund. I decided to go with a free replacement. (Updated 2) It's now late June 2017 and the replacement chair is still going strong. I suspect the original run of these had weak/defective arm rests that have since been corrected. Overall the chair looks immaculate except for a few minor cosmetic defects: first the vinyl on my left arm rest has begun to fray, a problem that continued use will exacerbate until I patch it. Second, the screw hole plugs repeatedly fall out, they're simply too loose to fit snugly into their holes. Other than that, it's proven to be durable and looks new at a glance, so I'll bump this up to a 3-star product (original 2-star) as its proven to be durable.
author: Spartan VI
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Will last LESS than 6 Months. DO NOT BUY!!!
content: I bought this chair in April for my desk at home where I work remotely. I was really happy with the comfort & ease of construction for the first three weeks but that's when signs of wear and tear started. 1 month into buying this chair, the pleather started to rip off the seat cushion. At 5 months (as seen in pics), you can see how worn the front of the cushion is and how it's about to fall off. (This is WITH bi-weekly wipe downs too to make sure the white is still clean) I was OK with using this chair with a ripped cushion... that is until this last week where the bolts holding the back on have stopped holding. The screws/bolts are wayyy too short for this chair to be stable for a long period of time, they're less than an inch long and are barely long enough to reach through the frame to the cushion. In fact, I can't even get the bolts back in due to the chair back warping to my back. PROS: -was handy for a month? -elbow cushions are nice CONS: -wears extremely fast -will break within the first couple months -seat cushion rips & flattens within the first month -pretty sure it's not stable for bigger people, I'm 150 lbs and the back frame started to warp under my pressure. All in all, this chair would have been worth it with if it would've lasted at LEAST a year!! Instead, at 5-6 months-- this chair is a terrible choice & a waste of money since it will be going into the trash today. 10/10 do not recommend getting this chair unless you're only going to use it for decor.
author: M
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Beautiful Chair for Great Price
content: Wife wanted comfortable/movable chair with firm cushion and straight back for post surgery recovery.  She is 5-1, 125lbs.  At low seat height and the back up straight with no backward lean she finds this chair will be ideal for her several months of recovery.  No need for a high back model.  Our other chairs and sofa are too soft and lean back.  This chair can lean back if desired with a quick pull out of the control lever.  The padded arms are very nice and soft.  She was immediately attracted to the photo on the Amazon page.  It is even more classy appearing in person.  She is very happy with this purchase!
author: Baka Gaijin
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: THE BAD The seat cushion has gone completely flat and is ...

Trust me on this one.

product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

author: Baka Gaijin
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Good if you only need a chair for a month
content: The fabric/pleather on this chair has torn after a month of daily use. It was super comfortable, relatively easy to assemble, and I really enjoyed it for the time it was functioning. I would like to return the product but can’t ship it, especially with the pandemic. I never write reviews but this purchase ended up being a bummer. Give me my money back without a return Mr. Bezos, or send me a new chair.
author: Idk
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Unfortunate
content: Received chair and all of the parts for assembly are zippered into the back of it (unfortunately)- it makes little sense to do this. After unzipping the back I noticed one of the zippers teeth were missing and subsequently the zipper went off it’s track and came apart. I continued putting the chair together and figured I would try and deal with the zipper later. The chair itself was simple to assemble. However it took a lot of finagling to get the zipper back together and it will still require a dab of glue to keep its hold. If your wondering why I did not return the chair - it’s because it took weeks to get to me in the first place and I didn’t want to wait for the exchange as I needed an office chair. Had really hoped for a better experience.
author: Jen P
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Wrong parts and unusable
content: Came with incorrect mount for seat
author: Smelvin
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Great Office Chair for the money
content: After reading all of the reviews I decided to purchase the AmazonBasics office chair. I like the fact that it is light weight to move yet very sturdy to sit in. It does start to feel hard after a few hours of sitting in it. The seat height adjustment is great to have and works well. I lower the seat to put on my shoes and raise it again while sitting at the computer. There were a few comments about the vinyl covering. It looks very nice and feels very soft. I don't know how long the covering will last. All-in-all the AmazonBasics office chair is a good value for the money. Be careful when installing the seat to armrest screws. They will strip on you and/or the threads will pull out the chair stuffing if you miss the hole while turning the screws in.
author: AzIronman
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: the chair back rest was hollow
content: the back rest was hollow, when i received the product in the box all the parts were inside the back rest zipped up. once i removed the parts there was no padding. I had to use a harbor freight moving blanket folded up and stuffed inside the back rest which now makes it perfect. :) but still wtf you dont buy a desk chair and expect the back rest to be thick and hollow like really this isnt a pinata. Only buy if you have a spare blanket you dont want and would like to use as internal padding for the chair. but overall with the harbor freight blanket i stuffed it with its a really nice chair lol ...................note harbor freight moving blankets is like 5$ just an fyi (decent padding folded up makes lots of padding)
author: daniel lomas
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Worth the money
content: I'm a small framed woman, originally I was a little worried to assemble this, but it was no problem at all for me. All the parts needed for assembly were in the back of the chair, and the instructions were easy to understand. Once put together, first thing I took note was how supportive and comfortable this chair is.. I have to work 9+ hours from home every day, so having a supportive comfortable chair is a must need for me. I would recommend this chair.
author: Jordan Wood
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Nice office chair
content: So glad I purchased this chair for work at home during pandemic. It’s compact but comfy. Good price. I waited a bit longer in order to get the brown color and I’m glad I did. Fits the room decor nicely. Thanks Amazon Basics!
author: Philsphan
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Tears easily
content: I used the chair for about 3 weeks and there is already a tear in the seam of the seat.
author: Carli
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Arrived quickly, mostly comfortable
content: The office chair arrived two days early, which was nice since I needed it for work on Monday.  Took 30-45 minutes to put together and the instructions were easy to follow.  There is a discreperancy -- the Amazon page says it can take 275 lb. load, while the assembly instructions say 265 lb.  It's preventing the back pain I was getting with my old dining room chair.
author: sadatoni
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Cheap plastic zipper! Dont buy!
content: I bought this for my daughter's desk since they will be online schooling for the foreseeable future. We waited almost a month for delivery and are greatly disappointed the zipper broke when we tried to close it.  We are returning it and ordering a different chair that hopefully comes sooner.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Brown

title: Stylish and comfy but marked on
content: We love the chair itself - very stylish and comfortable. The one complaint is it arrived with some faded blue/dark marks that we can’t seem to get to come off.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Hight of seat Hydrolic totally failed after 7 months. Sitting at lowest level...
content: I thought I found the right chair and was very pleased until 7 months of light use the seat lowered to its lowest position never to be adjusted again.  I now sit very low and will seek another chair.  I am 190lbs and seldom use this chair. Beware of AmazonBasics QUALITY issues! Very disappointed as this has the Amazon brand. Live and learn.
author: JeToss
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Trendy, quality
content: Really trendy and quality chair. I love how it looks and has good support. Highly recommend.
author: K. Anderson
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great Chair
content: Great looking chair! Easy to assemble and feel sturdy even after about a month of use. Not to buyers that it does not recline and has you sit in a pretty upright position but I still find it comfortable for extended periods as it has great back support.
author: Charles
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Nice item, but came defective
content: The chair looks nice and is comfortable. However, the seat cushion came with a small rip, though it was covered in a plastic wrap. It doesn't affect my daily use so I decided not to return it given the hassle. But given this experience, I am much less likely to buy AmazonBasics items going forward.
author: Jisoo Kim
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Good Chair
content: This is a good chair, but for an extra $20 I could buy this better chair. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B005SFZ32W/?coliid=I1VXR4GMUF5Z7S&colid=2JK9O5HAC80WW&psc=1&ref_=lv_ov_lig_dp_it
author: Jamie
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Better than the photos
content: This chair exceeded my expectations. It came in a heavy box so I had to take pieces of it upstairs a few at a time.. That said, it is solid metal and sturdy. I expect it will last for a long time. I got the white colour which is actually slightly off-white, and not a problem. No marks, beautiful finish, soft material. Really amazing quality for this price. Amazing quality for any price, actually. I recommend it.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great
content: Bought this for my home office that is getting daily use. Great design and it looks nice in my space. It's as comfortable as you would expect. I would recommend a floor protector if you have carpet under your desk.
author: Beth S
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Awesome chair!
content: I love this chair besides being super stylish is also very comfortable. It is now September and I’ve been using it at home every day since my job sent us to work from home mid March. Still standing strong or sitting should say.
author: Natalin
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Attractive chair. Sometimes comfortable
content: Attractive in my home office with white desk, bookshelves, table, etc. Pretty rigid chair that is sometimes appreciated, sometimes not. I worry it will be hot in the summer but too early to tell.
author: Cush
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

content: We love the chair itself - very stylish and comfortable. The one complaint is it arrived with some faded blue/dark marks that we can’t seem to get to come off.

product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style
