author: Natalin
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Attractive chair. Sometimes comfortable
content: Attractive in my home office with white desk, bookshelves, table, etc. Pretty rigid chair that is sometimes appreciated, sometimes not. I worry it will be hot in the summer but too early to tell.
author: Cush
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - White, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: HORRIBLY uncomfortable 😡
content: This chair is horribly uncomfortable.  It looks nice, was fairly easy to assemble, but that's about it.  Padding on both seat and back very thin with little cushioning.  Seat almost has a "rounded" shape so it sort of feels like you're sitting on a jump. I can not recommend this chair. I'd like to return it but I tossed the box so not sure if it's worth the hassle.  I only blame myself for being cheap and not trying out a chair before buying.  Do yourself (and your back) a favor and look elsewhere
author: Scott Gerstein
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Half real leather and half fake leather!
content: I was surprised to learn that only the outer most surface of the seat and back is leather.  All of the other “leather” parts are actually faux leather.  I contacted the seller about it and they confirmed.  So knowing that, it seems a bit pricy to me.
author: Morgan
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great value
content: My chair arrived yesterday and I'm very pleased with the purchase. The chair looks very high end for the price. Assembly was easy with one person and the instructions were clear.  I haven't had the chair for long but it is sturdy and comfortable (and I am a heavier bottomed person). It took me a little bit of experimenting to figure out the tilt lock mechanism (You need to pull the height adjustment lever out, with the tension loosened in order to tilt back), but now that I have it works well and feels well-built and secure. Without yet being able to offer an opinion about durability over time, I think this chair is a great deal and so far I'm very happy with it.
author: Sarah Melchior
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great looking but VERY noisy
content: So, at the end of the day this is a $150 chair.  "you get what you pay for".  This chair is very good looking and the material seems durable enough after 90 days of use.  The main issue is the noise!  When you lean back in the chair it makes a loud pop as if 2 pieces of metal are breaking away from each other.  Any side to side movement brings out creeks galore.  It's an exceptional bargain at $150 but don't anticipate that you're getting an exceptional deal on a $300+ chair. I'm 6'1, 200ish lbs.  I can only assume that the smaller you are the less noisy it might be but can't be for sure.
author: roballen51
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Narrow seat and arms and not made for large bodies
content: Assembly was fairly easy but one bolt for the seat cross threaded and stripped so isn't held in now (but it's okay as the weight from it is from above) but those bolt holes design is not ideal. The other issue is that the seat is a bit narrow and the chrome armrest supports make this chair unfit for heavier people as they would dig into their thighs; I'm not large at all at 157 lbs, but just be aware if purchasing this chair.
author: Gainsborough
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Looks good
content: I sit on this chair all day, it kills my back. I haven't had that issue with previous chairs. I think they look great and are good quality for the price. They creak as well, i bought two of these and both of them are creaky, i play with the tension in the fasteners on the armrests and that berks a bit, but not completely. UPDATE: Two months later from the above message and all remains true. My chair is only more creaky at this point and the back pain is only getting worse. What little padding on the seat portion is almost completely compressed. These chairs are a $280 (I bought 2) waste of money. I will be getting rid of these.
author: Eric Haltom
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Almost great chair
content: This chair looks great. My only complaints are that the instructions are not very intuitive and that may have led to mistakes in set up. Included in the instructions are notices to not tighten certain screws completely. But which step do these notices correspond to? And more importantly, which screws? The tilt lock out and tension adjustment functions also do not seem to work as displayed in the instructions. Whether this was due to a problem in manufacturing or assembly is difficult to say. In either event, the problem seems avoidable and prevents this chair from being perfect.
author: Ryan
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Pretty but uncomfortable.
content: Easy to step up - looks gorgeous, but is absolutely horrible to use. After a month I can safely say it is the least comfortable office chair I have personally ever owned. The padding is ultra weak and ends up feeling like I’m simply sitting on the particle board which sits like .75in under the bottom part of the seat. I would avoid at all costs if you plan on using this chair for more than 30 minutes at a time.
author: Erik C.
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Screw holes misthreaded
content: This is a great chair, however I was sad when I received the last one in stock and two of the screw holes were misthreaded, so I couldn't properly tighten the screws that secure the chair to the base. This makes the chair quite wobbly, which is very annoying. I am sure if these holes were properly threaded this would not be an issue, but I cannot exchange the item because it was the last one. If it were properly threaded, I would give this product 5 stars hands down, but sadly I cannot.
author: Brett Thigpen
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Wow this chair is squeaky
content: Looks great, comfortable enough... but it. is. so. loud. The hardware even had some sort of loctite on it, but it's still loud. I've loosened and re-tightened a few times. I'm 190 pounds and when I sit and rock it sounds like I have a sumo wrestler in my lap. The squeaks come from multiple points. I can't stress how loud this chair is.
author: Billy Davis
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: HORRIBLY uncomfortable 😡
content: This chair is horribly uncomfortable.  It looks nice, was fairly easy to assemble, but that's about it.  Padding on both seat and back very thin with little cushioning. author: Billy Davis
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Brick Red, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Sturdy, looks nice... not comfortable for long term use
content: Definitely check the box for all parts! The first chair I received was missing one bolt, and one washer. Also, the center the center hydraulic post was damaged. It would not rise with lever. Received second chair, all parts were included this time. Chair is basically easy to assemble, arms are suprising heavy and sturdy. Wheels are surprisingly cheap for the price point of this chair. Even with mate wheels are loud and clumsy! Chair is not comfortable for long days or nights in front of the computer. I would not want this chair as my work chair. Hours on this thing would not be productive. Gaming or School maybe, only for the fact your not going to fall asleep in this chair that's for sure. Chair is perfect for home use, sturdy and looks nice! Great for short term daily use. The padding on chair is NOT plush.
author: Daniel Garay
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very uncomfortable, but aesthetically pleasing
content: I purchased the grey color and have used it for about 8 months now.  The chair itself is sturdy but lacks cushioning on the bottom and the seat portion is too long making it difficult to sit comfortably where my back, thighs and hips are content for longer than 20 minutes.  Also the lack of adjustable arm rests makes it more awkward when positioned at my desk.  Next time I will only purchase from a brick/mortar store where I can try multiple chairs for a best fit.
author: Rob
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very happy with this office chair!
content: Bought this for my wife as she wanted something that was "pretty" to replace an office chair that recently broke.  The assembly went fairly smoothly and the only slight issues where the heaviness of the items and putting it together.  With that said, it did go together easily and smoothly.  It's just a decently heavy, sturdy chair.  My wife loves the comfort and ease of use and most importantly that it is a "pretty" chair.  Very well made chair, we definitely recommend.
author: Scott
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very firm, looks great, great price
content: Very firm, looks great, great price. Replaced a much more expensive office chair from HON. Was worried the chair would be flimsy from the pictures, but it's very firm and solid. Assembly was very easy compared to the more expensive chair that this chair replaced. Enjoying the chair probably depends on if you prefer firm seating, which this chair definitely delivers.
author: JamesDM
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Nice addition the home office.
content: Very easy to assemble.  Chair is comfortable and does offer a sleek look for the home in-office. It offers enough back support (as someone who doesn’t have significant back problems).  Not a chair that will recline easily which does increase the support from my view.
author: D. Mo
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Extremely Uncomfortable seat padding way too thin.
content: If you need to sit on a chair for more than hour don't get this. The seat padding is not anywhere near sufficient for all day work. It's a nice chair otherwise bit if you can't sit on it what's the point. I had to get a thick seat cushion to sit on it for any length of time.
author: James
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great value
content: For the price I dont know if you'll find a better chair. I did have to purchase different rubber casters to not scratch the floor but that's with any budget chair. I would say the quality is worth twice the price they are selling it for
author: Eric Boyle
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Love this chair!
content: Easy to assemble. Sleek/Modern. Firm support. Rolls smoothly. Good lumbar support. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!
author: Sparkles
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great Chair so far
content: I got this chair for my daughter, and she really likes it a lot, it is sturdy, made from good materials, and seems that will last a long time. I will update this review if anything changes. So far, I can highly recommend it!
author: Luis L.
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: The best purchase I’ve ever made in my entire life!
content: This chair is a game changer! The gray is soft and luscious, but also the force is Luxury in pristine condition. I am grateful and get surprised at how beautiful it looks on my luxury office.
author: Dr. Jamal
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Sturdy, looks nice... not comfortable for long term use
content: Definitely check the box for all parts! The first chair I received was missing one bolt, and one washer. Also, the center the center hydraulic post was damaged. It would not rise with lever. Received second chair, all parts were included this time. Chair is basically easy to assemble, arms are suprising heavy and sturdy. Wheels are surprisingly cheap for the price point of this chair. Even with mate wheels are loud and clumsy! Chair is not comfortable for long days or nights in front of the computer. I would not want this chair as my work chair. Hours on this thing would not be productive. Gaming or School maybe, only for the fact your not going to fall asleep in this chair that's for sure. Chair is perfect for home use, sturdy and looks nice! Great for short term daily use. The padding on chair is NOT plush.
author: Daniel Garay
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very uncomfortable, but aesthetically pleasing
content: I purchased the grey color and have used it for about 8 months now.  The chair itself is sturdy but lacks cushioning on the bottom and the seat portion is too long making it difficult to sit comfortably where my back, thighs and hips are content for longer than 20 minutes.  Also the lack of adjustable arm rests makes it more awkward when positioned at my desk.  Next time I will only purchase from a brick/mortar store where I can try multiple chairs for a best fit.
author: Rob
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very happy with this office chair!
content: Bought this for my wife as she wanted something that was "pretty" to replace an office chair that recently broke.  The assembly went fairly smoothly and the only slight issues where the heaviness of the items and putting it together.  With that said, it did go together easily and smoothly.  It's just a decently heavy, sturdy chair.  My wife loves the comfort and ease of use and most importantly that it is a "pretty" chair.  Very well made chair, we definitely recommend.
author: Scott
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Very firm, looks great, great price
content: Very firm, looks great, great price. Replaced a much more expensive office chair from HON. Was worried the chair would be flimsy from the pictures, but it's very firm and solid. Assembly was very easy compared to the more expensive chair that this chair replaced. Enjoying the chair probably depends on if you prefer firm seating, which this chair definitely delivers.
author: JamesDM
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Nice addition the home office.
content: Very easy to assemble.  Chair is comfortable and does offer a sleek look for the home in-office. It offers enough back support (as someone who doesn’t have significant back problems).  Not a chair that will recline easily which does increase the support from my view.
author: D. Mo
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Extremely Uncomfortable seat padding way too thin.
content: If you need to sit on a chair for more than hour don't get this. The seat padding is not anywhere near sufficient for all day work. It's a nice chair otherwise bit if you can't sit on it what's the point. I had to get a thick seat cushion to sit on it for any length of time.
author: James
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Great value
content: For the price I dont know if you'll find a better chair. I did have to purchase different rubber casters to not scratch the floor but that's with any budget chair. I would say the quality is worth twice the price they are selling it for
author: Eric Boyle
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Swivel Office Desk Chair with Ribbed Puresoft Upholstery - Grey, Lumbar Support, Modern Style

title: Lots of Support for Very Long Hours
content: I ordered this chair because my recent office chair broke, and I needed a stronger and more comfortable option. I received the chair in a very well packaged box, with each piece carefully wrapped in either bubble wrap or cardboard. Assembly was very easy, taking me only 10 minutes, utilizing all their tools provided in the box with no need for my own tools. Once I finished assembling the chair, I tightened all the screws to make sure it was sturdy, and it was ready to go. The first night I had the chair I spent a couple hours on it doing homework, and with the knob in the first locked position it allowed the chair to keep me having good posture while also being super comfortable. I've also used the chair while watching a movie and playing games for hours, unlocking the knob and leaning back in the chair, allowing me to look up at the tv without any strain on my neck or back, and also providing me with enough comfort to relax. This chair is amazing for every use, no matter what it's needed for. It's very high quality for one of the cheaper options out there. I'll continue to use it constantly throughout my school year, for my many nights of long hours doing work. 10/10 Product.
author: Micha
product: Office Chair, Mesh Office Computer Swivel Desk Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

title: Brand New But Looks Good
content: This chair arrived a day earlier than predicted and very nicely packaged in a compact, high-grade corrugated box. Everything was well protected to eliminate any risk of damage. The piece-part HW includes 10 screws, 4 washer, and a decent allen wrench to tighten everything down (no additional tools required once you have the box open). The instructions are not excessively detailed but more than adequate for anyone that's ever put anything together in their life. It took me about 20 minutes at a gentle pace not trying to beat the clock. (If I were to race the clock on the next one I think I could put this together in about 7 minutes.) Everything goes together very nicely. The casters simply pop into the 5 legs and are held there with a pre-attached lock ring. There's a slotted tab along with two retention screws that attach the back to the armrests. It's a decent design and seems very stable. I'm not sure I like the fact that the armrests are not adjustable, but I knew that when I ordered it and they are at a good height for me once assembled. All in all the chair is very stable and very comfortable. I like the way it rocks back with just the right amount of pressure set as I spend a lot of time on business Skype calls and it allows me to change position when necessary. Haven't really tested the effectiveness of the built in lumbar support yet. I looked at big-box stores before buying this chair and the sticker shock forced me to Amazon. This chair is a GREAT bargain at $69.99 from what I can tell with only minimal use thus far. Granted... it's not a Herman Miller office chair but it is adequate for my occasional home office use and $400 cheaper!
author: Chopper
product: Office Chair, Mesh Office Computer Swivel Desk Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

title: Sweet chair
content: I needed an office chair that would be comfortable, able to breath and of course, some what cost effective.  I read the reviews of others, looked and the pics and decided to jump in.  I was not let down with the product!  Arrived on time, packaging was perfect and no damage.  Once I opened the package, I was able to see the quality of the chair.  The instructions were spot on.  It actually took me about 20 minutes to assemble with no issues.  I've been using the chair for about two weeks and completely happy with it.  In my opinion, if you need a cost effective chair that is comfortable and easy to assemble, this is it.

content: Very nice chair for home office. Very easy to put together for a stroke patient with limited use of right hand. I’ve purchased other types of chairs from Staples and paid for there service to put together never again. Thank You!

product: Office Chair, Mesh Office Computer Swivel Desk Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

My only complaint is the seat cushion is a little thin/soft. They are a great option for short meetings though. I will probably be buying more of them.

title: Great task chair!
content: Ok, Received it and at briefly had a scare the box was rather small. After opening it and beginning to pull out the parts I then realized why. They put the majority of the parts in the backrest. I embarked on the journey of assembly. Before I knew it I was done! 15 minutes flat! All required tools where included. Once assembled I began running it through the paces. Good height adjustment. Decent lean. Firm seating, I love this as too much padding breaks down. Overall an A+ Will be using this as my chair near my desk for quite a while! Thanks  SmugChair!

title: Good for home office.
content: Works perfectly for my home office.  There’s quite a few parts but assembly is pretty easy.  The chair raises, lowers, and rolls smoothly.

product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

title: Sleek and durable chair at an amazing price point! You should consider it!!
content: This box arrived quickly and the box and inner packaging was in acceptional condition. The assembly was easy and the directions were clear to follow or any skill level. Once the chair was assembled it felt very durable and comfortable. We are excited to use it in the family office and it looks very clean and sleek as well. I recommend this chair to anyone looking for high quality at an affordable price. We need to replace a few other desk chairs in our home and this will be our choice.
author: Tracy Wicklund
product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

title: Great chair which does not take too much space!
content: This chair is exactly what i am looking for: easy to assemble, compact, and comfortable. Even better it is half the price I paid for my previous chair which was too bunky for my bedroom. The chair was neatly packaged and delivered with no damages. All the tools and materials are stored in the back of the chair. They even provide you with extra screws in case if you lose any. The instruction is simple and easy to follow which helped me to assemble the chair within only 30 min. I believe you can do it much faster if you follow some of the tips I list below. Overall, I am satisfied with this great product! Assembly tips: - 4 wheels at the bottom: Need a harder push for these wheels to be "clicked" into the holes. - Armrest: dont tighten the screws all the way as you will need to adjust the position of the armrest to be proportionate with the topper part of the chair.

product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

It only took about 15 minutes from unpack to sitting in this chair.The chair es easy to roll and adjust. I recommend this chair

product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

content: Amazing Product For that Price - very sturdy, comfortable and smooth - am very tall and the chair can be lifted to a good higher position which helps me sit ergonomically
author: Harish
product: Office Chair, Mid Back Leather Desk Chair, Computer Swivel Office Task Chair, Ergonomic Executive Chair with Armrests

title: Good value at $100 but could use a few design construction upgrades.
content: This is a great value for essentially the same chair you pay $180 or $250 for at Big Box office stores. There is an issue with the design though. I believe the manufacturer is assembling the inner infrastructure of the chair improperly. After about 6 months the back failed on me. I removed the leather and foam to inspect the issue. There are brackets that are attached to the wood with threaded nuts. This is a sufficient manner to connect the pieces however they have installed them opposite. Meaning the nuts are on the back and/or the bottom and the L brackets are on the top or front. Therefore when you sit or lean back all of the weight holding ability is bearing on the NUTS rather than on the brackets. I disassembled mine. I installed the L bracket under the base and the nuts on the top side. Likewise on the back I put the nuts on the front and the L bracket on the back. This increased the stability and durability of the chair 10 fold. Photos I uploaded show the nut that pulled through the wood and my repair by moving the bracket below. Now after about 11 months the chair is still working great. i find the leather material to be more durable than the office store type chairs. If the manufacturers would switch the process or contact me for more information on the chair engineering I could make this a 5 star review and a great value for a $100 chair.
author: Chris Alexander
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: What a mess
content: 1. Bonded leather didn't last a year, the handles are peeling off as I sit in this chair. 2. Squeaks like crazy, have to reapply some wd-40 every now and then. 3. Foam cushion inserts are so-so. 4. The button inserts and black plastic cover covering the screws on the side comes off periodically. TLDR; get something that doesn't have 'bonded leather' as the material, that and maybe something a bit more reputable.
author: Aaron
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Chair is an epic failure
content: Here is why I am totally upset & disgusted with this "office" chair. First off,, the brown chair does NOT have a pewter colored finished -- it's more of a matte gold. That was the very first thing we noticed as we started unpacking the pieces. This turned out to be just the beginning of our troubles. Secondly, the screws for assembling the chair were too short. Whoever designed this should be doing something else for a living.  We still cannot get the screws to stay tight.  Basically, assembling this thing was a nightmare and we ended up needing THREE people to help finesse the parts into fitting together. Finally, after TWO hours of fighting to get the chair assembled, we stood back to look at our finished product and discovered a small tear in the back of the chair that we never noticed when we unpacked it.  Too late now.  Also, the chair's arms won't stay tight -- they keep loosening up because of the lousy construction design.  The chair is also uncomfortable because we're afraid to lean back in it or sit all the way against the back of it for fear of it falling apart. And finally, the little end caps, that are supposed to hide the screw heads, keep falling off because they weren't manufactured properly. It's too late now to send the chair back. Who wants the hassle of taking this one apart, packing it back up and sending it back? If I could leave this chair zero stars, I would. I'm going to contact Amazon directly about all the issues we had with this product.  I would suggest you pass when it comes to buying this chair until you have read ALL the reviews and viewed the videos that upset buyers posted. I sure wish I had been more diligent before buying it.
author: GoldDustWoman
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Buyer be ware!!!
content: Fabric (fake leather) does not hold up with normal use.  Mechanically, the chair is fine, but the fake leather is thinner than tissue paper and wears through very easily.  As you can see, this happened to six chairs...
author: Kindle Customer
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Cheap
content: I guess it is what a 100 dollar chair amounts to these days.  Disappointing. The bottom seat part broke where the arms attach to the back and there is no structure to the chair, you cannot lean back without it breaking even more. I reordered another chair in the hopes that it will not be as defective as the first but that was my only chance given the packaging was ruined during shipping and I will be reusing the second chairs box to return the first. I guess I will have the opportunity to do the same thang till I win the chair lottery. Wish me luck. Give this chair a HARD pass unless you are feeling lucky.
author: Sal1n1ty
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Poor Quality Material - AmazonBasics High-Back Executive Chair - Black
content: The chair is very sturdy, but the issue is the cheap material used. From the pictures, you can see how the material has started to peel off. I purchased it March 2017. You get what you pay for because a good executive chair cost hundreds of dollars and not $110. Next time, I will buy a real leather chair because now I have to replace it.
author: TM
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Big mistake
content: Everything of this chair is already falling apart My wife bought this for me in April. It's been making sounds like I had it 25 years.
author: jermaine
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Do not buy unless you like to hear constant squeaking and being uncomfortable.
content: Obviously this chair is fake leather, but it feels decent and the color hasn't changed yet. The paint on the plastics is ok, however some have already chipped off when the chair slightly rubbed against the wall. Its a decent chair for the price and I would be happy with it IF it didn't squeak. I am not just talking about a little every now and then, but EVERY time I move in the chair it squeaks. Very loud and aggravating. I have tried to find the exact point but couldn't. Also, any bass whatsoever from my sub below the desk causes the chair arm to shake. This is literally the noisiest chair I have ever sat in. If this thing didn't squeak, it would be 4 or 5 stars. The quality is justified with the price but the squeaking is ridiculous. *UPDATE* I almost never use this chair now. It is incredibly unconformable, and does not help keep proper posture at all. Even when I lock the recline, I always find myself leaning forward from the chair too far back and reclined. The squeak has gotten worse. I will never buy this chair again. Uncomfortable, loud, and doesn't help at all to keep a proper posture due to its design.
author: Ethan Martin
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

title: Superb Comfort = Increased Productivity
content: For starters, installation took about 10 minutes without bumping into any problems. And, so far, I've had this chair for 4 months now and there is nothing bad to say about it. I am 6' 1" and 195 lb and I work at home and spend about 8 to 10 hours daily sitting on this chair. So far, it has provided continuous comfort for my back and my productivity has increased since switching to this chair. Update: After 8 months of daily use, the cushioning still feels like new!
author: TY16
product: AmazonBasics High-Back, Leather Executive, Swivel, Adjustable Office Desk Chair with Casters, Black

content: The chair looks good enough once assembled but I received a used product. Scratches on the legs and several other places on the chair.

author: Tech Junkie
product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: Great value for a gaming chair, Why spend any more money?  Very quick/Responsive customer service
content: When I was first looking at this chair I saw complaints about it being too small for "bigger guys".  I'm a pretty muscular guy I'm 6 3' 230 pounds and the chair is wide enough and tall enough to support me. -The suspension seems solid and isn't being compressed too much by my weight. -The padding feels great, I don't feel like I'm sinking into it too much and it is soft enough so that my back doesn't get sore from long sessions. -The levers are firm and I can easily distinguish where and when it locks into place when I lean back the chair, I can almost lean the chair completely flat and with putting all my weight back the chair remains balanced. -The head and back lumbar support are adjustable - The arms will  fit underneath a standard size desk As long as you take the time to slightly tighten each side before going back to tighten all the screws it will be very firm. I had a slight problem with my chair and Homall was very quick to fix it. They responded within 12 hours to help me with a part for the chair. Overall I'm very impressed with the quality and presentation of this product, I've owned a DXRacer Chair in the past and these are just so close in comfort that I don't see a reason to spend anymore money.

product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: I bought this chair in July it is now Aug ...
content: I bought this chair in July it is now Aug same year! I have had tighten the bolts.  I am 230lbs 6.3 foot man. I been having issues with this chair for the last month. I ripped apart the fabric on the bottom and found there are 2 pieces of wood and a metal bar welded to a tube frame. The weld broken at both ends of the frame. EDIT: I contacted the seller about warranty and sent them a picture of the damage. 2 Days later they send me a replacement seat. I have changing my review because of the customer service and fast turn around for warranty replacement parts. Over all I love this chair. EDIT: Once again the chair failed at the same spot. I bought one for my son and I failed at the same spot.

Total build time was about 30ish minutes, it was simple enough and everything you need is included. author: Matt [Eight-Six]
product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: HOW TO ASSEMBLE && REVIEW!!!!
content: For the price, it's great. The instructions are completely useless! Here is HOW TO ASSEMBLE: The bolts come in 3 sizes which I will refer to as SMALL, MEDIUM, and LARGE as well as 2 screws. Make sure to test fit each screw by hand before just assuming its the right one!! This is what I did and my seat install was maybe 20-30 mins by myself! Step 1: For the base to attach to the bottom seat, use 2x LONG and 2x SHORT bolts. The 2 LONG go toward the front of the seat and the 2 SHORT go into the back. Step 2: 2x LONG and 2x SHORT. We will be attaching the back of the chair to the 2 side brackets. the LONG bolts go into the top hole, and the 2 SHORT go into the bottom. We now have 4 MEDIUM screws left to use. Step 3: 4x MEDIUM screws are used to attach the arm wrests to the bottom of the chair, and you can slide them in or out depending on what you want. Step 4: 2 screws left over. We put the plastic cover on FIRST on either side of the chair to cover the metal brackets. Make sure to line up the plastic with the hole, and while keeping the screw on the tip of the screwdriver making sure the hole is lined up, go ahead and attach these. Step 5: Go ahead and put the wheels on the base, and reference the picture to see how the hydraulic pump is attached. Just go ahead and push those wheels into place firmly, and push the hydraulic pup and then the base on top of it while they chair us upside-down firmly. Step 6: After going around 1 more time to make sure all bolts are hand tight and 1/4 turn, Attach the pillows and enjoy! REVIEW: This chair is an amazing deal for the PRICE. If you want more cushion, extra features, whatever, be looking to pay close to 3x the price. This chair is a huge upgrade from my previous office chair that was completely ripped, loud, and broken. Honestly, anything would have been an upgrade. For me, being 5'10" and 175, this chair is extremely comfortable. Do I wish it had extra butt padding? Sure. Is that why I bought this chair? No. I game for 2-5 hour sessions normally and this chair offers great lumbar support via the pillow and the arm rests are super comfy. It's great for the price. 4 stars for now until more time has passed. Update 2/19/2019!!!! -The bolts have worked their way through the chair cushion, and now poke into my ass every time I sit down. It actually ripped a hole in my jeans before I noticed what had happened. See Pictures! -The other day, I was leaning a little back in the chair with my butt forward and the extra weight on the front part of the chair caused the wood to snap in half. This is the wood base that you sit on -Obviously this chair held up for about a year or so and just completely turned to crap. Buy a decent 100$ office chair. Not this. I thought racing chairs were better for some reason as I like them in my cars, and pro gamers use them. DONT DONT DONT

product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: A Great Value for the Price
content: A great chair for gaming or general work at a desk for the price. The back is fully adjustable and can recline back a full 90°. The arm rests are alright and are a little squeaky, but do not need to be attached. The lever to lower and raise the chair is partially blocked by the left arm rest, but is still usable. The lumbar support and head rest are a great addition, though I find myself removing the lumbar support and just keeping the head rest. Mine arrived with a minor, but permanent stain on the upper back part, but nothing I can't deal with. Though this is my first high-end chair and I have no higher-end product to compare it to, this is definitely worth the price based on my experience with it. It is easy to assemble and a must-have for anyone still using a regular office chair. The flaws I noticed are rather small in my opinion and this is still a great buy.

title: #1 Best seller for a reason
content: I previously passed on this chair for something twice the price, thinking that it would be worth the investment. I was so disappointed that I went back and ordered this chair instead and have not regretted it a moment since. Not only does this chair look better but it feels great. And for about 100$ you can't beat that. One part showed slightly scratched but I think this is a packaging/shipping issue so I won't hold it against the chair as a whole (see picture below). The parts feel sturdy and the design is better than some more expensive chairs.The wheels roll well on my carpet flooring. The construction holding the back to the base with two hinges as opposed to one I feel gives this chair more leaning capability than some others. I always feel secure no matter what angle I set the back at. This chair is the #1 best seller for a reason. It is a great bang for your buck and a non-expensive way to improve any PC gaming experience.
author: Joseph
product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: Good chair with great price but some minor issues.
content: I've had this chair for about a month now and these are my thoughts. Pros: - Easy to setup. Many reviews claimed it took them about 30 minutes, and it took me about that same amount of time. There's only a few pieces and they all fit together really well. There was one hole that was covered up by fabric, but a small incision remedied the issue. - Comfortable. This isn't the MOST comfortable office chair I've sat in, but it IS the best at this price point. The included lumbar and head cushion are a great inclusion but are a little stiff for my taste. Probably just need to be broken in. - Price. This chair is an insane value. Compared to other "racing" chairs I've tried, this pretty much is on par. The chair feels a little stiffer than other racing chairs, but the shape and seat feel pretty much the same. Cons: - Top heavy. Every now and again, I'll go to reach for something on the floor and manage to tip the chair over. This is due to its small base and larger seat. I'm a fairly clumsy person but I've never tipped an office chair before. - Non-adjustable arm rests. It's a minor thing and for me they are at about the right height, but it would be nice to have. There are other parts of the chair that aren't adjustable, such as how far forward the backrest is, but this is the one that stands out most. Overall, this is a good chair, but not a great chair. It meets all of my needs and works for me, but I could definitely see this not working for someone else due to the lack of adjustments in general. It definitely needs a break-in period before it starts to "feel" like an office chair, but once it gets to that point the chair is fairly comfortable for long periods of time. It's price is a major selling point and if you're looking for a "gaming" chair or just need something with a tall back like I do, this is definitely worth it.

title: UPDATED REVIEW: DO NOT BUY! DO NOT! The company forces good reviews...please read.
content: Ordered white, got blue. One of the arm rests was backwards, easy enough to fix, but one of the pre drilled screw ports was misthreaded and cause the screw to strip on one of the arm rests. Didn't matter too much because even the arm rest that was installed correctly was loose after two days. Only reason it's not one star is because it's technically functional, but it's crap. I feel like i would have been better off saving up for the dxracer or a similar, quality, gaming chair. UPDATED REVIEW. Was two stars, now one star because of their terrible customer service. They approached me about my bad amazon review, good start, but they REFUSED to rectify my dilemma until I REMOVED MY REVIEW!!! You cannot hold reviews hostage, that's not how it works. I told them I would GLADLY change my review upon receipt of a proper working chair, to which they, again, refused stating that until my review was down they wouldn't fix my chair or replace it even though it's under warranty. I've never delt with a less professional company. I have transcripts of my emails and they are literally bullying me into deleting my review or they won't help me. I don't know if warrant laws apply in China, because upon deciphering they're poorly written emails they made it clear that they wouldn't budge. So here I am out $110, plus the warranty because they can't do business properly or actually help their customers without damnding they remove bad reviews. THATS WHY THEY HAVE A FOUR STAR RATING. DONT BE FOOLED LIKE IWAS!! Thy can suck it and eat my one star...and they're lucky I can't give zero or negative.
author: dan hergenroether
product: Homall Gaming Chair Office Chair High Back Computer Chair PU Leather Desk Chair PC Racing Executive Ergonomic Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Headrest and Lumbar Support (White)

title: Regret purchasing this chair.  Wish I could've returned it for a refund rather than a replacement.
content: I bought this chair for gaming after a friend recommended it due to the affordability and similar design to higher end "gaming chairs".  The chair is comfortable at first but wears out very fast compared to chairs I've used in the past.  After 8 months pieces of the arm rest were coming off in small chunks.  After about 10 months the bottom cushion began to give at the seam and pieces of black material were peeling off all over the bottom afterwards. I contacted the company as the chair was falling completely apart in under 1 year.  The representative I spoke to said he would replace the chair if I gave them a positive customer service review.  Had they just replaced the chair, I would've done that anyway after dealing with so many warranty hassles in the past but it was rather odd that he made me put the review in before he would process the replacement. The replacement chair arrived about a week later and I kept it in a box for about a year while using an older office chair which I borrowed from a friend.  After finally opening up the replacement chair I noticed some slight differences.  It appears that they sent me a very similar looking but cheaper chair.  The little lumbar back support piece was already falling apart at the stitching before I even used it and the chair was less comfortable than the original.  I also tipped over in this one while leaning back and I remember the other chair having better stability.  This one came with plastic parts where the previous one had metal. I would only recommend this chair if you're on a budget and plan to use it very little.  If you plan to do a lot of gaming or office work with this chair I'd look elsewhere.  You get what you pay for I guess. Update: Realized that they sent me an older version of the chair on my warranty claim which was discontinued because the bolts poke through the chair into your butt.  I will NEVER buy another Homall product in my life.  I should've known not to trust this company when they wouldn't send me a replacement until after I gave them a positive customer service review.

title: Quality, comfortable and multi-functional office chair
content: I ordered this chair about a week ago and I absolutely love it!  Given the Covid-19 situation I've been working from home out of my family dinning room for quite a few months already and I expect this to continue for some time.  The current chair that I been using was really part of the diner furniture set and it wasn't designed to provide much needed back support for sitting there all day long working in front of the computer.  This office chair is definitely the answer to the problem!  This chair has an ergonomic design and can be set with upright and reclined position (135 degrees) and any position in between.  During the office hours, I normally set it upright to work in front of my computer.  With so many conference calls these days, I would just recline it a little bit to be more comfortable while still talking over the phone in those long meetings.  The chair does come with some very smooth wheels so that in the evenings, I can move it next to my son's piano in the living room and watch him play while fully recline chair down with foot rest extended.  Just imagine how relaxing and comfortable it is! The chair was shipped to us in one box.  Everything was nicely packed and labeled along with a user's guide for easy installation.  The entire process took about 30 mins for me and I've shot a few major steps in pictures to share with everyone.  Everything was super easy and smooth, but as you attach the seat back to the bottom of the seat, I do suggest you switch the seat bottom and seat back for better support and easier alignment (vs. what the user guide indicated). Overall it was a great product along with good quality in materials.  I would highly recommend it!
author: Joe X
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: good quilty！
content: Get this chair now! I'm doing to do my best to be as concise as possible and refrain from going on an endless rant about how much I love this chair.What I'm going to do instead is accurately and thoroughly review this marvel of modern engineering. First I'd like to tell you a little bit about myself. I'm a 6 foot tall 280 pound military member with previous surgery on L5S1 which has left me with nerve pain every day of my life as well as problems on three other levels of my spine. Generally chairs aren't designed to seat a person of my stature and won't last very long. I require a chair that's very sturdy, adjustable and ergonomic. The box came, overjoyed I struggled to lift it into my apartment. The first thing I noticed was the weight of the box. It gave me a sense of assurance in knowing that I bought quality. The Hardware felt to be of good manufacturing. Also I received double the hardware necessary to assemble the chair. I LOVE EXTRA HARDWARE. The instructions were very well illustrated and the chair built in minutes. One thing that I really appreciated was the way adjustments were engineered into the design of the chair. While assembling you can adjust the width of the arm rests. Once the bolts are tightened down your arm rests will only adjust up and down. Another adjustment built into the chairs construction is controlling the distance from the seat to the back rest. This is generally only a feature on higher end chairs and I was happy to see that is has quite a bit of range. love it so much！🥰🥰🥰
author: Erikchen
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: First Class Experience When Working from Home
content: Chair has been an essential part of my life since working from home. My previous office chair is ok but not ideal. I am so happy with this new chair as I could adjust the back angel. Plus the foot support, it feels like the first class experience at home. The installation is been fairly easy. As someone who rarely assembles anything, the manual provides me a very detailed guide for me to do it. A picture is worth a thousand words. That is truly the case here. It took me less than an hour to finish everything. This may be a small project but the completion brought me great sense of accomplished. Now, I could be more than happy to enjoy getting my work done. Also, I want to mention that this chair feel very sturdy. When I pulled the box in my house, it took me decent effort to make that happen. I am happy to see my effort paid off and getting a chair that feels comfortable and sturdy.
author: hy533
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: This vendor makes comfortable chair, which is easy to assemble.
content: Recent temporary 'work from home' has created problems for me since I have to move between different rooms in order to focus and complete my work, quietly. Unfortunately, this WFH will be a new norm for me from now on; my family understood my predicaments and was kind enough to convert one of the bedrooms into an office for me. One of the conversion projects was to purchase an office desk and a chair; the desk was a nightmare to assemble and turned out to be defective (shown in the picture). Compare with the black chair, it was not damaged nor defective; even though the shipping box could use some improvements. The box was torn when it arrived; luckily, components were intact with instruction manual furnished with pictures showing detailed steps to assemble the chair together. The instructions were simple and quick. This vendor was also kind enough to include some spare hardwares, which are very handy, saving a trip to hardware store since I have a 3 yr. son, who likes to hide bolts and nuts skillfully. I have used this chair for 4 days now; I found it comfortable and sturdy. It also has inclined positions with foot rest making it a plus. After dealing with the desk, which is much more expensive and it turns out to be defective, this chair is much more affordable and comfortable. I give it a THUMB UP and a 5 STAR RATING.
author: Binh Phung
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: A good choice for my lower back
content: I am working from home a lot now due to the COVID-19. I wanted to get a Chair that is ergonomically right for my lower back. I developed this lower back pain years ago when I sat too long for a couple of months to prepare for an important exam. Since then, if I keep in one position for too long especially in the sitting position, I have pain in my lower back. When I saw this Chair’s offer of good support for lower back and ergonomics benefit, I thought I would give it a try. I have been using it for a few days. It seems to be a good choice for me. I hope you can see the angle of support for the lower back from the pictures. If you also have lower back problem from sitting for long, as I do, give it a try. It worked for me and I hope it will work for you too.
author: lodge fan
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Nicely designed office chair with retractable footrest
content: Have been using this chair for more than one week now & I would say that I am pretty happy with it. When I first received the big heavy box and opened it, I thought it would be complicated to assemble it. The user’s guide is so clear that with some help from my wife it actually took us about 15 minuets to get it done, just following the easy 1-2-3 steps. The chair is nicely designed with upright & back recline positions( with the maximum of 135 degrees). What I like most is the footrest. I really enjoy to recline the back & pull out the retractable footrest, relax myself comfortably on it.
author: MBP
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Very comfortable and high quality
content: This chair is the largest investment in my home office, but it totally worths the value. I have a slipped disc problem for many years. This chair is very comfortable and has a great design to support my back. It also made with very high quality. I am also very enjoyed that I can lie down to take a quick nap at noon, which might be the only advantage of wfh.
author: Bin Zhang
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Great Office Chair
content: I bought this chair for my husband, and he loves it, he's been working from home for a while since Covid-19 outbreak, it's hard to sit there and work for a whole day, this Office chair is a lifesaver, it's very comfortable, the size is good cuz we have a small study room, and it can be reclined, very flexible, we love it, even my puppy won't get off ~
author: fionaliu
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Unbreathable and no back support
content: Update after 2 weeks of usage: Since I'm working for home nowadays, I sit on this chair for at least 8 hours per day, and my back really hurts after sitting an hour on this chair. There is no back support at all, I added a seat cushion, and it's still very uncomfortable. The leg support doesn't function after the third time of use. The material is unbreathable, and so my butt is sweating and burning while I'm in video meetings and I have to pretend that I was fine. Terrible experience, have to return and get myself a new chair. --------------------------------------- Original review: This chair is easy to install if you follow the instruction. The instruction is color printed and with pictures. Spare parts are included which is nice since sometimes there is always a part missing. Very comfortable chair especially the foot stand. Almost fall asleep when I first sit on it. Solid quality and definitely worth the money.
author: J.C
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Highly recommended
content: My husband and I love this executive office chair which is really beyond our expectations.  It arrived with heavy label box.  It looks hard to assemble when I opened it first.  But it is not which actually really easy to do.  Everything is including in even the screws driver.  The different screws have the indicator letter on it.  It might take 15 minutes to do it.  It really amazed me when I finish it.  The most satisfied part is the backrest can be recline up to 135 degrees with the pull out the rectractable footrest.  It is really comfortable for little rest.  It looks gorgeous and make of high quality material. I will highly recommend it.
author: William
product: Hbada Ergonomic Executive Office Chair, PU Leather Swivel Desk Chair,Adjustable Height High-Back Reclining Chair with Padded Armrest and Footrest,Black

title: Do Not Buy!
content: I purchased one of these chairs back in August of 2017 and it has been amazing, but the seat has gotten a little worn so I just ordered a new one (September 2019). I was SO DISAPPOINTED when I got it all put together-- it looks the same, but it is a cheap version that is literally too uncomfortable to sit in. The metals posts that support the back are shorter, the back now needs to be screwed on (the old version is permanently connected); the edging that goes around the back has been removed (and is sharp); the mesh is rougher; and the wheels dont fit flush to the base, which cause a wobble ( see photos ). I would have packaged it all up to return already, except that adjustable shaft is now stuck in the base and the chair -- I've had to call in a favor to have a second person come and help me pull it apart tomorrow. It is so disappointing on every level possible, and I'll definitely think twice before purchasing another piece of Amazon Basics furniture.
author: Mack Gooding-Waldron
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Perfect Small chair for small people
content: I read the reviews before buying and these people were right. The arms are weird and too short to be useful. They do not adjust. And I am a short and small person (5') so this chair is great for me but my 6'3 husband not so much, which is fine because I got it for me, it's MY chair, so he shouldn't be sitting in it anyway. I call that a win. I happen to think it's actually really comfortable especially considering how cheap it was. Looks nice enough and It was super easy to assemble. Seems pretty durable. I've spent entire days in this chair working and so far not one backache.
author: tourdm
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Does not age well
content: I've owned it for a year so this review is based on long term results as the comfort has changed since I first put it together.  The cushion is now maybe 20% the thickness it once was, at least in the spots I most frequently sit.  I find myself rotating positions as my butt gets tired and back starts to ache. The armrests are hard plastic, would like to see some sort of softer material used instead. Back support is probably the highlight (despite my back feeling sore on occasion, I think that is due to awkward positions necessitated out of discomfort from below). The chair is available for a great price, but after a year I'm already starting to shop around.  My guess is you get what you pay for, and I plan on a significant upgrade.
author: W. Griswold
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Overall great chair with room for a armrest improvements
content: Overall I like this chair, especially for the price.  Assembly was a breeze.  All parts were clearly labeled.  Whomever packaged the parts and wrote the assembly instruction booklet couldn't have made it more clear and easy.  (A rarity.) I find the cushion to be comfortable and of medium firmness.  I would've paid more if the arm height was adjustable, or if at a minimum were able to be lifted out of the way against the back of the chair making the chair essentially armless.  I find the fixed arms to be about an inch too low, but if I am just sitting back, relaxing in the chair, my wrists rest on the armrest and it's better than nothing. The height of the chair was very important to me.  It was hard to find accurate measurements, so as soon as I put the chair together, I took my own measurements.  I hope someone else will find it helpful.... The seat is 19" wide x 18" deep.  The height to the top of the seat at it's lowest setting is 17.5" and 22.25" at it's highest.  The seat height sinks about 7/16" when you sit in it.  Because the seat is rounded in the front and not perfectly flat, it makes measuring the height difficult.  I placed a thin piece of cardboard on the seat, then a quart sized paint can on top so it wasn't floating.  I then measured from the floor to the bottom of the cardboard.  I posted a few pictures.  (Sorry if they are sideways...they are the correct way on my computer and nothing I did uploaded them right side up on Amazon.) Floor to top of arm height is 23 5/8" at lowest seat height setting and 28 3/8" at highest seat setting.  (To determine if it will roll under a desk.  This is also difficult to measure as the arm rest is curved. I measured the middle of the arm rest.) Fixed arm height is about 6.25" from top of seat to top of arm. Note many reviewers complained that during assembly of the back rest to the seat cushion, the metal back bar frame overlapped the seat plate.  They must have updated the assembly instructions at some point because the instructions clearly state, "the metal back bar frame will overlap on the seat plate."  They then show a diagram showing the overlap with another note,"back bar will overlap seat plate when aligning to holes."  So, this is not a design flaw but intentional. Overall, I am very happy with the chair.  I use it about 4-5hr a day, 5 days a week.  So far after 3 months it is holding up well.
author: Jever
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Select a different chair
content: Very uncomfortable chair. When seated with good straight posture, the lower frame of the backrest is the first portion to make contact with my back. In order to use the backrest without the bar pressing into my back, I must use a pillow to help bridge the gap or sit slouched back. Chair is assembled correctly but unfortunately there is no way to adjustment the angle of the backrest.
author: Garrett
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: A Much-Longer-Than-Needed Review for a Chair
content: I'm a big fan of amazon. I needed a chair. AmazonBasics had a chair. So I bought it. The thought of an Amazon brand chair was exciting to me. I needed an office chair and I wasn't willing nor was I capable of affording a Herman Miller, or a Steelcase, and so on. I've had $200 Staples/Costco chairs and they're okay, but typically not that much better than a chair such as this one. Rather than buying the cheapest generic chair from some generic Chinese company, it was appealing that a company that I have found to be reliable had their own to offer. Assembly: Out of the box, nothing was missing or broken. A booklet is included with very clear instructions and the hardware is separated and labeled in plastic bags; very well executed. One thing that bothered me is when you attach the back cushion under the seat it overlaps with the seat plate. I thought I did something wrong so I took it apart and put it back together for no reason, delaying the assembly process (I might have OCD). In the end, it doesn't seem to be a problem. Comfort/Functionality: The seat cushion is very thick and firm, it's probably my favorite thing about this chair. I LOVE THE SEAT CUSHION. Same goes for the back mesh, comfortable with good support. The pneumatic lift works well. The chair comes with a tilt lock and tilt tension adjusting knob, very basic. The caster wheels are very smooth. I don't really care for the arm rests, but there's nothing wrong with them I suppose. They are placed relatively low, my elbow does not even reach them so I don't use them (I'm 5'8" btw). I'm guessing they did this so that the chair could easily be pushed into the desk without clearance issue. Again, this is not important to me but take it into consideration when buying. No complaints at all. The chair feels very sturdy, nothing creaks or rattles or anything. It's a solid chair. Summary: I'm pleasantly surprised by this chair. It definitely exceeded my expectations and I can see myself using it for a long time to come. It's a comfortable and sturdy, no-frills, no-nonsense office chair. Well worth the money. I really like the seat cushion... I highly recommend it.
author: JL
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: A well-priced chair for Basic office need - LATEST review September 2017 with Pictures
content: Overview: 1. The chair is similar to another chair sold by Walmart for similar price. Its built and quality are acceptable for the price range. The non-adjustable armrests are made of hard plastic material so you may find it not really comfortable. 2. It takes about 15-20 minutes to fully assemble the chair.  Well-written instruction. 3. The chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch in height (about 44-57 cm). Maximum load is 250 lbs. Detail review is as following: 1.Packaging: The product came in a carton package size of 10x23x26inch (24x58x65cm) approximately. Nothing fancy about this product packaging, the package looks not so study and protective from the outside. Mine actually came with one corner being deformed. On the carton, it says “Product origin of China” 2.Tools required: (1x) of a pair of scissors (or an utility knife) to cut the carton box open, and (1x) Allen wrench which is included with the package. 3.Open the box: Inside the package, the back support was bubble-wrapped while other components are in regular plastic bag. Although the carton was deformed, no components are damaged. Each group of assembly parts (screws, washers) are in separate ziploc bags with well-identified alphabet symbol for ease of locating components during the assembly process later. 4.Assembly: a.The instruction is well written with clear narrative and diagrams so assembly steps are easily to follow. It also comes with multi languages (English, French, Spanish and Chinese). If you have seen an instruction by IKEA (which assumes you are a handyman), you will indeed appreciate this product assembly instruction. This instruction is evidently written by American engineers  b.The assembly steps are logical enough so I could put parts together without any issue. Tips for you: (1) use the packaging bubble wrap and other plastic bags as your assembly surface to prevent chair components or your house floor being scratched. (2) Only hand tight the screws. Do NOT over tighten the screws. (3) Before you sit  on the newly-assembled chair the first time, make sure the chair is put together properly by checking on all screws are being tighten. 5. Final Result: This chair is fine for the price. The meshed back support is not really designed for ergonomic but it seems to be sturdy enough for its design intent. The chair height adjuster works fine, I measured and the chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch (about 44-57 cm) in height. The back support can also tilt backward or forward based on your preference. AmazonBasics Mid-Back Mesh Chair
author: Kevin L.
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Basically a perfect chair
content: As a relatively big guy (5'11" 270lb) I really don't know what all the hubub's about on this chair being "small". It fits me just fine. It's compact without being too small. For a home office, this is a good thing. The lumbar support hits me right in the small of my back, above the belt line (where it should). It's well made. The arms are designed to fit under a desk. They don't provide forearm support when working, but I rest my forearms on my desk when I'm working anyway. When I lean back, the arms are there to support my wrists and give my hands something to hold onto. Assembly took literally 15 minutes. (I know, because I did it between conference calls.) I spent a LOT of time reading reviews and comparing various chairs. I finally decided to give this chair a chance and I'm very glad I did. It's a nice chair, not only for the price, but just in general. I wrote this review after receiving the chair, assembling it, and using it for a day. If anything changes, I'll update the review. But really... Maybe there are people for whom this chair wouldn't work. But it feels to me like a nice comfortable chair of average / compact dimensions that you might find in almost any office. One tip about the arms being too close together... The arms have slots in them for the bolts. So you can choose whether to snug the arms against the edges of the seat or allow a little extra width. I assembled the arms in the widest place in the slots. I recommend you do the same, no matter your size. It will give you some extra room in the chair. I'm picky. I'm not small. Price wasn't my #1 consideration in my decision. I like the chair and I'd buy it again.
author: Eric Lovgren
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Cushioning barely lasted a few months.
content: Great for a few months, but after that the cushion absolutely disappears. I sit in my chair for 6 hours or so a day, as most people who work in an office do. It was comfy at first, but now it's like I'm sitting on wood. My tailbone is sore now that I keep sitting on it. If you want to replace your chair after 3-4 months then this will work. I was hoping to get at least a year out of this. Don't buy for longevity.
author: Steven Irvine
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Excellent chair.
content: This is a very nice chair for the price. I especially love the way they packaged the screws, etc. Very clearly labeled and a big improvement, in my opinion, over the usual blister packs. It's quite comfortable for a 6' tall 175lb guy. Adjustment is easy, rolls nicely, all the stuff you want in a chair. I saw some complaints on here about overlap of the metal plates between the chair back and main support plate. This was addressed in the instructions in my case. Not a problem. I design machines for a living and I don't think this is a major issue, didn't impede assembly and helps relieve stress on the bottom of the chair if anything, I saw some pictures of the o-ring around the mesh coming loose. Mine did too. A couple of drops of super glue cured that, the rubber ring is strictly decorative in my opinion anyway. Glue it in, you'll be fine. Great bang for the buck! Would buy again and recommend highly. Didn't take anything off my 5 star rating because any objections I may have had weren't worth making a very nice, cost effective product look even slightly bad over trivial BS.
author: Scott Drager
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black
