content: Overview: 1. The chair is similar to another chair sold by Walmart for similar price. Its built and quality are acceptable for the price range. The non-adjustable armrests are made of hard plastic material so you may find it not really comfortable. 2. It takes about 15-20 minutes to fully assemble the chair.  Well-written instruction. 3. The chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch in height (about 44-57 cm). Maximum load is 250 lbs. Detail review is as following: 1.Packaging: The product came in a carton package size of 10x23x26inch (24x58x65cm) approximately. Nothing fancy about this product packaging, the package looks not so study and protective from the outside. Mine actually came with one corner being deformed. On the carton, it says “Product origin of China” 2.Tools required: (1x) of a pair of scissors (or an utility knife) to cut the carton box open, and (1x) Allen wrench which is included with the package. 3.Open the box: Inside the package, the back support was bubble-wrapped while other components are in regular plastic bag. Although the carton was deformed, no components are damaged. Each group of assembly parts (screws, washers) are in separate ziploc bags with well-identified alphabet symbol for ease of locating components during the assembly process later. 4.Assembly: a.The instruction is well written with clear narrative and diagrams so assembly steps are easily to follow. It also comes with multi languages (English, French, Spanish and Chinese). If you have seen an instruction by IKEA (which assumes you are a handyman), you will indeed appreciate this product assembly instruction. This instruction is evidently written by American engineers  b.The assembly steps are logical enough so I could put parts together without any issue. Tips for you: (1) use the packaging bubble wrap and other plastic bags as your assembly surface to prevent chair components or your house floor being scratched. (2) Only hand tight the screws. Do NOT over tighten the screws. (3) Before you sit  on the newly-assembled chair the first time, make sure the chair is put together properly by checking on all screws are being tighten. 5. Final Result: This chair is fine for the price. The meshed back support is not really designed for ergonomic but it seems to be sturdy enough for its design intent. The chair height adjuster works fine, I measured and the chair can adjust from 17.5 to 22.5 inch (about 44-57 cm) in height. The back support can also tilt backward or forward based on your preference. AmazonBasics Mid-Back Mesh Chair
author: Kevin L.
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Basically a perfect chair
content: As a relatively big guy (5'11" 270lb) I really don't know what all the hubub's about on this chair being "small". It fits me just fine. It's compact without being too small. For a home office, this is a good thing. The lumbar support hits me right in the small of my back, above the belt line (where it should). It's well made. The arms are designed to fit under a desk. They don't provide forearm support when working, but I rest my forearms on my desk when I'm working anyway. When I lean back, the arms are there to support my wrists and give my hands something to hold onto. Assembly took literally 15 minutes. (I know, because I did it between conference calls.) I spent a LOT of time reading reviews and comparing various chairs. I finally decided to give this chair a chance and I'm very glad I did. It's a nice chair, not only for the price, but just in general. I wrote this review after receiving the chair, assembling it, and using it for a day. If anything changes, I'll update the review. But really... Maybe there are people for whom this chair wouldn't work. But it feels to me like a nice comfortable chair of average / compact dimensions that you might find in almost any office. One tip about the arms being too close together... The arms have slots in them for the bolts. So you can choose whether to snug the arms against the edges of the seat or allow a little extra width. I assembled the arms in the widest place in the slots. I recommend you do the same, no matter your size. It will give you some extra room in the chair. I'm picky. I'm not small. Price wasn't my #1 consideration in my decision. I like the chair and I'd buy it again.
author: Eric Lovgren
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Cushioning barely lasted a few months.
content: Great for a few months, but after that the cushion absolutely disappears. I sit in my chair for 6 hours or so a day, as most people who work in an office do. It was comfy at first, but now it's like I'm sitting on wood. My tailbone is sore now that I keep sitting on it. If you want to replace your chair after 3-4 months then this will work. I was hoping to get at least a year out of this. Don't buy for longevity.
author: Steven Irvine
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Excellent chair.
content: This is a very nice chair for the price. I especially love the way they packaged the screws, etc. Very clearly labeled and a big improvement, in my opinion, over the usual blister packs. It's quite comfortable for a 6' tall 175lb guy. Adjustment is easy, rolls nicely, all the stuff you want in a chair. I saw some complaints on here about overlap of the metal plates between the chair back and main support plate. This was addressed in the instructions in my case. Not a problem. I design machines for a living and I don't think this is a major issue, didn't impede assembly and helps relieve stress on the bottom of the chair if anything, I saw some pictures of the o-ring around the mesh coming loose. Mine did too. A couple of drops of super glue cured that, the rubber ring is strictly decorative in my opinion anyway. Glue it in, you'll be fine. Great bang for the buck! Would buy again and recommend highly. Didn't take anything off my 5 star rating because any objections I may have had weren't worth making a very nice, cost effective product look even slightly bad over trivial BS.
author: Scott Drager
product: AmazonBasics Mesh, Mid-Back, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrests, Black

title: Good if you only need a chair for a month
content: The fabric/pleather on this chair has torn after a month of daily use. It was super comfortable, relatively easy to assemble, and I really enjoyed it for the time it was functioning. I would like to return the product but can’t ship it, especially with the pandemic. I never write reviews but this purchase ended up being a bummer. Give me my money back without a return Mr. Bezos, or send me a new chair.
author: Idk
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Unfortunate
content: Received chair and all of the parts for assembly are zippered into the back of it (unfortunately)- it makes little sense to do this. After unzipping the back I noticed one of the zippers teeth were missing and subsequently the zipper went off it’s track and came apart. I continued putting the chair together and figured I would try and deal with the zipper later. The chair itself was simple to assemble. However it took a lot of finagling to get the zipper back together and it will still require a dab of glue to keep its hold. If your wondering why I did not return the chair - it’s because it took weeks to get to me in the first place and I didn’t want to wait for the exchange as I needed an office chair. Had really hoped for a better experience.
author: Jen P
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Wrong parts and unusable
content: Came with incorrect mount for seat
author: Smelvin
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Great Office Chair for the money
content: After reading all of the reviews I decided to purchase the AmazonBasics office chair. I like the fact that it is light weight to move yet very sturdy to sit in. It does start to feel hard after a few hours of sitting in it. The seat height adjustment is great to have and works well. I lower the seat to put on my shoes and raise it again while sitting at the computer. There were a few comments about the vinyl covering. It looks very nice and feels very soft. I don't know how long the covering will last. All-in-all the AmazonBasics office chair is a good value for the money. Be careful when installing the seat to armrest screws. They will strip on you and/or the threads will pull out the chair stuffing if you miss the hole while turning the screws in.
author: AzIronman
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: the chair back rest was hollow
content: the back rest was hollow, when i received the product in the box all the parts were inside the back rest zipped up. once i removed the parts there was no padding. I had to use a harbor freight moving blanket folded up and stuffed inside the back rest which now makes it perfect. :) but still wtf you dont buy a desk chair and expect the back rest to be thick and hollow like really this isnt a pinata. Only buy if you have a spare blanket you dont want and would like to use as internal padding for the chair. but overall with the harbor freight blanket i stuffed it with its a really nice chair lol ...................note harbor freight moving blankets is like 5$ just an fyi (decent padding folded up makes lots of padding)
author: daniel lomas
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Worth the money
content: I'm a small framed woman, originally I was a little worried to assemble this, but it was no problem at all for me. All the parts needed for assembly were in the back of the chair, and the instructions were easy to understand. Once put together, first thing I took note was how supportive and comfortable this chair is.. I have to work 9+ hours from home every day, so having a supportive comfortable chair is a must need for me. I would recommend this chair.
author: Jordan Wood
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Nice office chair
content: So glad I purchased this chair for work at home during pandemic. It’s compact but comfy. Good price. I waited a bit longer in order to get the brown color and I’m glad I did. Fits the room decor nicely. Thanks Amazon Basics!
author: Philsphan
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Tears easily
content: I used the chair for about 3 weeks and there is already a tear in the seam of the seat.
author: Carli
product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Arrived quickly, mostly comfortable
content: The office chair arrived two days early, which was nice since I needed it for work on Monday.  Took 30-45 minutes to put together and the instructions were easy to follow.  There is a discreperancy -- the Amazon page says it can take 275 lb. load, while the assembly instructions say 265 lb.  It's preventing the back pain I was getting with my old dining room chair.

product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: Cheap plastic zipper! Dont buy!
content: I bought this for my daughter's desk since they will be online schooling for the foreseeable future. We waited almost a month for delivery and are greatly disappointed the zipper broke when we tried to close it.  We are returning it and ordering a different chair that hopefully comes sooner.

product: AmazonBasics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Black

title: GREAT chair!
content: This chair is wonderful! It is exactly what I was looking for. It is a beautiful color and looks modern and stylish. It was a cinch to put together (my 8 year old assembled it for me!). It moves up and down smoothly. I was going to spend much more on another chair from another site, but it turned out not to be available. I am so happy as I think this is a better chair. Excellent purchase!

product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: So comfy!
content: Purchased this chair for my daughter's new desk and she instantly loved it! She loves the design and the cushioning. Only complaint is that we bought the chair that was supposed to be white, and on closer inspection it looks like a more creamy color.

product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

content: Was delivered ahead of schedule and very very easy to assemble. There were no screws or many parts. Everything just clicks into itself! Feels sturdy and metal base is durable.

product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: Stylish and comfortable!
content: Very satisfied with the purchase of this chair. The color is exactly what was pictured, the stitching is well done, its comfortable, and was extremely easy to assemble. Quick delivery despite not being a Prime item at the time of purchase. Would recommend.
author: Dani Brandon
product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: Wheels didn't work well and imperfection on seat
content: This product is very nice looking and easy to assembly. It is comfortable and has a nice style. Only took less than 10 minutes to assemble as well. Once the wheels were on, we noticed that they did not work very well. Initially, we thought they were locked, but it turned out they just don't slide very well on hardwood or tile. There was also a very noticeable smudge on the back of the seat which can be seen in the attached photos. Unfortunately, the chair will most likely be returned, but another review will come out once the new chair gets here if we do decide to return.
author: Richard
product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: Great chair
content: This chair did not come with any damage, was very easy to assemble. Literally took 2 minutes to put together. It’s very comfortable, and was super fast shipping!
author: Kasey B.
product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: Nice and confortable chair
content: We purchased the chair for my 16 year-old daughter, it is her new at home school chair and she is in love with it. It is as she calls it "nice and confie"
author: OJG
product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: decent for the money
content: I ordered two WHITE chairs. I got notification they would arrive a week ahead of the extended shipping time I'd accepted. I was so excited when yhey arrived almost a week early. I opened both boxes-- one came white, as ordered-- with no assembly instructions (frustrating... BUT assembly is pretty simple so we figured it out) and the other arrived the wrong color, so had to be returned. Overall, the chair is nice looking and comfortable, but the low back may not provide much support if you're needing that.  I bought these as desk chairs for my kids, so they should work fine.
author: AutieL
product: Home Office Chair, Computer Chair Adjustable Height Ribbed Low Back Armless Swivel Conference Room Task Desk Chairs, White

title: Finally, a chair that fits!
content: This chair is just perfect for me, and this is the THIRD chair I've purchased. Finally got it right. It has just enough support and height, AND I love that even with the arms down, as I'm typing they don't touch my arms. So when I'm in work mode, I'm free, and when I want to lean back and think about what I've composed, I can do so comfortably. It's also surprisingly light. It honestly feels like it was made on one of those 3D printer things. It was very easy to put together and I did it alone in about 18 minutes tops, including unpacking it. Bravo! Now...about the writer's block...😔 UPDATE JAN 16 I am in love with this chair. You don't know what you've missed until you've got it. The fact that I can raise the arms independently is EVERYTHING! I can throw a leg over one while I'm watching TV or writing, and then totally switch to a comfortable position while I'm doing my nails. And when it's chilly and you want to tuck a blanket around you, all you have to do is throw up the arms and pull it over you. That sounds like nothing but so many times I've grabbed a blanket or a throw and had to stand up to tuck it around me. It's a nice little luxury. I'm spoiled now. At the highest height, I don't even need it and sometimes just throw it on the couch. That's rare for me. And the lumbar support is fine. And the height is surprising, too. I have a cushion that I sit on. It raises me about 2.5 inches or so. Beside my couch this has become one of my favorite seats in my apartment.  Oh, and while it rolls freely, it doesn't OVER-roll. My last chair I had, I had to buy a stock set of non-rolling caps because I couldn't sit still in it. I wish I could lock the seat into place at an angle but at a later date I'll probably get one of those too. For now, this suits me just fine.
author: #EAHWP
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: What an elegant and comfortable chair!
content: Love the colors and love the chair. There is just enough of a cushion so I don't get uncomfortable and it has just enough support that I can lean back and go into a more relaxing position if need be.
author: Jessie
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Can reverse a hunchback
content: The mesh back office chair is more comfortable and durable than the office chair made of leather. Its backrest conforms to the ergonomics can reverse a hunchback. Its mesh backrest design is cool and breathable suitable for summer to use. The flip-up arms that surprise me can be hidden entirely vertically, and I like to do this when watching movies. Its components are relatively simple to install, and it is easy for girls to assemble it. I only spent about 20 minutes to complete, proud:) I think the only disadvantage is that the seat cushion is smaller. If the seat cushion can be a larger size, it can be more comfortable and suitable for people with different body types.
author: JX
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Well Made, Perfect  Compact Size, Good Features
content: This chair was purchased to replace an office chair being used at my kitchen desk.  I am very happy with the choice of Hbada for price, design and features.  It is adjustable and comfortable plus the size is perfect.  It is smaller than the previous chair, which is a bonus.  My old, large black task chair was too large and bulky for the space; the faux leather on the large arms of it severely cracked, as did the seat.  The arms on the Hbada chair are smaller and also may be raised and lowered.  On my old chair, the arms were large, extended further out and were fixed in place. These arms are constructed of a solid material, rather than upholstered (which will quickly tear & crack); The seat on the Hbada chair is a comfortable, cool and breathable woven upholstery, which can be treated with a stain repellent if necessary.  It also rolls easily across a rug I use, So glad I went with this Hbada chair.  The compact design and adjustable features, including the arms, were for me, a great choice.  It's a good value. Comparable chairs are more bulky and up to twice as expensive.
author: Goldenmom
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Sturdy Office Chair with Sleek Design
content: Since I work from home often, I have been looking to buy an office chair. The slick design of the chair caught my eye since I did not like a bulky one for limited space of my corner office. Now I have had the chair for a few days, and it does not disappoint me. First, the chair is pretty easy to assemble. Took me only 20 minutes, and all screws are provided with a few extra. The chair has sleek design, look simple and elegant. It also has good workmanship, sturdy and stable. The chair swivel freely and around, and its height can be adjusted easily to very low or very high level. The mesh back feels springy and comfortable. The cushioned seat is firm and comfortable to sit on. After using the chair for a few days, it dispels my concerns one reviewer raised about the seat cushion collapsing after a few sittings. For me with normal weight, the seat feels just right. I noticed the seller does not mention about the cushion in the description. I suggest the seller should provide some information for prospective buyers.
author: Suibian
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Easy assemble and comfortable
content: Very easy to assemble and clear instructions. I bought this for my working from home this year and it is very comfortable. I am able to assemble this alone and was not too heavy to lift. Adjustment up and down is also available on left bottom of the chair. Very good home working chair for summer. All parts are packed nicely with protection in the box and everything looks brand new. All required tools are also available in the package for assembling. Basically everything is in the package for your needs. Nice self assemble home working chair!
author: TF_Kim
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Comfort
content: I like this rolling chair. Probably the best one I’ve ever had .It’s quit comfortable and quit easy to assemble. The wheels are well oiled and not stiff and the color is also very nice. The instructions weren’t complicated at all. I might as well buy another one for myself. Plus I can have it delivered to me right at the front door. It can in a medium size box and it’s much more easier to deposit than the giant ones they sell at retail stores. Very nice quality and very nice service. Highly recommended.
author: Vivian Y
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Nice and comfortable
content: Very comfortable chair, simple to install, fashionable in shape, and small in area. If it is to be disassembled, it is easy to put it in the box. No shortcomings are found for the time being. Satisfied
author: aaron
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Stylish, Great for a Small Space
content: I was attracted to the small size because I planned to use it for my home office in my bedroom.  The seat is plenty roomy for me to sit "regularly" or with one leg tucked under my butt.  I'm 5'-2" tall and 135 lbs, so that will give you an idea of the scale.  The armrests go up so the chair slides underneath the desk, which is different than the other chairs I considered.  Height is easily adjusted.  Lumbar support is nominal, so I got a small lumbar pillow at a thrift store for $3.99 and now it's perfect! Great price and VERY easy to put together.  I got it in white and it came with white gloves for assembly.  :-)  Highly recommend.
author: Aisha
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Great Chair
content: Easy to assemble and good quality. Well worth a few extra bucks, especially for daily use. Really comfortable seat, great contoured back, and adjustable in every way you could ever want, which is what we were looking for. After purchasing leather/bonded leather chairs and having them peel, we have decided this might be the perfect compromise. I'm still figuring out just how loose I want to make the tilt adjustment. I put it together myself accordding with assemble instructions, but it would be way faster and less awkward with help. I'v had it for 2 weeks and so far i still like it.

product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Stylish, Great for a Small Space
content: I was attracted to the small size because I planned to use it for my home office in my bedroom.  The seat is plenty roomy for me to sit "regularly" or with one leg tucked under my butt.  I'm 5'-2" tall and 135 lbs, so that will give you an idea of the scale.  The armrests go up so the chair slides underneath the desk, which is different than the other chairs I considered.  Height is easily adjusted.  Lumbar support is nominal, so I got a small lumbar pillow at a thrift store for $3.99 and now it's perfect! Great price and VERY easy to put together.  I got it in white and it came with white gloves for assembly.  :-)  Highly recommend.
author: Aisha
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Great Chair
content: Easy to assemble and good quality. Well worth a few extra bucks, especially for daily use. Really comfortable seat, great contoured back, and adjustable in every way you could ever want, which is what we were looking for. After purchasing leather/bonded leather chairs and having them peel, we have decided this might be the perfect compromise. I'm still figuring out just how loose I want to make the tilt adjustment. I put it together myself accordding with assemble instructions, but it would be way faster and less awkward with help. I'v had it for 2 weeks and so far i still like it.
author: HL
product: Hbada Office Task Desk Chair Swivel Home Comfort Chairs with Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Height, White

title: Comfortable chair with great features
content: I sit in a chair for a bit portion of my day so having a good one is incredible important to me. After having assembled this chair, it clearly is a great one. Assembly was easy and instructions were clear, all the bolts were packaged in a very organized way which I really appreciated. The chair itself is so comfortable. The seat itself is plushy and conforms to your bottom perfectly, the same material is used for the armrest which I also find very comfortable. The backside mesh is perfect for leaning back and since it’s mesh, your back can still breathe, even after sitting on it for hours. I also love the hanger attached to the back, I had never seen something like that before and it has already become handy plenty of times.
author: Robin Boudard
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Great style!
content: We have been redecorating my daughters room, sold a bed and got a lot of space so this has been perfect! Main advantage of this chair is the cool design: I like the colors, the legs. It took us about 40 minutes to assemble but thats because we had a little “helper” with us :) I love this brand and would recommend to others!
author: Minnie Love
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Comfortable and easy to assemble!
content: This chair was recommended to me by a friend. I was a little skeptical at first as I’ve never ordered disassembled furniture off Amazon before, but the experience pleasantly surprised me! The parts were very neatly and safely packed, and the instructions were super easy to follow. I was done in half an hour! The headrest provides the proper support to a tall guy like me, and the clothes hanger on the back is really useful for people with lots of laundry. Really happy so far!
author: V. S.
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Excellent product and highly reccomended
content: Eccellent built, quality and comfort. Headrest is really great Great product for the price. Provides much better back support than the previous chairs I had . Highly reccomended Very nice product.
author: Avinav
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Style, comfort and value
content: Stylish and comfortable chair for a steal
author: Will
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Comfy and cool
content: A wonderfully comfortable chair, that assembled quickly and easily. I did opt to upgrade the wheels, and am glad I did. The swapped out ones look awesome and roll better. Not so much on carpet, but are great on hard floors like tile, wood, or linoleum, but very few do. The chair is really comfortable, and rocks great. Very stylish too, and will certainly make the office/gaming den look awesome. Also, loving the mesh.... it keeps my back chill on those game benders.
author: willisota
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Great chair!
content: Great quality chair, it was well packaged and no damage with shipping everything was tightly packed. Chair feels very comfortable, good looking and assembly was very easy. Instruction manual was provided and all tools and bolts provided as well. Will definitely buy more!
author: Terry C.
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: The more you sit, the more you will like.
content: About the Product It is a nice little tall chair with head rest and lumbar support. It is pretty light weight compared to the looks and size. Most of the Weight is on the lower half of the chair. IT rotates, moves up and down and rocks. IT would be good in winter if you want to hang anything back Who Should buy this This is probably for people who spends a long time sitting in the chair with constant moving front and back. People Who works from a desk primarily. It would also be beneficial to Students who spend quite a bit of time in the chair for gaming, writing studying. Things Great about This product Lumbar support would be the standout feature in this chair.Elbow rest are smooth. It's a little feature but nice one when you spend a lot of time in the chair. Back and forth motion Is great only after loosening it. Assembly is easy and you can move it easily from one place to another. Things not so great about this product Base cushion is not a lot compared to the other chairs I have sat. once you sit, you get used to it so you wont think about it. Color is grey. It does not goes well with lot of room colors. Would have been great if it came in black. My Recommendation If you are a person who expects the features and the looks, you can buy this product.Also consider this only if you are going to spend a lot of time in the chair. The more you sit, the more you will like.
author: Narayanan Ravi
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: Support all around..
content: A Christmas gift for myself. Lol....Very good support all around and ideal if you find most chair uncomfortable. Very quick to assemble. Very good quality and solid design. I definitely recommend this any one who looking for Ergonomic Office Chair at this price point. So far no complain about this chair.
author: Jason H.
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: I love this chair!!!
content: I want the world to know how much I love this chair!  Super comfortable!  I sit in this chair 9-12 hours, M-F, so I wanted a Cadillac!  All parts were in perfect condition and in the packaging.  Assembly instructions were fairly easy ... soooo worth the $$$.  I told my boss that I would pay for it because it is so awesome!!!  No exaggeration ... I am thinking about getting another for my home.
author: Lynette S Quigley
product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

product: Smugdesk Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Mesh Desk Office Chair with Padding Armrest and Adjustable Headrest -Gray

title: THE BAD The seat cushion has gone completely flat and is ...
content: My review after owning and using this chair everyday for one year. THE BAD The seat cushion has gone completely flat and is completely useless after one year. Feels like I'm sitting on wooden bleacher seats. This is the reason I gave only one star.  The sole purpose of a chair is to comfortably hold your bottom. The GOOD The chair itself has actually held up very well. The back, arms and tilt function all work perfectly with no signs of wear. If you buy this, buy an additional seat cushion as well.  Trust me on this one.
author: D. Boz
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Small but sturdy, comfy too!
content: Very sturdy, super easy assembly, with clear instruction (words and drawings).  Parts labeled well and even a little packet of 'extra parts'.  We bought this as a student chair knowing it was not going to be as big as our large high-back office chairs.  It is small, but as I said, very sturdy and the lever to raise and lower is awesome.  Casters roll well and the seat and back are nicely padded and very comfortable.  Only down side is that it is a small chair so don't expect a big-guy sized chair.  Perfect for a woman or student with a small frame.  We love it.  The photo shows this chair next to our standard full-sized office chair.  The back on this one is 19" from seat to top of the back.
author: jaime
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Another great deal for the money.
content: I'll admit that when I bought this chair I didn't even pay attention to the fact that it said "AmazonBasics" in the title.  But as it turns out, Amazing must have contracted some Chinese company to build them stuff in their name.  And as such, you can bet that the quailty of the item will actually be rather good.  Why would Amazon put their name on garbage? This chair is a fantastic value.  It was easy to put together, came with an Allen key and all if the hardware was in small, separate baggies that were labeled and the instructions were very well written and very easy to understand.  I had the chair together in under ten minutes while moving at a leisurely pace.  On top of this, the bolts came with blue thread locker already on them.  I know that isn't a huge deal to most people, but it means something to me.  It shows they want you to have this thing in one piece for a long time. The chair looks and feels like something you'd have in a professional office.  The faux leather is well made and quite comfortable.  The adjustment on it works very well and over all, the chair feels like it should cost much closer to the $100 mark. Make no mistake, this isnt some $300 chair, but at the same time, it isn't trying to be.  I basically bought this thing to sit in front of our computer that we almost never use.  So, in reality, I almost bought it just to complete my office.  So, if you have a home office and want a chair that's very comfortable, looks good but don't care about the lack of head rest and don't want to break the bank, this is the one. I actually work in front of a computer all day long, and this is a chair I wouldn't mind having there.  I'd probably miss the head rest after a bit, but this is something I would use in a professional setting.
author: Grayson Gilman
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Second time buying it! Great chair and very affordable.
content: This is a great chair for the price. Chairs exactly like this one go for over 100 dollars at target and Walmart (I did some shopping around before I chose this one). I always dread setting up furniture but this was the easiest peice I have ever had to assemble. The chair feels sturdy and is very comfortable. I have had this chair now for over a year and I also bought it for my brother for his room. Neither of us have had any issues with it and it seems to be great quality. The wheels have no problems on thick carpet or hardwood. My brother spends countless hours gaming in it and loves it! It’s large and I like to sit cross legged in it to help my back posture when I’m on the computer. I use it mostly however to sit in it daily to do my makeup in front of my wall mirror.
author: Janette Kopec
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Great For Occasional Home Office Use, Not For Full Timers...
content: I don't see many reviews regarding using this chair as a full time work chair.  It is probably because most companies provide decent seating for their employees, however just in case there is another that believes buying the cheapest chair possible for someone that sits in it full time I wanted to be sure that this review was there for them.  Invest some money in your employees chairs, they will be much more willing to work for you.  This chair is not meant for someone who spends a significant amount of time in it.  It has been a week and both armrests broke.  The chair has leaned to one side sine I got it and the seat back has never been able to be locked into an upright position.  This is a great chair for doing bills once a month (which given the price is obvious), however full time use doesn't seem to be its intent.
author: Marty
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Chair arm broke after a week. You pay for what you get with AmazonBasics
content: Got this chair for my new apartment, and it was great for one week until the arm broke. I'm not a big person, 5'8"/130, so I was surprised when the arm just snapped when I pushed on it getting up out of the seat. I read the other comments about the padding and height, but since I'm on the lighter side I figured I could make it work. The back is short, and the padding is a bit thin, but both are relatively good at this price point. If not for this defect it would be a solid chair at a reasonable price. I don't seem to be the only one with the arm-break issue, just be aware of the realities of cheaper products. Also, it's annoying that the only options for full refund or replacement require you to send the item back - a desk chair isn't exactly the easiest thing to ship back. Update: Called Amazon, was able to get a partial refund and keep the broken chair, but was surprised that I couldn't just get a replacement part for the broken arm. I sort of assumed that since it was their brand (AmazonBasics) that they'd have an army of these things and their corresponding parts for replacements, but that's apparently not an option. Silver lining is that luckily mine broke within a week so I was still able to get Amazon's help with the partial refund, but next time I shop on Amazon I think I'll be avoiding anything branded AmazonBasics.
author: Calvin
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: DO NOT BUY. Extremely uncomfortable. Rigid, sharp edge just under padding, presses into spine around mid-lower back.
content: Possibly the least comfortable chair I've ever owned. There's what feels like a sharp, rigid edge, just underneath the upper padding (picture the edge of a piece of plywood) running across the back, roughly at the level of the seam in the middle of the back. The padding is completely inadequate and does not even cover the structural material of the chair. Sitting in this thing for an hour means back pain. After two weeks of using this chair, my back HURTS. For what it's worth, I'm not a big person. I'm 5'10 and 140 pounds. I don't usually have problems finding reasonably comfortable, supportive chairs. If you are large, or if you have a specific medical need for an ergonomic chair with back support... Or, if you're breathing. If you can read this, you need to avoid the AmazonBasics Mid-Back Office Chair.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Good looking chair, but weak armrest (read updates)
content: I cannot recommend the chair to daily users. Barely 2 days after assembling the chair, I managed to crack the right side armrest as I was shifting my weight to correct my posture; I barely weigh 155lbs and the armrest didn't even bear my full weight before buckling. It's such a shame. The chair looks decent, feels good, and was easy to assemble; it's just that the armrests are terribly brittle. Currently in the process of getting a replacement armrest sent out by Amazon (hopefully). Will update my review with how that goes. (Update) Amazon offered a 35% refund, a refund the cost of the replacement part, a free replacement, or a full refund. I decided to go with a free replacement. (Updated 2) It's now late June 2017 and the replacement chair is still going strong. I suspect the original run of these had weak/defective arm rests that have since been corrected. Overall the chair looks immaculate except for a few minor cosmetic defects: first the vinyl on my left arm rest has begun to fray, a problem that continued use will exacerbate until I patch it. Second, the screw hole plugs repeatedly fall out, they're simply too loose to fit snugly into their holes. Other than that, it's proven to be durable and looks new at a glance, so I'll bump this up to a 3-star product (original 2-star) as its proven to be durable.
author: Spartan VI
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Will last LESS than 6 Months. DO NOT BUY!!!
content: I bought this chair in April for my desk at home where I work remotely. I was really happy with the comfort & ease of construction for the first three weeks but that's when signs of wear and tear started. 1 month into buying this chair, the pleather started to rip off the seat cushion. At 5 months (as seen in pics), you can see how worn the front of the cushion is and how it's about to fall off. (This is WITH bi-weekly wipe downs too to make sure the white is still clean) I was OK with using this chair with a ripped cushion... that is until this last week where the bolts holding the back on have stopped holding. The screws/bolts are wayyy too short for this chair to be stable for a long period of time, they're less than an inch long and are barely long enough to reach through the frame to the cushion. In fact, I can't even get the bolts back in due to the chair back warping to my back. PROS: -was handy for a month? -elbow cushions are nice CONS: -wears extremely fast -will break within the first couple months -seat cushion rips & flattens within the first month -pretty sure it's not stable for bigger people, I'm 150 lbs and the back frame started to warp under my pressure. All in all, this chair would have been worth it with if it would've lasted at LEAST a year!! Instead, at 5-6 months-- this chair is a terrible choice & a waste of money since it will be going into the trash today. 10/10 do not recommend getting this chair unless you're only going to use it for decor.
author: M
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Beautiful Chair for Great Price
content: Wife wanted comfortable/movable chair with firm cushion and straight back for post surgery recovery.  She is 5-1, 125lbs.  At low seat height and the back up straight with no backward lean she finds this chair will be ideal for her several months of recovery.  No need for a high back model.  Our other chairs and sofa are too soft and lean back.  This chair can lean back if desired with a quick pull out of the control lever.  The padded arms are very nice and soft.  She was immediately attracted to the photo on the Amazon page.  It is even more classy appearing in person.  She is very happy with this purchase!

product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

Update: Called Amazon, was able to get a partial refund and keep the broken chair, but was surprised that I couldn't just get a replacement part for the broken arm. I sort of assumed that since it was their brand (AmazonBasics) that they'd have an army of these things and their corresponding parts for replacements, but that's apparently not an option. Silver lining is that luckily mine broke within a week so I was still able to get Amazon's help with the partial refund, but next time I shop on Amazon I think I'll be avoiding anything branded AmazonBasics.
author: Calvin
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: DO NOT BUY. Extremely uncomfortable. Rigid, sharp edge just under padding, presses into spine around mid-lower back.
content: Possibly the least comfortable chair I've ever owned. There's what feels like a sharp, rigid edge, just underneath the upper padding (picture the edge of a piece of plywood) running across the back, roughly at the level of the seam in the middle of the back. The padding is completely inadequate and does not even cover the structural material of the chair. Sitting in this thing for an hour means back pain. After two weeks of using this chair, my back HURTS. For what it's worth, I'm not a big person. I'm 5'10 and 140 pounds. I don't usually have problems finding reasonably comfortable, supportive chairs. If you are large, or if you have a specific medical need for an ergonomic chair with back support... Or, if you're breathing. If you can read this, you need to avoid the AmazonBasics Mid-Back Office Chair.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Good looking chair, but weak armrest (read updates)
content: I cannot recommend the chair to daily users. Barely 2 days after assembling the chair, I managed to crack the right side armrest as I was shifting my weight to correct my posture; I barely weigh 155lbs and the armrest didn't even bear my full weight before buckling. It's such a shame. The chair looks decent, feels good, and was easy to assemble; it's just that the armrests are terribly brittle. Currently in the process of getting a replacement armrest sent out by Amazon (hopefully). Will update my review with how that goes. (Update) Amazon offered a 35% refund, a refund the cost of the replacement part, a free replacement, or a full refund. I decided to go with a free replacement. (Updated 2) It's now late June 2017 and the replacement chair is still going strong. I suspect the original run of these had weak/defective arm rests that have since been corrected. Overall the chair looks immaculate except for a few minor cosmetic defects: first the vinyl on my left arm rest has begun to fray, a problem that continued use will exacerbate until I patch it. Second, the screw hole plugs repeatedly fall out, they're simply too loose to fit snugly into their holes. Other than that, it's proven to be durable and looks new at a glance, so I'll bump this up to a 3-star product (original 2-star) as its proven to be durable.
author: Spartan VI
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

title: Will last LESS than 6 Months. DO NOT BUY!!!
content: I bought this chair in April for my desk at home where I work remotely. I was really happy with the comfort & ease of construction for the first three weeks but that's when signs of wear and tear started. 1 month into buying this chair, the pleather started to rip off the seat cushion. At 5 months (as seen in pics), you can see how worn the front of the cushion is and how it's about to fall off. (This is WITH bi-weekly wipe downs too to make sure the white is still clean) I was OK with using this chair with a ripped cushion... that is until this last week where the bolts holding the back on have stopped holding. The screws/bolts are wayyy too short for this chair to be stable for a long period of time, they're less than an inch long and are barely long enough to reach through the frame to the cushion. In fact, I can't even get the bolts back in due to the chair back warping to my back. PROS: -was handy for a month? -elbow cushions are nice CONS: -wears extremely fast -will break within the first couple months -seat cushion rips & flattens within the first month -pretty sure it's not stable for bigger people, I'm 150 lbs and the back frame started to warp under my pressure. All in all, this chair would have been worth it with if it would've lasted at LEAST a year!! Instead, at 5-6 months-- this chair is a terrible choice & a waste of money since it will be going into the trash today. 10/10 do not recommend getting this chair unless you're only going to use it for decor.
author: M
product: AmazonBasics Leather-Padded, Adjustable, Swivel Office Desk Chair with Armrest, Black

Our other chairs and sofa are too soft and lean back.  This chair can lean back if desired with a quick pull out of the control lever.  The padded arms are very nice and soft.  She was immediately attracted to the photo on the Amazon page.  It is even more classy appearing in person.  She is very happy with this purchase!

Like most, I am also working from home these days and long continuous sitting in-home office chair has been hurting my back. I wanted to get a new chair and tried this one. The armrest is pretty good and the mesh is strong to hold my back. Head support would have been great and the messaging cushion is useless. Overall it is a sturdy chair with a form- factor that does not really overly bulky. I'll update the review if something changes in the future.

title: Cheaper than Herman Miller, almost as nice.  Larger seat than cheaper models.

Granted this one isn't as adjustable, and the lumbar support isn't pronounced, but it is soooo much better than what I had.  It might be difficult for some to put together, as it can a bit heavy for one person, but the weight also contributes to the "well-made" feeling once put together.  The best thing about this chair is the size of the seat, which full supports my butt, and back of my thighs, all the way to the back of my knees.  The neck support is nice too, but I could see some being irritated with the limited positioning... It can be removed.

author: J T
product: Gabrylly Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair - Adjustable Headrest with Flip-Up Arms, Tilt Function, Lumbar Support and PU Wheels, Swivel Computer Task Chair

title: Great for the price with a few drawbacks
content: I struggle with back and neck pain and I needed a good hair at an affordable price. This chair does exactly that but with a couple frustrating things about it. 1. The seat is in a locked position and does not slide so you are almost forced to sit further down in the chair due to the plastic bezel around the seat mesh that will hurt quickly. I prefer to snug the chair for full back support but I have to slip down into the chair with my lower back not being supported. Not the end of the world but you'd think there would be at least a few inches of play but no there is just a large empty hole that you have to fill. 2. The neck support feels GREAT! But.. I am 6 foot 180 lbs and it just barely isnt tall enough for my neck to sit comfortably unless I'm leaned back while pushing myself further into the chair. 3. Arm rests are adjustable in terms of height and they fold back well. My 28 inch desk does not fit these chair arms in any position so I'm forced to put them up. My solution to this is to purchase a new desk that'll sit roughly 32inches off the ground. Good thing I already have plans for a DIY Ikea desk anyways. 4. The tilt function is just weird. You can lock it into position but only on certain parts of tilt. Even on the max setting (knob underneath seat) if I just put a little bit of weight on the back of the chair I go flying back into a recline position. 5. Support - there's plenty of it. I had a $150 gaming chair before this one and it blows it out of the water. So darn comfortable when you find that sweet spot of how to sit in it. The mesh feels great and gives plenty of support to my entire body. 6. Assembly took me 3 minutes to get the chair together. Super straight forward, if you have any sense the manual isnt even necessary. I don't know if I'm going to return it or not. I really do like this chair but it does have a lot of downsides. Maybe because of the price point but I feel like for $350 with tax it should not be missing these crucial adjustments and functionalities.
author: Tyler Geringer
product: Gabrylly Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair - Adjustable Headrest with Flip-Up Arms, Tilt Function, Lumbar Support and PU Wheels, Swivel Computer Task Chair

I’ve sat in chairs more expensive than this that were not breathable and it could get kinda hot sometime when my back is pressed against the chair. The headrest, at full extension, presses against my upper shoulders. It'd need to be another 6" taller to be useful for someone my height. Plus, the rigid plastic frame of the seat pressed into my legs and I was sore after sitting in the chair for 30 minutes. The non-adjustable design made my sciatica flare up quickly.

title: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING! AND MY BUTT IS VERY HAPPY AND THANKFUL! THANK YOU!
content: First off... let me start off by telling you how long i sit in a chair. I usually sit for minimum about 12 hours a day.  It is how i start the day and how i end my day. I make music throughout the day and usually im front of the computer for extended amounts of time. For anyone that sits for long amounts of time, they would know that it comes with aches and pains in odd places (usually back and buttox).  Because of this, i always have been in the market for new chairs.  Most chairs are great but its different when you sit for an extended amount of time.  This is where a great chair really shines.  If you can sit in the chair for longer, you can get more work done with taking less breaks, and at the end of the day you can relax without any pain radiating from your back or pelvic region.  This chair does that! Not to mention, the ease of building the chair was really nice! I was thinking that it was going to take a while to piece it together however i did it in less than 15 minutes following their manual they provided.  Super Simple! All in all, I would recommend this chair to anyone and everyone! its cheap compared to other chairs on the market and especially for the people that sits for extended amounts of time i really suggest purchasing this chair because it is a GAME CHANGER! PS.. my dog hopped up on the chair while i was taking pictures. This chair is officially "Mugsy Approved".

content: This is by far the best office chair I have ever used!  I sit at my desk for 12 to 15 hours per day. I would also have recurring carpel tunnel issues due to the lack of adjustments with the armrests.  I no longer have these issues thanks to this chair!!  This chair is FAR AND AWAY the best chair I have ever used!  With the multiple adjustments for the armrests my carpel tunnel is gone!  The lumbar support has made my lower back issues disappear!! It arrived on time and was easy to assemble.  The chair also looks fantastic!  The chair is superior quality and the mesh material is great for breathability - which comes in handy when sitting in the chair for long periods of time!  I will be replacing all the chairs in my office with this fantastic chair!  So happy to have finally found a chair that not only  meets but surpasses all of my needs!!

content: This office Chair has a really nice final look. Got a few compliments from coworkers already. author: Idan Kalai

title: Cheap mesh, lumbar support is a joke.
content: The bad: The mesh is saggy and not nearly firm enough, the lumbar support is not NEARLY as supportive as the pictures make it seem, I don't like how it bends with my body weight pressed against it. Lumbar support is supposed to be firm, not squishy. Some hard parts at the edges of the mesh that cause minor discomfort, I had to put a quilt over the seat to prevent annoyance. Headrest doesn't lock at angles, only height. The good: Wheels are nice (but you can get those for any chair), headrest is a nice touch but needs more adjustments that lock in place. Arms are solidly built, I can hold my entire weight against them (I'm 170lbs). Sturdy construction minus the mesh itself. I'm returning this. This chair is not worth NEARLY 250 dollars, not even close. I doubt I'll even try mesh again (especially for the seat). Don't waste your time or money, find something better.
author: jordan rattet
product: NOUHAUS Ergo3D Ergonomic Office Chair - Rolling Desk Chair with 3D Adjustable Armrest, 3D Lumbar Support and Extra Blade Wheels - Mesh Computer Chair, Gaming Chairs, Executive Swivel Chair (Grey)

title: Great chair would recommend
content: This is a great chair for many reasons. One of them being how easy it was to set up, it only took me 10-15 minutes to assemble. The second reason this chair is great is because of how comfortable it is, it doesn’t give me back pain and I can sit on it for hours without feeling any sort of pain. Lastly this chair is great because the quality for the price, I thought this chair would be double the price for how amazing it is. I would 100% recommend this to anyone that needs to sit down for several hours.
author: ABCBABLB
product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

title: Great chair average builds.
content: This is the fifth chair I have purchased for office personnel within a year. Two of those chairs were executive style, two were gaming style and this office style. I purchased this chair for a 175lb person with an 8 hour desk job.  We had concerns moving worker into such a smaller type chair from an executive high back style. A month later the chair sitter came and thanked me and explained the chair was comfortable.  He stated the seat had more cushion and the back support had him sitting in a better posture. He said the arms were better placed then the last chair, not only making it more comfortable on the arms when used, but easier with the furniture around the desk space. I had never thought of that concern.  He smiled big when he said the breathable back fabric was perfect and he didn’t overheat. That was from the user himself. As the buyer - I found it straightforward to put together.  Lightweight and easy to maneuver. The chair style looks clean and modern. Chair feels solid and well made. The size is perfect for the spaces we have. Large enough to use properly, but not overly bulky. The back doesn’t stick out into the isle ways like the last set of chairs tended to. Package and delivery was fine. It is clever how they can package and ship office chairs today. Happy with this purchase and may purchase a few more for other office spaces.
author: Doni
product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

title: Very nice office chair
content: I’m very happy to finally replace my old squeaky chair. This office chair is very easy to assemble with clear instructions. No extra tools required. The seat cushion is very comfortable. The chair back can support my waist with just enough curviness so I don’t feel tired even after sitting for a long time. The height of the chair can be tuned and the arm can be retrieved if you don’t like it. The most important thing: it doesn’t squeak! I will try to update my experience after a while.
author: Ivan Zhang
product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

I'm not good at all such things but I was able to put together within 20 minutes. This looks very pretty and strong too. Overall, it is very comfortable and nice looking office chair.

product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

content: This is a very good chair with great price. It is very comfortable. I work from home and every day I spend a lot of time in the chair. I need a good chair to make me feel comfortable so that I can focus on my work. This is a great choice for me. I like this chair.

product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

content: Breathable chair ,very simple but comfortable,I like this office chair design is easy to clean ! The back side only one net with the back frame ,but  is strong enough for lie down to take a rest !

author: Yuki J
product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

Adjust the knob at the bottom of the seat, you can tilt backwards and make moderate adjustments. This cushion is comfortable enough, but the plastic armrest is very hard and can’t lean on it comfortably. All in all, it can meet my needs for using it.  Satisfied with the purchase.

product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

content: Great basic office chair.  Easy to assemble,  comfortable. Pretty basic, great for home office use.

product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

content: The chair is quite comfortable and sits well. Glides easily over the carpet. Lightweight but very sturdy.
author: Janine Anderson
product: ZLHECTO Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Desk Chairs with Flip Up Armrests and Lumbar Support,Weight Hold Up to 250Ibs - Adjustable Height Mesh Computer Chair for Conference Room

title: Comfort
content: i buy often from Amazon and do not usually review a product but this is an exception. I have had this chair about a month and to date it far exceeds my expectations. It is superior to the char it replaced at less cost. the lumber support is good, the head rest is comfortable and the chair rolls smoothly.  I use this chair six to eight hours a day seven days a week.
author: Paul Cunzeman
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Good price and surprising comfortable.
content: I play a lot of wow. I went to several stores and tried out the “gaming chairs “ and imo it’s a lot of extra money for nothing. Ended up with this chair and I couldn’t be more satisfied. Great price. Took about 35 mins to assemble. Super comfortable. Have sat in it all day and it is great on the back. Keeps your back nice and straight while gaming and once you unlock the tilt is just right and very comfortable for casual computer use.
author: Adba
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Great comfortable chair for at home work.
content: I’ve had for a few weeks, upgraded from the wooden chair I’ve been working from.  I did plenty of research into an office chairs like this one for my at home office since I’m working from home all day now. The chair is quite comfortable and hugs you a bit on the sides. You can lock into position or allow it to rock gently, which I enjoy.  The material is soft and I’m very happy with the purchase, especially since this was one of the less expensive chairs I was considering.  Assembly requires two people and wasn’t difficult.
author: Jay Dee Harris
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Great for the price
content: I bought this as a general home office chair (not full-time use).  This chair exceeded my expectations.  It is comfortable and the adjustments are smooth and useful.  Unfortunately the instructions are minimalistic.  The handle/backrest combo was a little difficult for one person to assemble.  I thought it would be impossible but I put it together by myself by rotating/laying parts strategically so I could anchor one screw and then rotate the part to normal position to put in the second screw.  If you can't do it this way you will need a partner to help you hold things.  Regarding usage, it took me a while to figure out the recline/rocker feature.  I bought two chairs and one reclined but the other didn't, despite what we did with the tension knob.  The trick is in the lever that raises and lowers the chair.  Up/Down lowers the chair, but you can also slide it left/right to lock or unlock the tilt/recline/rocker mode.  Once I figured that out I have no complaints.  I can't speak to durability as I just got it, but the parts seem solid and well-built, so for the price I recommend this chair.
author: Porkins
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Not great, but good.
content: Assembly was frustrating on my own but once I got my power screw driver and a support box things went pretty smooth. On your own with just what they give you can be nightmare despite its simplicity. Out side of that I was very happy. Back support is terrific and overall very comfortable compared to some $200-$300 “gaming” chairs I have had. The big question will be longevity which at this price point isn’t usually that high but I have read good things in the comments with the biggest issues being merely cosmetic. If your looking for a simple, comfy, and cheap chair than I would recommend you grab one of these. Perhaps get the extended warranty for a few bucks more if your worried. Update: As of 8/15/2020 the chair has held up well. None of the cosmetic issues others have had but the arm rest padding has 'deflated' permanently. Not sure if that is the right word for the memory foam material but, no big deal. Still comfortable, good lumbar support, and if I have to spend $20 for arm rest padding then that beats a whole new chair.
author: joshua
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Overall looks and feels like a good chair. Some cosmetic issues.
content: Overall feels and looks like a good chair with a fair price. Pros: Has good back support, tall enough to rest head, easy to assemble, looks nice. Cons: Has some minor cosmetic & quality issues not impacting functionality. It  came with 2 scratches on the metal section of the armrests (see 1 attached picture) and the small triple plastic expanding cilinder for base pole was cracked. Dropping 1 star for this cosmetic issues. Reliability time will only tell. Will update if something happens to it.
author: Andy
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Nice chair, good value, easy assembly
content: This is replacing my former chair I've had for 15+ years that had most of the seams duct taped. So really nice to have something new. Very easy to put together. A couple hints: I would bolt the arms on (loosely!) to the seat when you bolt the seat bracket on the bottom  - BEFORE putting the seat on the base. Lay the seat on it's side and it will help hold/balance the arms as you put them on (if doing your self as I was). Then, with both arms attached but NOT TIGHT, lay the seat on it's side again to attach the back. I found it helped to attach the TOP seat back bolt first to hold it in place, then get the bottom one. Again, keep all the seat bottom & back bolts a little loose until you have them all started, then tighten them down. As far as comfort, not having ripped/split/taped seams poking into your legs is certainly an improvement!! (DUH!).  SO far, and I've only been sitting in it about 20 minutes, feels very nice. There IS a bit of a noticeable 'gap' or 'hump' between the back half of the seat cushion and the front half. Prior chair, the seat cushion was more a seamless '1 piece', so just a little to get used to but I think it will be fine. For the price ($100), I'm very happy.
author: Sheryl Meuchel
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: great chairs one damaged but fixed
content: I've updated this review from 4 to 5 stars.. customer service was EXCELLENT ! Updated review: they took care of the damaged arm in under 2 days, and have a replacement arm on it's way to me. I can't say enough how happy that makes me. I have to give the chairs 5 stars, and would give customer service 10 stars if I could. I can say I'd highly recommend this seller and this chair. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Original review: I bought 2 of these, they are really nice chairs.. they look nice and are very comfy, very nice for the price. easy to assemble but I'd recommend 2 people to help hold the pieces as you put them together. however I found the arm of one chair had been damaged in shipping. naturally I had one chair put together and the one with damage about 80% done before noticing.. so I've contacted the company to see if they can send me another "arm" for the chair. I'd have to say it doesn't' appear to be a manufacturing problem, and sending it back after we put it together and threw the boxes away, is likely out of the question.  We figure we were out of luck , but thought I'd reach out to the manufacture anyway. I'm hoping for a good result. I can tape it, but it's always disappointing to get something new and it's damaged. new rule at our house.. INSPECT.. INSPECT.. before you get rid of the boxes and assemble any items in the future. so overall, since the damage looks like a shipping problem I'd still recommend this chair, our other one arrived perfectly. the 4 stars is only for the shipping damage. otherwise it would be 5 stars. I may update to 5 stars if the manufacture can send me a replacement arm piece (customer service did in fact send me a replacement) now 5 stars all around !
author: Cain
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: It came early and feels solid --initially.
content: Was delivered a full week before promised, everything was securely packaged, and the chair went together easily.  I am impressed with the look and feel of this chair and my 300 pound body feels well supported with no complaint about the width.  I will try to write another review in a year for durability, mainly because the main "working part" --the bracket under the seat that fits over the support stem-- looks suspiciously identical to the same part on a somewhat cheaper chair this one replaced.  That other one broke after 2-1/2 years and the height could not be adjusted while I felt that I was uncomfortably balanced on the end of a stick.  So far, after one day(!), this one feels great;  we'll see!
author: JOHNB
product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

title: Super comfortable chair that offers excellent support! A pain to assemble.
content: First - I love this chair. It may be the most comfortable office chair I've ever owned. It looks nice, smells nice, and I find it to be more comfortable that my Herman Miller chair I use at the office. That being said, the assembly was really painful. The instructions were unclear, and some steps were skipped over outright (the wheels for example - you have to really use some force to push them into the holes ALL THE WAY, otherwise when you sit they will fly off the chair and spin out in every direction. There were no instructions on how to assemble the wheels.) It took my spouse and I a few hours to get the thing assembled. I feel that it was ultimately well worth the struggle, but if you're not particularly handy this may be something to keep in mind when considering the purchase.

product: Furmax High Back Office Chair Adjustable Ergonomic Desk Chair with Padded Armrests,Executive PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support (Black)

Two people will be faster. 4. feature: 5 levels Lumbar Support, Flip Adjust Armrests, height adjustment. 5. Max weight capacity: 275lbs 6. Warranty: 5 Year You will focus on your work not your back anymore!

content: I’m working from home and it took me awhile looking for an ergo chair. I was having shoulder pain when I was using another kind of ergo chair and had to return it since it only added stress. This one feels good and comfortable and it’s not just how it looks (which i like including the color) but the comfort really matters. I work long hours and I need a chair that keeps me going.

product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

title: Value for price not quite there
content: Update: May 17 2020 - Been sitting in this chair for two months now and would NOT recommend. The lumbar support feature is much too low and silly to use. The seat seems to tilt forward (as mentioned in other's reviews) and becomes incredibly uncomfortable after an hour or so. By the end of the day, my back and legs are both sore from constantly adjusting myself. I'd like to note, I have always worked a desk job, sitting all day, so this is definitely a chair issue. This chair was difficult to assemble and the instructions were incredibly vague. Definitely make sure to have a partner on hand to help out. The arms and legs are made out of cheap painted silver plastic material, though the actual seat fabric is very comfortable and at least appears good quality. It seems that, for this price, the arms should be adjustable. They sit incredibly high for me personally. I am 5'5" and they sit about mid rib cage. All in all, you can certainly find a MUCH nicer chair for the $200 price tag.
author: Errin Cooke
product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

title: Super comfortable
content: I needed an office chair so that I could work from home (quarantine).  This one was highly rated on Amazon so I took a chance.  My husband put it together and it seemed a little bit tricky but I think that was because of the arms.  I sat on the chair and was in heaven.  Super sturdy and comfortable.  So far I love this.
author: JVJ
product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

title: Ouch
content: Purchased for my office at our vacation home where I'm working remotely during the pandemic. Let's start with what's good. It's very cushy, roomy and attractive. After that, I can't recommend. It was a real beast to put together. Very difficult to make screws and holes align. The chair doesn't have much flexibility and can't make many adjustments. I couldn't sit in it for more than 20 minutes without getting up to stretch because of how the seat is positioned. If I forgot to get up and move, it would literally take me 10 minutes to be able to stand up straight. After 2 days, I ordered a Herman Miller Celle chair on eBay. Took 20 seconds to assemble. Worth every penny.
author: HG6649
product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

content: This is a very fancy and comfortable chair! It even have a changeable back support that can support my back when I am not fully lay on the back. Love it!

product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

content: I received it last week and it's easy to assemble it just on my own. But it's a little bit heavy, I'm not sure if it means good and strong material and quality. The soft pillow set up for your low back which is my favorite part so I don't have to set another pillow there to make my low back straight. Recommend to buy it, very cost-effective!

product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

content: The leather like material is very thin. It's too heavy to return to Kohl's pick up center, USPS, or FedEx. Had I seen it in person, I would not buy it. Go to the store or buy them from Costco! I'm sooo disappointed with the purchase.

product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)

title: great chair, met expectations
content: i like the lumbar  support i like the height adjustment i don't like that the cushioning in the seat feels a little uneven, higher on the left than the right. only had the chair for a month so i doubt it's from my sitting position causing uneven pressure...i'm not heavy enough to have that much of an impact that quickly.  It felt uneven from the first time i sat in it, but overall the quality is good and the lumbar support is excellent.
author: cindy l finkelman
product: NOUHAUS +Posture Ergonomic PU Leather Office Chair. Click5 Lumbar Support with FlipAdjust Armrests. Modern Executive Chair and Computer Desk Chair (Black)
