content: Life changer for work at home
author: Le Q
product: Ticova Ergonomic Office Chair - High Back Desk Chair with Elastic Lumbar Support & Thick Seat Cushion - 140°Reclining & Rocking Mesh Computer Chair with Adjustable Headrest, Armrest

title: Best quality/price ratio
content: Very high-quality chair. I'm 5''11, the headrest is suitable for 6 feet max height persons. I liked the lumbar support. Armrest are a little bit short, close to the back and do not move forward-backward, only up & down. But for this price, it's an excellent high comfortable chair.
author: Ilya Kolesnikov
product: Ticova Ergonomic Office Chair - High Back Desk Chair with Elastic Lumbar Support & Thick Seat Cushion - 140°Reclining & Rocking Mesh Computer Chair with Adjustable Headrest, Armrest

title: Awesome
content: Couldn’t be more happier very comfortable. Easy to put together, and came with gloves which was a nice touch !!!!!! Keep the metal looking shinny..
author: clinton jones
product: Ticova Ergonomic Office Chair - High Back Desk Chair with Elastic Lumbar Support & Thick Seat Cushion - 140°Reclining & Rocking Mesh Computer Chair with Adjustable Headrest, Armrest

title: Very Nice!
content: Bought this chair for my husband and he loves it - he has been through several chairs and they were either uncomfortable or didn't last.  This one is very comfortable and seems really sturdy Thanks
author: Kathleen
product: Ticova Ergonomic Office Chair - High Back Desk Chair with Elastic Lumbar Support & Thick Seat Cushion - 140°Reclining & Rocking Mesh Computer Chair with Adjustable Headrest, Armrest

title: Absolutely Awesome! Comfortable Chair, firm back support and neck support!
content: I was recently moving to a new house and brought a lot on amazon, so here is my review for this amazing chair, out of my expectation! I brought the chair days ago and it arrived in just 2 days. The installation was not time consuming and very easy to follow the instructions they gave, and they also provide the tools, which was very sweet and considerate. it only took me 20 min or so to finish installation. To me the chair is too great for this price, as I walked around Staples and other furniture stores, I didn't expect the chair of this quality to be just a little over 100 bucks! all the accessories are well designed and protected by an additional plastic layer which looks high-end and beautiful. The most amazing part as I showed in my video and photos is that the back and neck support when you laying on the chair, the chair back can flexibly and smoothly adjust to the angle at your comfort plus I can easily make it maintain the position simply by pulling a handle below the seats. The wheels under the chair are of good quality and don't make noise on my wooden floor. I was concerning as some of the reviews mentioned that the chair will slip when people sit down, well, it never happen in my case, I guess you just need to follow the instructions and everything goes on well. I really enjoy this chair and the sense of being in a sifi movie. and it looks professional and clean. Ill give it a 10 out of 5 if possible, so far my most satisfied item I brought on Amazon.
author: Leilar
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: good chair for my dad
content: My dad bought this office for restaurant office use. the reason he wants this chair is he got back hurt since two months ago.and the doctor told him to do some athletic do not seat on a chair(restaurant chair) too long. There are 38 commercial chairs in the restaurant. before he purchased this one he used commercial chairs for many years. After seeing the doctor last month, he always feels short something. then I ask him:" why do you don't buy a new chair?yes, a better office chair will help a lot for a back hurt daddy. after I received it, he came home the second day and took the chair to the restaurant. until he came home yesterday. Showed me how he likes this chair, I finally knew everything. 1: comfortable and soft enough 2 easy to adjust the seat high and chair back. 3: chair size fit my dad's body. 4: quality match up to the item described. 5: good choice for back hurt person.
author: LynnsWong
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: wonderful chair
content: For many years, I have had to put up with some really flaky chairs, some selling for ridiculous amounts of money (waht a waste). And they all had the same things in common: the seat cushion was irritating, the seat back provided almost no support leading to a lot of back pain(which i have to buy a back support every time ), and I always had to stick a small pillow to provide a token amount of lumbar relief. This chair had NONE of those problems! I bought it on JUL after my second chair retired , and in its fourteen day of continuous daily use, it is the undisputed chair champ! My purchase came after a virtually endless amount of research online - every chair that seemed to hold some promise fell apart when I read the reviews (and most review is so long and unreal, i guess there must be paid for wiring those fake reviews)- even as I kept moving up the price points. I finally decided to go test out the chairs that were available on Amazon since I always shop here and good after sales return policy if anything went wrong instead of go to each store to test and compare the cost- and I wasn't disappointed! I even dozed off in the chair, and when I woke up, there was none of the aches and pains that were indigenous to all the other chairs I had to live with. Get yourself one while it's still in stock!
author: tongmingfan
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Terrible, do not buy
content: So I got this because it has a mesh back which I thought would be cooler since I am in a chair for work for hours at a time.  The assembly instructions were terrible, the knob that controls the height wasn't installed and was just lying in the box with the bolt and other two piece, but were not on the instructions at all.  Also it doesn't hold that back up well at all if you use the arms to stand up it slides the back down with any sort of pressure at all, which defeats the second reason I got it because I am tall and wanted a taller chair to support my head/neck.  Next its is uncomfortable.  The cushion at the top of the chair is hard and sticks out so that the bottom of it jams into my back, especially after it slides back down after standing up once.  The seat cushion is mediocre.  The only positive what so ever I can say is that the mesh does keep my back cooler, otherwise this is a miserable product.
author: Amazon Customer
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Great product
content: This is a suitable chair for my study room computer desk. I came across the style of this chair and made the purchase. It was an enjoyable purchase. I got it now in front of my desktop in replace of the old wooden chair. It suits my place well and give me a lot of comforts when I use my computer for long hours. There are a few things I want to comment on this product: 1. The installation of the chair is easy to achieve with one person if following closely with the manual. It could be a little intriguing if you have no experience in using tools and screws to put different compartments together. If you could however, the chair is stable and durable if assembled properly. 2. The chair has a fancy looking with its stylish modern looking back. Aside from that, it is designed with a meshed chair back which gives more air flow for warm weather. I haven’t test it for the moment, but it feels comfortable when air is flowing behind my back. 3. The pillow is located just behind my neck. I can easily rest in my chair when I was tired now. As the pillow is at fixed position, it is recommended you check the size first before making a decision. 4. The high back gives strong back support. I can easily lie down when i recline the back. The angle of backrest, could serve me a high-quality snap if i need and will.
author: K
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Very sleek looking chair
content: I was looking get a new ergonomic office chair to replace an old chair I had.  The features that were important to me were: 1. Ergonomic and comfortable for long periods of time. 2. Mesh (gets really hot in California, also not as disgusting as cloth and leather which absorb sweat). 3. Reclines far enough to actually rest in. 4. Looks contemporary and can fit in any color office or environment. This chair hit the mark on all my requirements.  Shipping was really fast, and came in a decent size box, not too heavy.  Setup was super easy.  If you can follow simple picture instructions (like something from Ikea) you can do this easily.  Took me less than 30 mins to fully assemble the chair.  I had a very small blemish on one of my arm wrest, still functional, and the company was very fast to respond to my email.  They went above and beyond to resolve my issue and make sure I was happy.
author: Tommy T.
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Super elastic, super durable
content: This chair its by far the lighest and the most durable i've ever had in my life, it may not look like it can take up heavy pressure on the back support but its way more durable and elastic than it looks. the seat ares very soft, it felt like they've added another layers of cushion on top of another. its very bouncy, even thought it may feel kinda thick but surprisingly it doesn't generate too much heat, it stays cool, If the manufacturers see's this review, please tell me what did you put in the seat that reduces heat. overall this was an AMAZING purchase, I would highly suggest that if you're looking for something lightweight and easy installation, then this is your best choice, the whole process of putting this shoe together probably only took me around 5 mins, its just so easy to install i don't even have to read the manual.
author: Jay zheng
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Perfect chair for my daily study and gaming.
content: The delivery is very quick and the chair is very easy to assemble. The manual is very easy to understand and it only takes me about 15 minutes to assemble. Also, the seller is very considerate and tools are all attached. The quality is very good and my friend even though it's a very expensive one because the material does not feel like the cheap plastic at all, there are parts that can support my head and back, aka One-piece headrest that was way better than normal headrest. For people like me who need to stare at the screen for a long time every day, this product truly helps protect my back and neck. All in all, I like this chair very much and my friend also wants to buy one after trying mine. I'll recommend it to others. The most important is that the chair is very comfortable. After all, I should get the footrest one, if I want to extra one chair now, I would choose the one with footrest!
author: Dxy
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

content: Let's start from the unboxing state to the actual use. Unboxing: All of the parts and pieces are well padded and wrapped. Assembly: The product uses hex screws and comes with a hex wrench, as expected. Wheels just need to be popped in place. Overall assembly took me roughly 15 minutes. Comfort: The cushion of the chair is nice, gets the job done. I don't feel any unwanted pressure points, but still decided to use my Purple chair cushion anyway after testing the chair's seat for a few days of work. The arm rests have nice grooves for your fingers if you like to grip the chair and stretch out every now and then. There is a lumbar support cushion installed on the chair that I think works well. I've tinkered around with the head rest and while it does get the job done, I probably would be able to fall asleep on it since the headrest and back support are in 1 piece. I guess it's for the best that way. Moving around: The chair rises and drops smoothly. There is an option to lock the backward rocking of the chair or keep it free, which I keep locked because the free is a little bit too free for me. The wheels that come with this chair work well on hardwood floors. There was separate wheels that you can not buy form them, but i contact them, the will place it in the future, wheels work well on carpet as well and are quieter. Overall: A great office chair. I wish that there was a little bit more upper back support but I don't think it's bad enough to knock off a star. The price is fair and the product is well-made, nice quality.
author: sooooner11
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: comfortable Ergonomic Chair for daily office use
content: This product provides good ergonomic support. Very easy to assemble and video was useful as it provides step by step instruction to assemble. Chair had cracking sound during every movement and arm rest cushion became flat after first use so I was not satisfied with the product. Sent an email to customer service and they quickly provided me an answer and agreed to ship another chair. I had hard time to get another delivery due to long delivery issue. Finally today after 15 days got another chair. Quickly assembled it. Although cushion was missing for back support on another delivery, I still appreciate their response and providing me another chair as initial delivered chair had cracking sound and arm rest cushion was not upto the standard. Highly recommend this chair for work from home office or gaming use.
author: Priyank
product: HOMEFUN Ergonomic Office Chair, High Back Adjustable Desk Task Chair with Armrests Black with Lumbar Support

title: Fixes my back problem
content: This chair is surprisingly simple yet very classy. I like the leather finish it has and the “all white” fits my desk perfectly. I think the best part about this chair is the back support i get. I don’t have the greatest of backs and with this support, I’m able to sit straight and get work done a lot better. Some say posture creates confidence. I think this chair is giving me confidence haha.
author: Nelson
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Great chair
content: I had to replace my old chair. I have a white theme with my furniture.  I purchased this chair and so far no complaints.  The seat is firm but not uncomfortable. I spend at least 2 hrs a day on my computer to do homework and it gives me the support I need. The chair was easy to assemble and instructions were very easy to read. Only took like 10 minutes for someone who doesnt know how to build things to put together.
author: channa brown
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Ergonomic and big relief from my kitchen chair as working chair.
content: I didn't setup my office area in my home as i didn't anticipate to work from home often, so then came this pandemic and i'm working from home continuously and not sure how long this continues, so i decided to do a favor to myself and not sit in my cafe chair and suffer with back ache and ordered this chair, as it is in my price range, and i can't be more happy that i made this decision finally, this chair is great, although i wish that it is slightly wider, it is very comfortable however, i sit continuously for about 4-5 hours and don't have that fatigue anymore , it can recline a little bit and can move up and down, so this gave me flexibility to even use my countertop to work as high chair :) Assembly is easy and everything comes smartly packed in the backrest, i would suggest not to use the allen wrench that came with it, after using it for 5 minutes my fingers started hurting, so i used the one i have at home which was better,  If you are looking for a quality budget chair, this is it!
author: Dia
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Surprisingly Ergonomic and Comfortable
content: I picked up this chair to replace a worn out desk chair that had been in use for about 5 years.  Note, this chair comes disassembled and comes in a rather large box, so be aware of that for delivery.  The chair was sent out quickly.  Assembly took about 25 minutes and the provided directions were thin but adequate for the number of parts this chair needed. Sitting in the chair at first is a bit weird, partly due to the raised cushion area that sits toward the front of the cushion right under your thighs.  It takes some time to adjust to the fact that it is there, but I have noticed my posture forced to improve and less strain on my knees and thighs after close to 8 hours per in the chair.  Don't be put off by, it and take some time to adjust as it definitely has long term benefits and is comfortable in a non-traditional way.  The rubberized wheels allow it to glide on laminate and tile floor, but I havent tested it on carpet to see how it moves.  All in all a great price for a really nice and comfy chair that has some side-effects for posture and your sitting health.
author: Rosh D.
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Great chair at a great value
content: Due to current events, I have been working at home the past few weeks like so many others. This is not my normal work set up so my kitchen table has quickly become my temporary office. I work 10 hour days and let me just say, sitting on a kitchen chair for that amount of time is very hard your back. I desperately needed an office chair but did not want to invest hundreds of dollars. I decided on this chair and it is great. It was very easy to put together and only took around 15 minutes. It came with extra hardware in case it was needed and was labeled as 'extra'. I like that the seat height is adjustable and the chair it has a slight recline to it so I can prop my feet up on something and sit back and relax while on conference calls. The entire chair is sturdy and well made, though I do wish the seat was a little wider - it feels a little narrow in my opinion but not uncomfortable. Sitting in the chair feels comfortable; I am now able to work my full 10 hour days without pain. It has definitely saved my back!!
author: JKGetts
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Nice Decor Compatible Office Chair
content: This is a good looking white chair, matches with my desk and has a good and tall back support when compared to other ergonomic chairs. The height lever works great and smooth and the wheels also roll nicely. The leather goes with the decor and the armrest seem okay as well. The chair does not seem to bend to 120 degrees as the picture claims.
author: Number Five
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Chair is really comfortable
content: My favorite chair so far!  It took me like 15 minutes to set up. It looks really good with the different wheels, helps keep my back straight as well.
author: D. Music
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Pleasantly Surprised!
content: Put this chair together in a few minutes, very happy with it so far. I mean, I literally have had it for 23 minutes so I can't tell you about the longevity, but it seems like a real solid, well designed chair! Actually, this is also one of the first products I've purchased that put a lot of thought into the shipping. They even put a piece of cardboard under the box flaps so that when eager buyers start cutting open their package you don't risk cutting through the chair itself. I mean, that was really nice to see. The chair is actually not for me though so I'll have to report back later if anything goes horribly wrong. But so far A+!
author: Justin Shelby
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: It’s very nice
content: The chair is great for the price. Very easy to assemble and it looks very comfortable. Mine just came with a little scratch in one of the legs but it’s not a big deal. If you are looking for a chair to last you for years I would probably recommend another one. This one is perfect for me for what I need it for. Very happy with the purchase.
author: Anto
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Perfect chair
content: I LOVE this chair. I was looking for a white chair to fit my vanity and this is perfect. The height is adjustable, you can lean back on it when you want to relax, and it took me less than 15 mins to assemble. It rolls on the floor very smoothly and has little to no squeaking. At first, it is a little stiff but this is how all chairs are when you first assemble them. All you have to do is keep sitting on it and eventually it will get comfy. I have received many compliments on this chair and if I had to choose between this and any other $100+ chair I would most likely choose this one!
author: Montse
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

author: Montse
product: Office Chair Leather, Mid Back Home Office Chair Bonded Leather Computer Swivel Task Desk Chair - White

title: Perfect if you're petite.
content: I bought this just prior to starting nursing school in anticipation of long days of studying. I also work online and spend a lot of time sitting at a desk. I can sit in this chair for hours at a time and not feel soreness in my back or tailbone. It's only been about two months but the cushion and back support show no signs of deflating or flattening even with constant use. It was extremely simple to put together as well, and I feel the material, while not true leather, is reasonably durable (I'm not particularly rough with my possessions). A taller person would probably find issue with the height of the chair back. It's only just tall enough for me and I'm short. If you are a larger person or really wide in the hips you may find the width a bit small. Nevertheless, it's a perfect chair for me and I believe it will last me quite a while.
author: Kimberly
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Good quality materials; easy to assemble.
content: I was impressed with how the parts felt heavy and of good quality. I liked how the parts were labeled well, even down to labeling the extra ones as spares! The ONLY thing that was bad was the screw caps never fit flush; I gave up trying. But all in all assembly was left than 30 minutes. Oh and be CAREFUL when you attach the leg assembly to the bottom of the chair! The front of the cushion IS labeled FRONT but the assy drawing misleads. JUST make sure the round tilt control is in the front of the chair when you screw the four bolts in. After sitting in it a few minutes I had to add a pillow. The reason is that the front part of the seat cushion is higher and thicker than the place where your rear goes. I am sure a lady would have no issues but as a man it does compress my um parts.
author: Southern gent
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Love my new chair, recommended!
content: This is my 3rd chair in 4years, they are all very easy to assemble, LOVE this one! Great quality, sturdy chair, seat pad feels thick and comfortable enough(compare to my last one), I'd definitely recommend! Order on the 2nd and arrived on 6th morning, so I will rate it 4.8 stars because not fast as most purchases with 1-2 day shipping, also its taxed.
author: Amazon Customer
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Uncomfortable
content: Looks nice. This chair did not fit right at all. This chair is really small. I'm 5'2" and can easily reach the ground and tilt back in it. I wouldn't purchase this if you are a larger size. My hips just fit (size 18). It doesn't have any lumbar support and the arms are very low which made reaching my keyboard uncomfortable. I work a full 8 hour day at my desk and the cushion was pancake flat in one week. I gave it to the kids and went back to my old chair.
author: J. Henderson
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Fantastic chair
content: OMG, this chair is a LIFE-SAVER, I am loving my chair. This particular chair was super easy to put together; it has a high quality look and is SUPER comfortable. I can sit in it for hours, as I have a tendency to do, and not get any lower back pain. I have to admit, I had limited options of what chairs would be delivered to me, as I am abroad and many companies would not deliver to my particular location, but HON had no issue delivering to me and in a timely fashion. I got such a great "deal", because the other office chairs that I was checking out were a bit more expensive than this one (I wasn't even considering it, initially), so it all worked out nicely; it looks as though it may cost 2-3 times more than it does. The reclining angle is nice and there isn't too much resistance/tension on it, so you can easily stay in a reclined position for as long as you'd like. I have set my height position, and don't have a need to adjust it, however, the maximum position is appropriate for the standard-height desk and the lever is easy to access and use. There's nothing like a good quality seat to give you comfort as you do your work. Good quality; good price and very professional look.
author: Jata
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Pricey But Professional & Comfortable!
content: I am 8 months pregnant and I work from home. I needed a very comfortable chair to support my whole body while in the sitting position, especially since I work full time. this chair not only looks nice and professional but it’s very cushiony. I instantly noticed a difference from switching from my old chair to this one. My abdominal pain went away and my back and bottom had so much more support. this chair is a bit pricey but it was worth the money since it provides me with all the support I need to work comfortably from home. My Boyfriend was the one who assembled this chair. It took him about 15-20 minutes so I assume it was an easy assemble.
author: Jalissa Queen👑
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Zero Lumbar Support. Easy to Assemble
content: Eh... Maybe a little over-priced. It's a decent enough chair, looks attractive, rolls smoothly, BUT there is seriously no lumbar support what-so-ever. I could have done better at same price point and so can you.
author: Zephyr
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: You get what you pay for.  Spend more on a better chair.
content: Same problem with one of the screws as everyone else bitched about. No matter what, one screw WILL NOT go in. The chair back is too low for me. The rollers on it are probably the best attribute. I bought it to rest while cooking, so, for the price it's not bad, but if I was to do it over, I'd buy a better chair. It's just O.K. in my opinion . Not the most comfortable. I would not want to sit in it for a days work at all!
author: 1 spicychef
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Not a happy camper!
content: This chair is not comfortable. The back was stated to recline and does NOT. UPS has not arrived to pick this chair up. UPS says I have to pay for pick up! Amazon says it’s free! Can’t get a hold of Amazon at all! I WANT MY REFUND NOW NOT A CREDIT.
author: J Thomas
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Low Quality.
content: For nearly $100 I expected a LOT more.  The padding is pitifully thin, the cover material is super thin and cheap, the sewing is atrocious.  When it's assembled there's a huge gap between the seat and the back on one side making it look lopsided.  I adjusted the screws every which way but there's still a gap.  Cheap Chinese Cr*p and I'm stuck with it.  Don't buy this chair, invest in a decent brand.
author: ~Susan
product: The HON Company BSXVST305 Sadie Leather Executive Computer/Office Arms-Ergonomic Swivel Chair (HVST305), Black

title: Amazing comfortable computer chair!
content: Amazing looking chair! This chair was really simple to install and makes a great addition to our new house. The style and comfort this chair provides is amazing to say the least. I absolutely love the blue and black design and feel of comfort it provides. I definitely would reccomend buying this chair again.
author: Amado Navarro
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: great quality!
content: This chair is a great quality, and the colors are great! It was pretty easy to assemble, and it has a decent amount of padding in it compared to my old chair. *PS. don't mind the messy room, I'm painting it.*
author: Myranda F.
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Comfortable
content: I'm impressed with this chair.  It's well made and comfortable.
author: Angela Hendrickson
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Great back support.
content: This chair is replacing a previous office chair I had that I wanted to get rid of as the back of the chair had softened and offered no support. This gaming chair is very comfortable and provides a lot of back support, great for usage over long hours. It was easy to assemble and I am glad I purchased it!
author: Devin
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Good for the price
content: Lots of prior reviews on the chair about there being no back support and that everything came packaged inside the back. They changed from that and the lumbar is very supportive. The chair is quite comfortable and the usb cable for the massage feature is surprisingly long. Adding the legs to the base required a bit of muscle but other than that it’s a good chair for $85
author: Amazon Customer
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Great and comfy. Solid looking chair!
content: Honestly, at this price point, this chair is a great pick. It's solid and comfy and looks amazing. Works well with my setup and the assembly was awfully easy! Heres the pros to the chair -Looks are great and look premium -Easy to assemble, took about 8 minutes -Feels solid and durable unlike some other chairs at this price -Has a massager that works well Cons -The cord for the massager isn't long enough. It would be perfect if it was 6 ft -I wish there were modes for the massager (then again, this is a budget chair so there isn't much to ask for) Overall a great chair which is why I am leaving this a 5 star review!
author: KhanBaba
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Awesome chair
content: I’m impressed that this chair is extremely well-made with quality similar to my old DX Racer gaming chair. The pleather cushions are comfortable - even the armrests are padded for my elbows to rest upon. I can play video games all day in this chair without getting that feeling of "sitting for too long". It’s lightweight without being cheaply made and it reclines easily. My favorite feature is the tilt that lets you lean back as if youre sitting on a cloud. Assembly was also extremely convenient - all the parts are labeled and it comes with everything you need to put it together. I love it!
author: Adrian
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Buy this Chair!
content: This chair was extremely easy to assemble - I have never done an easier assembly in my life. The chair has awesome reclining support and now my entire family is using the massage part (which is awesome). Great for long days in the office, feels extremely premium, and is sturdy and well built.
author: Omar
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Nice Quality Chair
content: This is a nice comfortable chair for the price. The massage feature is an added benefit (USB cord in back pocket). Height is adjustable and it rocks back. Perfect for a home office. It is a nice looking chair also.
author: Kat
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Probably the best you'll get under 100
content: DAMN this is a good chair for the money. Perfectly comfortable, good swivel, good lean on it. It has plenty of cushion but I got a butt pillow anyway. The only two things are: - wish you could adjust the height more - wish the back was taller so I could rest my head (i.e. nap in it) To be fair, this is not a high quality chair - feels a little cheap - but for this price it's really dope and also sick, wiggity not whack and awesome to the max. And it has a massager.
author: Jiggle Billy
product: SMUGCHAIR Racing Gaming Chair Executive Bonded Leather Computer Office Chair with Adjustable Height and Padding Armrest

title: Not as nice as it looks
content: For the price, this chair is not what I was expecting. The back is only connected by 2 screws on each arm rest. There is nothing connecting it to the back. It's comfortable enough but I'm concerned about how long this will last. The arms and base are plastic. It only adjusts up and down. I bought this because of the Coronavirus and having to work from home temporarily. Hopefully it holds up for a few weeks. Do not buy this if you are looking for a full time office chair that will be used everyday. It won't hold up.
author: Jean Knoell
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Back pain in a box
content: I did not consider myself picky, and set very low standards for a chair in this price range and was still disappointed. Within the first day it really hurt my lower back. It’s shape forces my back to slouch and has zero lumbar support. I tried blankets, pillows, shifting and could not get comfortable. I kept trying for a week, determined to make it work and have never had a chair so deliberately hurt my back. I’m in my 20’s, no prior back problems, 5’11 and 180lbs. Only sat in the chair for maybe 4 hours at a time and it was still miserable. My wife tried it also, she’s about 5’5, 120lbs and it hurt her back also. I do not recommend this office chair. I returned the chair, and ordered a Modway Task chair and immediately felt relief in my lower back with actual lumbar support.
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: COVID-19 work from home
content: This was super easy to assemble. It took less than half an hour. For the money, everything looks quality and comfortable. It looks great and professional for our home office. Didn’t expect to be working from home and I think this is going to be my favorite part! Lol!!
author: LH from SC
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: it didn't flex back enough
content: i was looking for something nice but that i could lounge back in and but my feet up on the desk like Im the boss.  This looked like a boss chair but didn't have that flex needed.  over the quality was good and it went together pretty easy aside from the last screw which was hard to line up and push in place.. I had to loosen the other screws and put this one in place first loosely then do the others.  it felt nice to sit.  Ultimately i had to return it, just didn't meet my needs
author: George
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Work from home with this amazing chair
content: I bought this chair cuz my old chair is broken and needed to be replaced asap. This package came in a good condition. looked very great , SUPER comfortable when you use it in other word it does not have anything to criticize , and more importantly it gives you a really clear directions on how it should be installed. Especially, it tells you which part it should be installed first and no complicated directions. However, it also has some bad side of it. First of all, the screws doesn't come with the spare. Remember that i lost one of the screw and took a while to find it. Secondly, the shipping is somehow longer than usual (about 2 weeks). Overall, it is a great and professional that i would recommend anyone who is looking for a good chair that can work from home.
author: Jerry Yu
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Great bang for Buck!
content: Nice inexpensive computer chair that works. Not much to and it seems like it should last a while. Feel comfortable and very easy to assemble. For the price, its great. Are there better chairs? Of course but this is one of those products where you just say "It'll do" and you'll be satisfied with the price.
author: 40rty
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Good looking, comfortable for the money
content: I bought this as i have to work from home due to COVID, the packaging and the box is great. Very easy to assemble, took like 15 minutes but the booklet could have been better in some areas like which way to assemble especially for the hand-rest. 1. If the back side of the seat is not assembling right , that means you've put the hand-rests the wrong way. 2. Please install the wheels after you assemble the whole chair, its easier that way so the chair doesn't keep moving when you are working on it. It looks great, the color and the cushion is awesome including the padding. There is tilt but it's not the way you expect, the back side of the seat doesn't move rather it tilts from the bottom. I know its nice feature to have the back tilt, but i'm okay for the price. Don't know how long it lasts but for $115, this is more than good. The only worry i have is the back is literally held by 4 screws, 2 on each side and doesn't have any other support.
author: Sri7
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Stay away from this cheap chair
content: This is probably the most poorly constructed chair i have ever seen. Drilled holes would not line up despite repeated attempts to assemble. Followed instructions to a tee and it just wouldn’t fit. Cover material is wafer thin and was tearing at the screw holes. Sewed seams also look weak. Don’t buy this chair. Spend the money for something better.  Amazon processing a return.
author: KentS
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: Thicc and Sturdy
content: After sitting on a 12 year old low-end staples brand swivel chair, anything else is going to feel good. This chair is bangin’ grantee I’ve only had it for a day but I like it so much already that I felt it necessary to write a review. It feels thick and well built, like an all-pro middle linebacker. It was pretty easy to put together. I’d recommend this to all the people stuck working from home!
author: Andrew E.
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: You get what you pay for.
content: So what I mean by the headline is that although the chair is doing it's job. Being a big guy (280lbs) I do feel this chair won't last long. I'd be happy if it last a year. Was easy to assemble, I'd would probably use a drill bit next time since I kept dropping the provided tool. But please be careful as to not strip the thread. Maybe after a few weeks use I will re tighten the screws and see if that makes it feel more secure.
author: JungleG76
product: AmazonBasics High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Office Computer Desk Chair - Brown

title: My buttocks are happy.
content: Original Post: I got this chair to replace an old office chair that decided to shed its fake pleather skin... everywhere. You wouldn’t believe the places I’ve found that stuff. Also after several years my butt made quite the “impression “ on it and well... goodbye chair padding. I’m a bigger gal I’ll admit, so I couldn’t raise the chair height anymore... trying just turned it into a weird amusement park ride where you’re confused if you had a good time or not and if the equipment was safe. But now, the moment you’ve been waiting for. I had some doubts about the mesh back, as that was a fashion statement in the late 80’s and I wasn’t sure the chair could “rock” it. Turns out it’s pretty great when the air conditioning fails and you’ve got a fan behind you. I’ve had this thing for a weekend... still like it... that’s longer than my last boyfriend stayed in my good graces. Anyhoo, it was easy to put together but slightly awkward... would have been much faster and easier if The Rock was included for assembly but beggars can’t be choosers. The cushion is nice. My butt seems to enjoy it much better than the last chair. It felt like it was cheating on good ole rusty the office chair but it forgot about that peeling delinquent rapidly. I do wish the back of the chair could lean back though... my ceiling feels neglected if I don’t give it a hard stare every so often. The whole chair will tilt but not just the back. I like how you can adjust the lumbar support as well, great feature on 80’s mesh stylist chair. The arms though. Dear lawd. Why no padding? My elbows hurt something fierce sometimes... and sometimes my arms go numb which makes video gameing awkward.... I mean, imagine it. Intense battle, everyone is fighting for their lives and the hot elf is just standing there being useless because her arms went numb. I’ll be getting some armchair pads to help with this so my teammates have a functioning elf that doesn’t have noodle arms. Other than that, good chair! Also the arms are adjustable, very... handy. I’d take a photo but that requires getting dressed in case there’s a sneaky reflection somewhere and I’m honestly too lazy and dressed for bed already. The existing photos in other reviews are spot on though. Also the seat is nice and wide for my big bottom, larger than the average office chair. No pinching in weird places. EDIT! September 8th, 2019 I return! Having put some mileage into this chair I thought I'd update ya! It does make small noises now, nothing to get excited over really as I hardly notice it. My butt has formed an imprint upon the cushion which is very noticeable. I will likely have to buy a cushion as the chair ages. Overall it seems to have held up well. I did purchase Arm rest covers for the arms as they were quite hard! They greatly helped and only cost about $10. Overall, I'm still happy with this chair!
author: JollyNova
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: At 450lbs, this chair is a must
content: I haven't had the chair very long, however I have been through a handful of chairs in the last year.  All rated to hold 400+ lbs.  Over the years of office work, I have also sat in a wide array of different, much more expensive chairs.  And right now, this chair is one of the best I have been in.  The pad is super thick, wide, and deep.  The support board under it is just as wide and deep, so I do not feel I am overflowing the support structure of the chair. Right now, this is one of the better chairs.  The construction felt solid and I had no damage to mine when I got it. I think the only immediate improvement would be the back rest.  It should have some horizontal adjustment for people who want to sit further back in the seat.
author: Seikojin
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: terrible
content: I have had it for 7 months. Stopped being useful and became an actual health problem 5 months in. There are springs in the anus area of the chair. once the foam loses it's support (after about 2 months of ownership) the springs begin to compress your anus and hip area. Found myself with severe hip pain that only happens while sitting in this chair. This chair has cost me so much more beyond the price tag.
author: Ms. Lawrence
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Buyer Beware - 30 day warranty ONLY
content: I have had this chair for 6 months and liked it ok. It's wide and roomy, and the back support is nice. I must admit my hips ache when I sit in it for about an hour without standing; there's a ridge in the seat that sits right along your "crack" and I think that's the main source of discomfort. I was hoping I would adjust to it, but no. Anyway, 5 months into owning the chair one of the armrests won't stay at level - the merest pressure and it drops. Weirdly, I never adjust the armrests ever - just set them when I first got the chair, so it's not like I've been killing the latch position. In contacting the seller for manufacturer's information, I was informed the seller IS the manufacturer of record and there are no additional warranties beyond the initial 30-day return window. Additionally, there are no replacement parts available. At $150 I wish I would have examined the fine print before purchasing. Buyer Beware!
author: Margaret Pennell
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Great Chair, especially for those that are weight and size challenged!
content: I was a little skeptical when my "chair" came in a box half it's size, however, I found it be well packed, and the instructions were clear, took me about 15 mins to get the chair together.  It's very well made, very comfortable and certainly fits my 6'6"/300 lb frame.  It rolls about silently and without squeaks that you find in some roll around chairs, and there is plenty of support for my back.  Great chair!
author: JC
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Great by great price.
content: I was really worried about the size of the chair since I needed a big and tall one. I was extremely happy when I opened the box and saw the size of it. It’s very sturdy and very well made. Very easy to put together with the step by step instructions. I am beyond satisfied with this purchase. The arm rest rise to a nice height. The seat is great in size. Also very thick comfortable padding. I highly recommend this chair to anyone looking for a plus size model.
author: Jennifer M
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Broke after having for less than 6 months.
content: The metal on the chair completely broke into leaving the chair useless. My employee fell out of the broken chair.  Contacted the seller to be told sorry its passed a 90 warranty. Will not be buying from this company again.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Solid and Comfortable!
content: This is a great chair, especially for larger people. I bought a less expensive model and spent over four hours trying to assemble it. Never did get it together (defective) so it went back. I was able to assemble this one in about a half hour (I'm a 70 Y/O woman). You won't regret buying this one!
author: Kindle Customer
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Comfortable and sturdy, but maybe not as durable?
content: So I bought this chair in the beginning of 2019. Great value for a solid chair for heavier individuals. Very comfortable, love the shuttle am rests and the solid base. Unfortunately  after 9 months, one of the holes for the wheel casters broke off. Now for reference I'm only 330lbs so will under the 400 lb weight limit, and just put the chair to regular use. Not sure if this was just a defect with the welds on the base off my chair but it's a bummer for that to happen. Also having difficult finding out who to contact about possibly getting a replacement base for this otherwise great chair.
author: Ed M.G.
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Chair that is truly made for big people
content: I took some pictures of my old chair that I spent 90 bucks or so on vs this chair, both set to max height for sake of comparison. It's like my old chair was a child's toy. This chair is a monster! The chair is WIDE and THICC, they aren't playing around. For the first time in years I can rest my arms on the armrest of a chair, and sit in one without my ass spilling out the sides. I'm sure every big person knows that feeling. Installation was simple enough, took me about 30-40 minutes alone and I had to wrestle with it in the end but very simple overall. The chair says it supports 400 pounds and I believe them. It's solid and sturdy, but cushioned. I weigh close to 300 and am 6'1 as of this review and I can sit in this without feeling like this thing may break in half. The images don't do this thing justice, it's a big chair. I also want to address the issues people seem to have with reclining. It doesn't lay horizontally, no. But it DOES recline quite a bit, you have to pull out the lever that's used to raise and lower the seat and it'll allow you to lay back. It feels a little scary but the chair will catch you. It's probably a 30-40 degree angle. The armrests are lightly padded and they do give just a little side to side, this is most likely to accommodate different arm resting positions, which is really nice. You can move them up or down and they go up very high. Lumbar support is also padded and is very sturdy. It's not some cheap piece of plastic going across the chair. So that's about it really. I wanted to wait to do this review until a week, but my first impressions were so positive I had to post this now. If you're a big guy and you need a chair you can fit in, please give this one a try before you buy some 500 dollar "big and tall" chair. I think you'll be glad you did!
author: Terry Williams
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

content: I was a little skeptical when my "chair" came in a box half it's size, however, I found it be well packed, and the instructions were clear, took me about 15 mins to get the chair together.  It's very well made, very comfortable and certainly fits my 6'6"/300 lb frame.  It rolls about silently and without squeaks that you find in some roll around chairs, and there is plenty of support for my back.  Great chair!
author: JC
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Great by great price.
content: I was really worried about the size of the chair since I needed a big and tall one. I was extremely happy when I opened the box and saw the size of it. It’s very sturdy and very well made. Very easy to put together with the step by step instructions. I am beyond satisfied with this purchase. The arm rest rise to a nice height. The seat is great in size. Also very thick comfortable padding. I highly recommend this chair to anyone looking for a plus size model.
author: Jennifer M
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Broke after having for less than 6 months.
content: The metal on the chair completely broke into leaving the chair useless. My employee fell out of the broken chair.  Contacted the seller to be told sorry its passed a 90 warranty. Will not be buying from this company again.
author: Amazon Customer
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Solid and Comfortable!
content: This is a great chair, especially for larger people. I bought a less expensive model and spent over four hours trying to assemble it. Never did get it together (defective) so it went back. I was able to assemble this one in about a half hour (I'm a 70 Y/O woman). You won't regret buying this one!
author: Kindle Customer
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Comfortable and sturdy, but maybe not as durable?
content: So I bought this chair in the beginning of 2019. Great value for a solid chair for heavier individuals. Very comfortable, love the shuttle am rests and the solid base. Unfortunately  after 9 months, one of the holes for the wheel casters broke off. Now for reference I'm only 330lbs so will under the 400 lb weight limit, and just put the chair to regular use. Not sure if this was just a defect with the welds on the base off my chair but it's a bummer for that to happen. Also having difficult finding out who to contact about possibly getting a replacement base for this otherwise great chair.
author: Ed M.G.
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: Chair that is truly made for big people
content: I took some pictures of my old chair that I spent 90 bucks or so on vs this chair, both set to max height for sake of comparison. It's like my old chair was a child's toy. This chair is a monster! The chair is WIDE and THICC, they aren't playing around. For the first time in years I can rest my arms on the armrest of a chair, and sit in one without my ass spilling out the sides. I'm sure every big person knows that feeling. Installation was simple enough, took me about 30-40 minutes alone and I had to wrestle with it in the end but very simple overall. The chair says it supports 400 pounds and I believe them. It's solid and sturdy, but cushioned. I weigh close to 300 and am 6'1 as of this review and I can sit in this without feeling like this thing may break in half. The images don't do this thing justice, it's a big chair. I also want to address the issues people seem to have with reclining. It doesn't lay horizontally, no. But it DOES recline quite a bit, you have to pull out the lever that's used to raise and lower the seat and it'll allow you to lay back. It feels a little scary but the chair will catch you. It's probably a 30-40 degree angle. The armrests are lightly padded and they do give just a little side to side, this is most likely to accommodate different arm resting positions, which is really nice. You can move them up or down and they go up very high. Lumbar support is also padded and is very sturdy. It's not some cheap piece of plastic going across the chair. So that's about it really. I wanted to wait to do this review until a week, but my first impressions were so positive I had to post this now. If you're a big guy and you need a chair you can fit in, please give this one a try before you buy some 500 dollar "big and tall" chair. I think you'll be glad you did!
author: Terry Williams
product: Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Desk Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Wide Seat Adjust Arms Rolling Swivel High Back Task Executive Ergonomic Chair for Women Men,Black

title: $100 lesson.
content: First box arrived damaged(UPS at 8:15PM without ringing bell or I would have rejected the delivery) Promptly picked up and replaced at no charge in two days.Easily assembled.Parts bubble wrapped with separate ID's to match the diagram.Only tool required is the included and enclosed Allen wrench.Chair is exactly as pictured and advertised.I shopped for chairs in San Diego and found prices from $100 to over $800 with most in the 200-400 range.Decided to try and buy on line to save some money.This chair is comparable to several at the lower end of that range.All the adjustments worked,to ferrying degrees.The arms were the best feature because I wanted the support and many chairs are designed to fit under the desk and don't go high enough.However for me it was a $100 lesson-not a good idea to buy a chair before sitting in it.I didn't feel right taking it apart and sending it back-it is a perfectly adequate chair.For me 5"11 210 it didn't work.The seat cushion comes to mid thigh-I need a few more inches support.The biggest problem for me was you can't lean back-at all.It is sit straight up or lean forward. It is not really a "high back". The lowest position helps with the lower back but nothing for the back above the bottom of the shoulders.The max up position is a bit better for the upper back but eliminates the lumbar support.This is a computer chair not a desk chair.No way to lean back to take a break.Now I see why some of the true Ergonomic chairs are more expensive.I am going to take this to Good Will as soon as I get a chair I can thoroughly check out before I buy.Nothing against this seller-5 star delivery of what was promised-applies to all on line purchases of something so personal it is a risk to buy without "trying it on" first.
author: Del Mar Aztec
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: UPDATE- Comfortable Chair But...
content: Easy to assemble. The only gripe that I have and I probably should of read the specs more closely, is that at full vertical extension it sits too low for my taste. UPDATE November 26, 2017 After only 1 year 3 months of purchasing, the chair has totally lost all seat padding support. I expected this chair to have at least lasted longer than it did.
author: Tommy Venable
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: I really like so much about this chair - the adjustable arms ...
content: I really like so much about this chair - the adjustable arms and tilt of the seat are good for dialing in your specific comfort level. HOWEVER, the pad of the seat is not quality foam inside. The cushion compressed within a few months and the chair quickly became uncomfortable. I contacted the company and they were very good about responding. BUT, they sent me a replacement seat, made with inadequate cushion again. So it will wear down within a few months. They say they do not offer exchanges for other chairs or refunds, just replacement parts. Don't order this chair if you want comfort for you bum.
author: Terri in Oregon
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: Seat not comfortable - foam goes out within a few days
content: I'm actually pretty disappointed with this purchase.  I had spent the extra money over a cheaper chair because I believed this one would have adequate padding in the seat cushion on top of all the cool levers.  Unfortunately, this is not the case.  Within a week of using it, the foam seat already depresses after a minute of sitting down (and I'm 115 pounds, and not all of it is on the chair).  It re-inflates after a period of not sitting on it, but it compresses down quickly once you return to sit on it.  Personally, I have issues that require extra padding when I sit, so this is an important issue for me.  The chair would have been much, much better quality had the seat cushion been better and more durable. Other than that, it's an okay chair.  Easy to assemble, good back support, adjustable height and back tilt (I wish you could tilt the chair back farther).  Packaging was messy on the inside, but nothing was scratched. There are cheaper chairs here on Amazon for forty or sixty bucks that are just as comfortable as this chair, but I guess if you want the ability to tilt the seat and back, this chair could be for you.  But honestly, there are better products out there.  Just wish I found them before buying this one.
author: Craig A. Kukielski
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: Terrible Chair
content: I needed new chairs for the office and thought this would be the one.  Boy was I wrong! I purchased two of these in May of 2018.  One is mine for 8-9 hours per day, 5 days a week.  The other is for the part-time help.  3-5 hours per day, 2-3 days a week.  My chair has been worn out for months.  The other one isn't quite as bad... YET.  The back is adjustable.  Kind of... You can raise it up, but it doesn't stay.  Never has.  The seat is so hard now that I can't sit in it very long.  A cushion helps a little, but raised me up a little higher, so I need to raise the back to be comfortable...  Too bad it won't stay where I need it.  I read some of the reviews before I bought this chair, but ignored the bad ones.  That was a HUGE mistake.  This chair only lasted me maybe 4-6 months before the seat became unbearable.  Now I have to find something else.  This was a waste of money!
author: Ruth Hutchison
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: Good chair overall for the price, but there is no lumbar support as the title states
content: The chair has several adjustable features that I really wanted - seat angle, back angle, arm rest height and overall height can all be adjusted. There is NO lumbar support unless you consider some curved mesh sufficient - and I don't. I sit in the char for hours sometimes while gaming and true lumbar support would be welcome. I may just try a small pillow behind me and see if that works.  I guess you really do get what you pay for.
author: Mark Watson
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: ... many office chairs and this one is far the best one I have ever had
content: I have had many office chairs and this one is far the best one I have ever had. It has adjustable height and lean back settings. Also the arm rest had two levels to adjust. Very comfortable. I would recommend to everyone.
author: stangal
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: I almost flattened it!
content: I really like this chair! After the delivery oops and me almost running over the box in the dark, I got the chair in the house piece by piece, from the damaged box. The delivery guy had put it in my carport 50 feet away from my house. All of the parts were there and nothing damaged but the box. The directions were clear (if I paid attention and didn't get ahead of myself) and I am sitting on it now typing this review. I'm 71 and 5'1" and was able to assemble it by myself. The adjustment mechanism was the heaviest part. It's very comfortable and like all chairs it will take a few days and readjustments to get it the way I want it.
author: Jannynet
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: Great chair for the price
content: Very comfortable seat and I love how many adjustments are available. I'm 5'4", and a lot of chairs I tried out were really big, or the lumbar support was off. This seat is perfect for me. After a log day of classes and work, it is nice to come home and sit down to work on my assignments. The seat provides ample cushion for long periods of time, without making my back or neck hurt.
author: Jessica
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: Get what you pay for.
content: Hard to compare this chair as it is so cheap. For the money its fine, but I wish I had just spent more. The cushion has worn down already and it has only been 6 months. I weigh 160lbs so not that much strain on the chair. I use it maybe for an hour every day or two. Any longer and my butt starts hurting. The arm rest wiggle back and forth even on the lowest setting. The back rest is good and the only redeeming quality.
author: Jordan
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

author: Jordan
product: OFM Essentials Collection 3-Paddle Ergonomic Mesh High-Back Task Chair with Arms and Lumbar Support, in Black

title: So far so good
content: Literally just got it and sat on it since. Unlike my 10 year old office chair, I do feel much better sitting on it for a long amount of time, like 8 hours. I'm not sure about lumbar support since I never had issue on my lumbar area before, so I can't comment on that much. Mesh back lets my back breathe too. I kinda sweat a lot and my old chair gets wet if it gets too hot. However, with this chair I rather feel breeze on my back  and felt cool for my long sit time. Assembly was pretty easy too. Though I kinda have bad feeling about one of the base stick came separate and I had to install it. Hopefully, it won't break in two.
author: Seung Woo Lee
product: Hbada Ergonomic Office Chair, Computer Desk Chair, Swivel and Rocking Task Chair with Strong Shield Type Lumbar Support, Height Adjustable Mid-Back Mesh Chair with Padded Armrest, Black.

title: Save space
content: A very comfy and easy to put together chair. Perfect for my daughter's bedroom which is quite small. Hardly takes up space. Love everything about it. Shipment was super fast.
author: Deanna Theosmy
product: Hbada Ergonomic Office Chair, Computer Desk Chair, Swivel and Rocking Task Chair with Strong Shield Type Lumbar Support, Height Adjustable Mid-Back Mesh Chair with Padded Armrest, Black.

title: New purchase
content: I just purchased this product so I can’t give much of an opinion on comfort. But just by sitting in it after putting it together it seems comfortable and well made. I purchased this bc of the ability to move the arms. That was a huge selling point for me. Great for the price. I will say this, instructions say to screw the arms on tight before adding the back. Don’t do that, it makes things so difficult. Keep the arms loose and then tighten after the back is attached. I had to unscrew the arms so I could get the back on. Just a tip! Other than that, happy with my purchase
author: sherry boswell
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Highly Recommend!!!
content: Chair is great and easy on the back. Used it at a desk to work on school assignments for hours and had no back pain. Definitely recommend for anyone who suffers from back aches and soreness when sitting for hours at a desk
author: Ivan G.
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Fantastic!
content: Absolutely perfect chair for a fabulous deal! Incredibly easy to assemble, only took me 40 minutes!! Directions are great and easy to follow, came well before it was originally expected, very comfortable! Absolutely perfect office chair! I'm 5'2" and a medium build, I sit very comfortably with room to spare - am able to sit criss-cross-applesauce on the chair!
author: Colleen
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: This product is very good, light and convenient, and the child is also very comfortable to sit
content: This product is very good, light and convenient, and the child is also very comfortable to sit

product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: like
content: good。fast Delivery。like the desk chair
