product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Best chair and customer service
content: Before I bought it ,I asked many issues of this chair, the seller replyed rapidly,last,I got this office chair,love it!
author: Gina Froment
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Wonderful chair
content: Chair was delivered promptly, it was easy to put together, no special tools.  Excellent back support.
author: Joyce
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: love it
content: I love it.  Much more comfortable than my work chair
author: May Lee
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Lever to raise/lower should be on the right while seated!!!
content: Good chair for the price! Sturdy, comfortable enough (although seat could use more padding. If you don’t want to spend hundreds on a chair, this one is a good solid choice. ***If chair feels like you are leaning forward, it is not assembled correctly. Lever to lower/raise chair should be on the right side while seated- Not clear on instructions and obviously many people miss this, based on other comments***
author: Amelia Donaldson
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Easy to Assemble - Very Comfortable
content: The chair arrived timely.  It was easy to put together.  I would recommend that when you use the assembly instruction sheet that you assemble  in the following order: 1, 2, 3, 5, 4, and 6.  I found it easier to put the armrests on first and then align the armrest with the seat.  Also, when you install the mechanism, be sure that it is on the right side when you are sitting down.  If it is on the left side, the seat will tilt you forward and not a backward as it should - learned that the hard way.  Once assembled correctly,  it is quite comfortable, tilts back nicely, and the ability to raise the arms  is a nice feature.  The price is reasonable.  If I needed to, I would buy another.
author: golfer B
product: ComHoma Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair Mesh Computer Chair with Flip Up Arms Lumbar Support Adjustable Swivel Mid Back for Conference Home Office, Black

title: Amazing chair!
content: Finally got my chair today and I would say I love it! It’s sturdy and comfortable. Love the color and feel. It was really easy to put together. It’s a very stylish too which I love! Thank you!
author: drew
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Bought this for my dad's birthday and he loves it!
content: We used to have a chair that did not look at all modern and at the same time didn't allow for good posture. I've searched on Ikea for a good chair that has a good price and couldn't find any for under $100. Then I decided to go on Amazon, this chair stood out from the rest because it was slick and fits right into our modern home. I decided to buy it as a gift for my dad's birthday since I couldn't think of anything else to get him. Upon receiving the shipping box, it was packaged very nicely and once out of the box the chair was super easy to assemble since I just had to follow the instructions that were clear and concise. It only took my 10 minutes to assemble and I surprised him once he had got home. He fell in love with it since the comfort was just right. The lumbar spine was well rested against that back of the chair and even though the back support was fixed in that angle, it wasn't necessary to have the adjustable back since this was just right to have a good posture. The seat is indeed comfortable and has a very nice cushion, the chair is light weight and the wheels are smooth on my wood laminated floors. I'm quite happy that my dad loves it and I think the price is quite amazing.
author: Ericson V.
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Definitely a Buy again. It’s worth a five star
content: I needed a computer chair for the hours spends studying in my living room. This chair fit the bill and is exceptionally well made. As you can see it looks harmony in my room. This is no reason to avoid buying this chair. As a chair it is comfortable and sturdy and well worth the price. I would buy this again in a heartbeat. For the assembly part, you can certainly put it together with the included tool.
author: Siyu Zhao
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Very comfortable, looks great
content: This chair is really comfortable, and I prefer the upright position. It also looks very modern and clean. The fabric is very soft and is a great color. Unfortunately the arms were too short for what I need and aren't adjustable - the arms stand about 23.5" from the ground, which the description didn't mention. If that's what you're looking for, I highly recommend!
author: Amazon Customer
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Great Buy!
content: 2 week review: It's a great chair, especially for the price! Good seat cushion, great fabric. It was a breeze to put together, at least for me. Easy shipping, good packaging. The height range is perfect for me. Just keep in mind folks - it's not a recliner.. Other than that it looks like a solid build, and the materials don't seem cheap.
author: Ravipal Singh Ghatoura
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Easy & cute chair
content: I received my chair today; it prob took me about 40 minutes to put it together myself. Not difficult, instructions were easy to follow, I was kinda confused with the arm rest on which way they were suppose to go but I did it lol. It looks good, is comfy and it seems to be good quality. Let’s see in a couple of days after sitting all day on it.
author: Daniela Lopez
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Great chair!
content: Got this chair for my office. It was easy to set up and comfortable to sit in and work! Great price too!
author: Bella Hibbs
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Very Comfortable Chair Easy to Assemble
content: This chair is great. It was my first time to assemble a chair, and it only took me about 20 minutes. The assembly manual is super simple to understand! The chair itself is also very comfortable to sit on. The wheels are very smooth, and the height adjuster runs smooth as well. Definitely recommended.
author: Jay
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Great chair for daily use
content: I love the grey color and soft texture of the chair. Overall the chair feels very comfortable. I have no trouble sitting in this chair every day for about 8hrs working. Surprisingly for this kind of a budget chair, you actually get a lot back support from it, sort of like the experience of other expensive ergonomic chair. Definitely a great buy!
author: Jesse
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Most beautiful chair ever
content: I moved to a new home and I bought this chair even before buying the desk because it looks so nice. I knew that I must have this elegant chair. I hate black office chairs, this is the only one chair I like because of the nice color and design. I even use it as background to take pictures of small objects. It came with detailed instruction, easy to assemble for a girl like me. Good buy, No complaints!
author: iris b.
product: Office Desk Chair with Arms and Adjustable Height, Home Computer Task Chair for Work Space, Grey & White

title: Most comfortable desk chair I have ever sat in. I live here now.
content: I'm never leaving this chair. You'll have to pry me from it when I die. This is where I live now.
author: Jen & Chris
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Got what I wanted
content: I wanted a desk chair that molded to me, not one that molded me. With this chair, I got what I wanted. Also, the padding under my bottom on my last two desk chairs wore out in about 2 years. I don't have much padding on my bottom so I need my chair to have some. I couldn't find a separate pad I to sit on that could keep the rest of the chairs' molding in alignment. Judging from the picture, it looked like this chair didn't scrimp on padding for the bottom.  Again, I got what I wanted. This chair's deck has substantial padding for the bottom--and for the back. As far as assembly goes, for most people, it will take two people to put the chair back on--one person to line the screw holes up and another to put the screws in. And it was much easier to seat the screws after I pulled the fabric back to completely expose the screw holes. As for the delivery, the chair arrived on time--a 2-day delivery and our hard-working, good-looking Amazon delivery man carried the chair up three flights of stairs to our place and was happy to do it. Recalling this man's example of excellent customer service makes sitting in this chair all the better.
author: Lin Sloan
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Amazing support chair- easy build!
content: All packaging was protective and arrived fast & protected.  Assembly was easy with easy to read instructions even as building it alone you can move the item into your favor. All screw slots aligned perfectly.  This does tilt with a little leg effort, but ok with as im not a fan. Support is amazing! Very thick and cushioned for comfort.  Color is just as pictured. Beautiful stylish grey with soft material. Very in love with my new work chair!!
author: Jose C.
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Wonderful chair
content: This chair is big and comfortable. I am so pleased I got it.  I really don't like chairs with curved seats and this chair has a large, flat seat that is firm but super comfortable.  I like to sit on my foot or cross legged - so it is perfect for that.  I am 5'4, and on the lowest setting my feet are flat on the floor.  The tilt is very nice and the arms fold-up when you need them out of the way.  It's pretty too.
author: Amazon Customer
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Great Chair and Greatest customer service
content: First, this chair is SUPER comfortable and stylish to boot.  The fabric is soft, and the cushions are well designed and supportive.  I have no doubt this chair will last a very long time. I had a very minor issue with the chair, a couple of stitches that were overlapped at a certain point, and only because I'm a total perfectionist, did I write the seller, more to just let them know than to ask for any replacement or compensation. Myka's, the seller, could not have been more lovely and timely in their responses to me.  I assured them I was not unhappy, only wanted to alert them to a minor manufacturing error, likely one that is not recurring, and that I wasn't seeking any reparations. Regardless, they jumped into action and gave me numerous options to ensure that I was 100% satisfied with the purchase.  The company is located in China, and were even sensitive concerning time zones (e.g. When they wrote, "we will respond to you tomorrow as it is midnight here in China..." and by the time I awoke the next day, there was a response in my inbox). If you're on the fence about purchasing this chair, I encourage you to go for it.  Both the chair and the company are top-notch.  As I sit in the chair now, writing this, I can assure you that the "comfort" stretched way beyond the superb quality of the chair, and to my entire shopping experience.
author: nyc buyer
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: GREAT BUY!
content: Took a chance ordering a chair on line....glad I did.  Easy to assemble, nice enough quality for the price. It does tilt back but not without leg power...not an issue for us as it's a computer chair. Very comfortable and love those fold up arms, fits under the desk now! It's a thick, soft, mesh-type material that my cats have shown no interest in scratching up....10 stars just for that! It seems easy to clean and the family is happy!
author: AussieMum
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Love the chair !
content: I have owned several Vinyl Desk chairs and bonded leather and after a couple of years the leather or vinyl comes off cracks or deteriorates . This chair has breathable fabric that I believe will be much more durable and is more comfortable with better lumbar support. I'm 239 ,6,1 and this chair fits me better than any I've owned. It's the best deal on a chair for the money.
author: E. Sapp
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Very nice and comfortable
content: Great quality chair. Very comfortable,  leans back a great deal in which I LOVE. Easy to assemble and all parts were included.  The raise arm feature is great,  when not using I slide fully into desk for added space in the office. You feel like a boss in this chair. Did not use wheels that came with it. Installed roller blade wheels to protect wood floor. Beautiful chair, Highly recommend!
author: Kenneth B.
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Solid, comfortable chair that looks great!
content: Well worth the money. Comfortable, well built and adjustable. Only issue I had was assembling the back cushion. I needed a second person to hold it in place while I put the screws in.
author: Wookie
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Good, but does NOT recline.
content: This review is for the 3288RW SP Velvet Office Chair . UPDATE │ Warranty is top-notch. Comparable to Aeron or Steelcase, CONSIDERING the cost of the chair. Best customer service I've dealt with for a long time. No regrets. NEW VERDICT: ★★★★★ | 5 stars out of 5, They updated the product page, and new buyers should not have the same complaint I had. You can ignore my "recline"-related complaints below (the rest of the review still applies). - - - TL;DR │ It's a beautiful and comfortable chair, but...falsely advertised at the time I bought it. This chair DOES NOT recline. Also, the color is a bit off from their photos, more on that later. I got this chair specifically because of "the backrest tilts independently to respond to natural body movements" (a.k.a. recline). Well, it does not. I kind of figured it out when I was assembling it. The back and the seat is connected via the armrest, which DOES NOT bend. This means your whole upper body weight is supported by two screws on each side. WHAT I LIKE │ + │ + Really soft and comfortable + Smooth and velvety. + Armrest fold ups. + Looks beautiful. + The color is off, but I like it better. + Good seller and brand (tries to resolve the problem). WHAT I DON'T LIKE │ × │ × Does not recline. × It might die quick (material, color, and frame). × Armrest not adjustable. × Has scratches on the chrome armrest. × Price was for a reclining chair. × Difficult to assemble alone. PACKAGE │ ✓ ✗ │ ✓ Un-assembled chair. ✓ Printed instructions. ✓ Box that is about to fall apart (from shipping). Now, why would I care so much for recline? Isn't a 90-degree posture best for you? WRONG. I usually stand in front of my sit-stand desk, but when I sit, it has to be 135 degrees. This chair DOES NOT have that capability. For the price, I expected this very basic functionality. The whole chair tilts, like a rocking chair. Also, the color is off. The photos show sand color, but I got more like light wheat. Even though I liked what I got better, other people should note about it. I have no idea what "RW" means in the color code. - - - VERDICT: I *can* recommend this product if you still like it after my warning. ★★★★☆ | 4 stars out of 5. Has merits, but I am ultimately not too happy with the lack of recline. Questions? Hit the comments! This review is for the 3288RW SP Velvet Office Chair .
author: Engr. Jay Mendoza
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

author: Engr. Jay Mendoza
product: SP Velvet Office Chair Adjustable Tilt Angle and Flip-up Arms Executive Computer Desk Chair, Thick Padding for Comfort and Ergonomic Design for Lumbar Support (Beige)

title: Extremely comfortable and stylish office chair
content: This is an extremely comfortable office chair that is stylish and well made.  It took me all of 25 minutes to put together and the instructions were very easy to follow.  It has a nice quality leather feel with solid stitching.  Make sure when assembling to follow the front on the base and on the bottom front of the seat.  That makes aligning easy.
author: daspiel63
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Comfortable chair
content: It's rare for me to write a review for a product that I'm actually happy with.  This chair will be an exception.  I placed the order on May 21, 2020.  The expected delivery date was actually June 9, 2020.  I received it on May 23, 2020 much to my surprise.  The reason I ordered this chair was because my previous chair was long over due for replacement.  There was no cushion left on the seat or the back of the chair.  It was a cheap chair I ordered back in 2017.  After 3 years of use, it was pretty much destroyed.  So, I was pushed to order a new chair by a severe back injury that the previous chair was making worse.  I couldn't sit comfortably.  I could barely walk.  I had to use nearby furniture to stand up.  Well, I've had this chair for 4 weeks today.  I have no back pain that isn't work related.  The pain in my wrist is gone.  I'm not saying the chair performed miracles.  It just lacks deficiencies that my last chair had. So, I'm 5'8, 250lbs.  The chair is extremely comfortable.  It's very supportive.  The cushion height is perfect for me.  The arm rests are at the correct level for my desk.  The chair back is contoured in the correct way.  There is no strain on my body from this chair. The seat and back have some heft to them.  That's one of the downsides to buying a chair that can support people above 250lbs.  Adding strength adds weight.  The stitching patterns don't line up properly.  But can you see them while you're sitting it in?  Stitch alignment has no affect on comfort. Based on my experience over the last 4 weeks, I would have no problem buying this chair again.
author: A. Thomas
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Unbelievable for the price I Paid!!!
content: Hello, I just received my Office Chair, and even I did received it ahead of the delivery promised date. It is super Nice looking chair and comfortable as well. I highly recommend it for office or home use. Once you get it you will thank me!!!
author: abdul wakeel
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Best chair ever!!!
content: I love this chair. I have had several office chairs because I am a big girl and I need comfort as well as durability and this chair not only covers my needs it is BEAUTIFUL!!! Arm rests go up and glides smoothly it’s just amazing. So glad I found it. I’m 5’ 2” 280 and still has room for me. I definitely recommend it!!!
author: Andy
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Comfy, easy to assemble, and great for my teen!
content: I had to set up a second computer for my kids during Coronavirus and we definitely needed another good chair.  My son saw this one on Amazon and talked me into getting it because he said it looked so cool!  It came quickly and I was able to assemble it myself but it was much easier with a ratchet so you can get the pieces really tight.  Its comfortable so he is able to sit there for a long time if needed and it's really easy to clean with a moist rag.
author: Devina Dotson
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Exceeded my expectations w/ nice extra touch to it
content: I checked other reviews before buying it and after good amount of research I thought this chair was the winner: best features within the right price. Delivery happened before I was expecting it to show up. Well packed, all parts included, even had spare screws in the assembly kit. Assembly was a breeze, simple and quick. And one thing that caught my attention was a little pocket on the back of the chair, but I left that to check after assembling and testing the chair. Test drive was perfect, adjustments easy to make while seated and then I checked the back pocket and noticed it had a USB-A cable (?!?). First thought was that being a hybrid of office/gaming chair this USB would be for sound functions may be??? Well, I connected it to my laptop to check what would happen and....Surprise!!!! Vibrating back massage....WOW! I wasn't expecting this which blew my mind! For whatever reason this is not advertised or commented by anyone: the fact the chair has a back massage feature. It's simple vibrating tool which actually does a decent job after some time seating. Anyways, I was happy with the purchase but the extra touch puts this at a vibrating 5 stars! Nice job!
author: A. P.
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Decent for the price
content: I had to buy a chair for working at home (as well as other things like a laptop lift, extra keyboard and mouse) to survive during the lock down.  I like this chair because it is quite comfortable, and I love that you can raise the arms to get them out of the way if you need to, for tucking it under the table or making it more streamlined.  As far as lower back support goes, it's not the best, but I added a lumbar cushion for that.  It's quite good for the price, in my opinion, and it's comfortable.  I also wanted a chair that wasn't huge, as I don't have a lot of room, so this one is great.
author: OC Girl
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Great chair for back support
content: I got this product today. And it was very beautiful easy to assemble by myself and it was very comfortable I am suffering with lower back ache it is very good support thanks for the product. I will recommend to my friends...
author: jashwanth varma
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Comfy and ergonomic office chair
content: The chair is super comfortable. And the ergonomic back support is very well designed. It was easy to assemble (less than 20 mins) but another pair of hands were needed when attaching the upper and lower parts.
author: Aravind Ram
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: Wonderful!!
content: Wow I like this chair.it is pretty comfort and good quality. It is very easy to assemble and it is perfect for gaming. I would recommend to my colleagues....happy with product...
author: Mounika.V
product: Office Computer Desk Chair Wheels, Caster Wheels for Mesh Task Swiveling Chairs

title: False advertising
content: The product description claims this is a leather chair. Not true ! It is made from Bonded leather which Wikipedia defines as :  " Bonded leather, also called reconstituted leather or blended leather, is a term used for a manufactured upholstery material which contains animal hide. It is made as a layered structure of a fiber or paper backer covered with a layer of shredded leather fibers mixed with a polyurethane binder that is embossed with a leather-like texture"
author: rkm
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Loved at first - Disappointed Now
content: I have actually purchased 4 of these chairs just because of the comfort level of them. However, I am now noticing the first two (Black ones) I purchased is starting to bubble up and peel. Be very wary of everyday use, because apparently, the cover wears out quickly. I have never been so disappointed in a product or a company. Especially when they DO NOT STAND BY THEIR PRODUCT! A chair should not be peeling like this at barely 4 months old. 1 was purchased November 14, 2019 and the other November 20, 2019. The first picture was when it started bubbling on February 18th, the 2nd picture is that bubble today. I have had to put tape on it to keep it from getting worse. Do yourself a favor DO NOT BUY IF YOU PLAN TO SIT IT IN REGULARLY!!!!!
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: very expensive back ache
content: The " Ergonomic " portion of this chair leaves it impossible to sit back in this chair. You end up in this weird chest thrust forward , head leaning back, lets go on a roller-coaster position. I am sliding forward on the "bonded leather"  which leaves my hips in the wrong place and therefore my back is no longer support by the  "Ergonomic " portion of this chair (aka overstuffed lower back padding") If the school custodian had not thrown out the box this came in - I would be dissembling this giant waste of money and sending it back!!! Don't waste your time or your money. Get something else!!!!
author: Reading in NYC
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Nice at first, but your back will feel otherwise
content: This chair is initially impressive, but uncomfortable after several hours of sitting. The lumbar support is not shaped properly, and sticks too deep into the spine. The back angle is unable to statically adjust, and the gimmicky recline feature does little for an active work session
author: William Y.
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Very disappointed
content: Great chair, but the build quality of materials is very poor. After two weeks the covering fabric is coming apart, very disappointed
author: K. Howerton
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Love it so far.
content: I'm not big into computer chairs so I cant say how this compares to other chairs of similar value but I personally really like it. Very comfortable, easy to put together and has a great lumbar support. I am using it for work where I am behind a desk for 8+ hours a day. Will update in the future to say how it holds up. The only thing I wish was different is I wish it was lower. It fits under my desk fine and the arm rests are great, I just like lower sitting chairs. Not a huge deal though as I am sure I will get used to it quickly.
author: Kyle Henderson
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Great chair and looks great too!
content: This chair was purchased b/c my husband has a bad back but sits at the computer for most of the day. It has not only made work enjoyable but has helped with his lumbar support. It took about 30 minutes to set up and has worked great. My daughters love it b/c the arms fold up to where they can bring the chair closer to the desk. Very happy with this purchase.
author: Niki
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: I’d buy it again
content: Pretty solid chair. I’m 6 foot 240 and I feel pretty safe sitting in this chair. The lifting arms are the biggest reason I bought the chair; allows for some space saving when not occupied. The backing of the chair has lumbar support which feels really good when you sit up and sit back to the chair. I’d buy this chair again if I ever needed a replacement due to me already knowing it’s a solid chair
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Nice color, way better than expected.
content: Was worried because it is cream colored... sometimes cream is too yellow sometimes you wonder why they did not just call it white... behold a nice cream color chair full of suprises! The gizmos to lower and adjust chairs are nicer than most I have had in this price range in the past. There are a couple of adjustments, it took a little messing with till I got the back to give how I wanted for comfort and feels very solid! I would buy this again if given the choice.
author: Marc Melton
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Absolutely Love This Chair!
content: I have been looking at chairs for years and even bought one last week and returned it.  I was hesitant to buy a chair I never sat in, but decided to take a chance and am glad I did.  I am extremely happy with this chair.  It is firm, sturdy and high quality materials and workmanship.  Assembly was easy and everything you need is supplied.  One recommendation though would be to attach the lumbar bracket that comes out of the chair back to the base bracket before attaching the bracket to the bottom of the chair.  The lumbar bracket is under tension and I had to get help to pull it down to put the screw in.  I love the active lumbar support and the tilt up arms.  Now I can push the chair all the way under the desk.
author: K Shilling
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: False advertising
content: The product description claims this is a leather chair. Not true ! It is made from Bonded leather which Wikipedia defines as :  " Bonded leather, also called reconstituted leather or blended leather, is a term used for a manufactured upholstery material which contains animal hide. It is made as a layered structure of a fiber or paper backer covered with a layer of shredded leather fibers mixed with a polyurethane binder that is embossed with a leather-like texture"
author: rkm
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Loved at first - Disappointed Now
content: I have actually purchased 4 of these chairs just because of the comfort level of them. However, I am now noticing the first two (Black ones) I purchased is starting to bubble up and peel. Be very wary of everyday use, because apparently, the cover wears out quickly. I have never been so disappointed in a product or a company. Especially when they DO NOT STAND BY THEIR PRODUCT! A chair should not be peeling like this at barely 4 months old. 1 was purchased November 14, 2019 and the other November 20, 2019. The first picture was when it started bubbling on February 18th, the 2nd picture is that bubble today. I have had to put tape on it to keep it from getting worse. Do yourself a favor DO NOT BUY IF YOU PLAN TO SIT IT IN REGULARLY!!!!!
author: Amazon Customer
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: very expensive back ache
content: The " Ergonomic " portion of this chair leaves it impossible to sit back in this chair. You end up in this weird chest thrust forward , head leaning back, lets go on a roller-coaster position. I am sliding forward on the "bonded leather"  which leaves my hips in the wrong place and therefore my back is no longer support by the  "Ergonomic " portion of this chair (aka overstuffed lower back padding") If the school custodian had not thrown out the box this came in - I would be dissembling this giant waste of money and sending it back!!! Don't waste your time or your money. Get something else!!!!
author: Reading in NYC
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Nice at first, but your back will feel otherwise
content: This chair is initially impressive, but uncomfortable after several hours of sitting. The lumbar support is not shaped properly, and sticks too deep into the spine. The back angle is unable to statically adjust, and the gimmicky recline feature does little for an active work session
author: William Y.
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Very disappointed
content: Great chair, but the build quality of materials is very poor. After two weeks the covering fabric is coming apart, very disappointed
author: K. Howerton
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream

title: Love it so far.
content: I'm not big into computer chairs so I cant say how this compares to other chairs of similar value but I personally really like it. Very comfortable, easy to put together and has a great lumbar support. I am using it for work where I am behind a desk for 8+ hours a day. Will update in the future to say how it holds up. The only thing I wish was different is I wish it was lower. It fits under my desk fine and the arm rests are great, I just like lower sitting chairs. Not a huge deal though as I am sure I will get used to it quickly.
author: Kyle Henderson
product: AmazonCommercial Ergonomic High-Back Bonded Leather Executive Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support, Cream
